info.plot: Con-man Sazali's extravagant and cushy lifestyle is in jeopardy when his illegal activities fall under the suspicion of the police.
After getting in a car accident, a woman is held in a shelter with two men, who claim the outside world is affected by a widespread chemical attack.
Dokumentari kisah gemilang dan jerih perih 3 orang atlet pecut Malaysia yang mencipta, memegang dan memecah rekod 100 meter iaitu Dr. M. Jegathesan, Watson Nyambek dan Khairul Hafiz Jantan.

When 3 married men fall for 3 young intern girls who come and work at their company, they intend to make them their lovers. So, they start to lie to their wives in order to carry out their intentions.
The bold and the beautiful takes on a whole new meaning when a group of beauty pageant contestants are coralled into a forest. Only the toughest will survive, and claim the prize of 10 million baht.
Out in the remotest waters of Indonesia, a woman goes missing during a midnight dive. A decade later, her son sets out to search for her and find out the truth of what happened on that fateful night.
Naughty little prankster gets a taste of his own medicine when he tries to spook his classmates, only to learn that there really are supernatural goings-on at his new school.
In the footsteps of "Golden Chicken", this hilarious sequel starring Sandra Ng, Louis Koo & Anthony Wong depicts the misadventures of a bunch of gigolos lead by the flamboyant Future.
Musical drama which follows singer Lian Hua through her career and sheds light on the painful encounters she makes with love and misfortune.
A girl makes a wish on her thirteenth birthday, and wakes up the next day as a thirty-year-old woman.
Max Joseph and Monica Lewinsky explore the world of public shaming and cancel culture.
It follows a group of friends in a village wading through the holy month of Ramadan which is full of tests.
30-something Mike O'Donnell is given a second shot at life when he is miraculously transformed back to the age of 17.
Kisah komedi ini memaparkan enam sekawan yang sering berdepan masalah untuk berpuasa di bulan Ramadan. Di saat takdir membawa mereka bersama, perjalanan lucu mereka diteruskan.
This story begins when a resident of Kampung Pisang discovers himself plagued by a demon during the fasting month.
Engulfed by love and bravery, an Indian National Army personnel finds himself caught between a dangerous rebellion and the coloniser's grip.
Filem sejarah yang bukan mencatatkan kronologi sahaja malah ia mampu menyuntik semangat patriotik di kalangan penonton.
Ex-cop, Brian O'Conner and childhood friend Roman Pearce are re-united by the FBI to bring down a Miami drug exporter in exchange for clear records.
Trench and Stigman have been tasked with investigating one another, until they discover they've been set up by the mob.
The film follows the conflict between Chitti, the once dismantled humanoid robot, and Pakshi Rajan.
A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.
A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.
The 2022 inductees—Pat Benatar and Neil Giraldo, Duran Duran, Eminem, Eurythmics, Dolly Parton, Lionel Richie, and Carly Simon—are honored.
Go behind the scenes on the epic winner-takes-all match play event between Phil Mickelson and Tiger Woods.
A former tennis pro forced to work at a public recreation center must regain his self-respect and lead his team of oddball amateurs to victory in a prestigious, annual tournament showdown.
3 anak muda bersaing untuk mendapatkan cinta Si Laila, gadis paling jelita di kampung untuk dijadikan isteri. Malangnya, Laila itu, anak kepada Bomoh paling terkenal di kampung mereka.

Dua sahabat baik iaitu Emma dan Syaiful telah membuka sebuah studio seni persembahan. Namun, sebulan selepas itu mereka mula diganggu oleh perkara aneh yang menyebabkan hubungan baik mereka mula terjejas.
Three friends experienced various challenges in different eras as they were trapped in several different eras after possessing an old camera.
Vasanthi leads a mundane life until her friend inspires to rediscover her younger self.

Javid bears the full brunt of the law over the drugs found in his car, so that his wife does not go to prison. After his release, various people, including this ex-wife, try to use him for their own ends.
A documentary short examining the cultural impact of NBA trailblazer Jeremy Lin and the cultural phenomenon known as "Linsanity" that took New York City and the sports world by storm in 2012.
A young man is haunted by a number, which happens to be the time he was born at. Can he and his family escape its clutches?
A jailbird and a detective forge an unlikely alliance to catch the convict's escaped partner.
A man fails a suicide attempt and is haunted by three ghosts who ask him to release their souls.
Sebuah kisah penyesalan seorang bapa terhadap sejarah hidup dan keluarganya yang akhirnya mengundang penderitaan sepanjang hayatnya.
After falling for a pretty art teacher who has no short-term memory, a marine veterinarian has to win her over again every single day.
52Hz, I Love You comprises various love stories set in modern Taipei City on Valentine's Day.
The international custody battle over six-year old Elian Gonzalez triggers a political earthquake in Miami-Dade County in 2000, swaying the outcome of the presidential election.
Suzi is content with being a third wife and living alone in her bungalow as she only entertains her husband every 6 days. Everything comes crashing when a person from her past returns to her life.
A South Korean soldier's winning lottery ticket flew across the Military Demarcation Line and fell into the hands of a North Korean soldier's hand. Cross-border negotiation now ensues!
Dared to prove that she can win a man's heart in a week, Adira must charm Joe's friend while fending off another man who is trying to win her heart.
Only 7 weeks left before the wedding date, various problems befell Amar and Syifa disturbing their preparation and challenge their love.
Seven people are being hunted by a serial killer and they all have one thing in common: they are cyber bullies.
Amir meets Sue on the highway and they then stop at 7 stops to get to know each other better. But their destination ended in surprise.
A spectacularly original story about the love between a down-on-his-luck businessman and a beautiful girl he meets at a highway rest stop who harbours a truly shocking secret.
A woman who tries recover her daughter becomes trapped in a bank assault.
Starring Michael Tse, Jeana Ho and Ken Hung, this suspenseful crime thriller follows a police operation to dismantle a notorious gang within 72 hours, based on a tip-off from an insider.

name: 76 Horror Bookstore: Tin Can of Fear

info.plot: The first installment from the 76 Horror Bookstore franchise is adapted from four unique online stories carefully curated and produced, written by the same author.

When a north Indian girl Anitha moves into Ravi's neighborhood, he falls head over heels in love with her and aggressively expresses interest. When she does not respond favorably, things get out of hand.
In 1980s Chicago, a ten-year-old boy sets out on an epic quest to get the Christmas gift of his generation - the latest and greatest video game system.
On the 8th anniversary of a terrible murder that left a small rural village horrified and bewildered, a similar homicide bearing the same pattern reoccurred, further deepening the mystery.
Inspired by a true story, four longtime friends, who are also diehard football fans, take a whirlwind trip to the 2017 Super Bowl to see their idol Tom Brady.
The story of two childhood friends who grew up mesmerized by the glitter and glamour of getai.
The incredible story of one of football's greatest triumphs: when, against all odds, Arsenal snatched the Championship title from Liverpool at Anfield in the last minute of the 1988-89 season.
Hanum and Rangga move to Vienna and encounter cultural challenges, but find strength in new friends and Islam's rich legacy across Europe.
Hanum and Rangga follow the trail of Europe's Islamic legacy in across Spain and Turkey.
Russell Crowe and Jennifer Connelly star in the true-to-life story of a brilliant mathematician. 'A Beautiful Mind'.
An HBO Original documentary of poems brought to life through lyrical animation and readings.
A clumsy and easily frightened man spends the night in a haunted mansion where a breathtaking ghost attempts to seduce him.

name: A Choice Of Weapons: Inspired By Gordon Parks

info.plot: Celebrating the legacy of trailblazing photographer Gordon Parks through the lens of contemporary artists influenced by his work.
A group of intrepid kids sets out to solve the case of a town's stolen Christmas treasure in this engaging holiday family caper.
The long-awaited follow-up to annual holiday favorite, "A Christmas Story." This time, Ralphie is all grown up and must deal with Christmas and all that comes with it…as a dad.
A teenage runaway takes part in a sleep study that becomes a nightmarish descent into the depths of her mind and a frightening examination of the power of dreams.
A series of comical events follow when a petty thief, a roguish security guard & a potty-mouthed woman find their lives intersecting one day over a lost gun & a heist.
This film focuses on three families with a child who has a serious mental illness, and the struggles of each to find appropriate treatment.
Joan Huntar, a real estate developer, bought an old summer camp. It turns out that the property was once inhabited by a group of rogues with a dark history.
A 50-something writer in a mid-existential crisis impulsively adopts a collie. The bond between him and the dog transforms in meaningful, unexpected ways.
A dog finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he meets.

name: A Family Is a Family Is a Family: A Rosie O'Donnell Celebration

info.plot: Rosie O'Donnell explores the diversity of families today while featuring original songs and thoughtful kids musing on love and family.
This rom com is about a young man who discovers his mother's wild, colourful & romantic past when he attempted to disprove his mother's absurd claims that a famous singer is his father.
The highest grossing Chinese movie in Hong Kong history, the story tells of a barrister who swears to prove his client's innocence, going against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong.

name: A Holly Jolly Malaysian Portuguese Christmas Ep01

info.plot: Comic artist Ernest Ng travels to Malacca's Portuguese Settlement to experience the Kristang culture and their unique Christmas celebrations.
A director of Christmas movies finds herself living in one in this holiday romantic comedy with a clever movie-within-a-movie twist.
A couple and their daughter visit a remote mansion in rural Louisiana for a getaway but the idyllic weekend soon takes a sinister turn as dark secrets test the family's fragile bond.
This epic depicts the romance between the Jade Emperor's seventh daughter and a young village man. When Heaven & Earth meet, can a common ground be found?
After being released from prison, a man learns that he has a daughter, thus wishes to leave the gangs and live an ordinary life. Yet the new leader of the gangs feels being betrayed.

name: A Million Ways to Die in the West

info.plot: When a mysterious and beautiful woman rides into town, she helps him find his courage and they begin to fall in love.
After suffering a stroke, a domestic helper announces that she wants to quit her job and move into an old people's home. Is this the end – or a fresh start?

name: A Star-spangled Story: Battle for America

info.plot: The Star-Spangled Banner is unfamiliar to many Americans. Let us revisit 1814, when British attack D.C., exploring the battle that inspired Francis Scott Key's poem, later transforming into the anthem.
The story follows Inez, who kidnaps her 6-year-old son from foster care in an attempt to reclaim their home, identity, and stability in a rapidly changing New York City.
A white supremacist entered a Pittsburgh synagogue and killed eleven congregants. This documentary exposes the hate-based crisis.
The Walton family enthusiastically prepares for the annual Harvest Festival Fair on Walton's Mountain in 1934, but a young boy's arrival dramatically changes their lives.

name: A Wish Made by Old Reddolf

info.plot: After meeting his long lost family, a grandfather goes on a journey to gather his estranged family for a final Christmas in their home where magic unfolds in their relationship.

name: A Witness Out of the Blue

info.plot: In this whodunit, a bumbling detective must rely on his only witness – a parrot, to help him catch the killer of an armed robber.
Six kids take a trip to the Grand Canyon, but instead find themselves in a whole other world.
A man who is searching for his daughter is tasked with assassinating a novelist, whose fantasy novel comes to life in the form of its young hero manifesting in real life.
From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Year's Eve.
Contemporary footage is used to capture the extraordinary period in the 1950s and 60s when hundreds of atomic bombs were dropped over the Nevada Test Site.
A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.
Explores how a layman is affected by the economics of politics and police power.
Aadhavan, a professional sharpshooter, gets a contract to kill Subramaniam, a prominent judge.
A couple's s life changes after discovering a magical box that shows their true intention and personality. Starring Yuvaraj and Pashini in lead roles.
Vijay, a police officer, has to protect his fiancée from his delusional brother, who wants to kill her because he believes she is their cruel stepmother.
Arivazhagan plans on leading a happy life by choosing an independent educated girl as his partner.
Aalwar, a priest disguises himself as gods to take revenge on the corrupted temple trustee who is responsible for the death of his mother and sister.

name: Aapkey Kamrey Mein Koi Rehta Hai

info.plot: Four bachelor friends are ecstatic when they find a fantastic apartment in the city at a bargain price, not knowing that they would be sharing their amazing new flat with a ghostly roommate.
Ashok, an honest officer, is on a mission to uncover the scam behind the fraudulent bulletproof vests supplied by a corrupt politician's company that led to his friend's death.
Aaru, henchmen of Nathan who seeks revenge when Nathan betrayed him by killing his friends for personal profit.
A man, with the aim of killing the person responsible for his family's murder, finds a girl with the similar history, and they both unite for the common aim.
Arjun's father lost while bringing the money for his dream project. Will he able to find what happened to his father?
When two men accidentally come across a thousand gold coins, their lives change forever and so do the lives of those around them.
Abaaya Sangili, a story that revolves around Tivya who escapes from her narcissist husband, Dev who's been gaslighting and psychologically abusing her.
Dira menghadapi cabaran untuk mengharungi kehidupan tanpa kehadiran seorang abah. Dira terpaksa menjaga ibunya yang kemurungan dan juga abangnya yang kurang membantu dalam segala hal.
Nizamuddin pemuda kacak, segak dan sado tapi lembab. Dia tidak mempunyai tujuan hidup hinggalah dia tertengok promo Pencetus Ummah dan bercita-cita menjadi Abang Beduk.
In order to free himself from the gangster's world, Fadil is given a last task deemed to be impossible by many – to take possession of Kampung Berani.
Fadil who is mistaken for Tiger, a professional assassin has to lead a life as one to prove his innocence while attempting to uncover Tiger's true identity.
Kisah seorang lelaki yang kehilangan segalanya selepas ditipu rakan niaganya, tapi diselamatkan oleh tas tangan 'ajaib' yang mempunyai jalan penyelesaian kepada semua masalah.
A love story that revolves around a dwarf who falls in love with a doctor but in order to marry her, he is required to fulfill certain obligations and there are rules.
When Thomas McKenzie meets two women who pique his interest, he learns that the love we are searching for is not always the true love that makes us whole.

Abu Hassan is a vagrant and a thief. During a procession in the city one day, he is stunned by the beauty of Princess Faridah. His dreams of meeting her personally comes true when he steals a magic cane…
Aurora returns to Malaysia after years in Europe under the care of her adoptive parents. In search of her true parentage, she finds herself also embarking on a religious journey.
Mariam has been depressed since her husband's death. She decided to celebrate Ramadan in Kuala Lumpur with her son, but a different atmosphere led her to accustom to her son's neighborhood.
A man discovers a photo of himself sleeping in his bed taken from a corner of his bedroom ceiling. Who or what had taken that photo? And why?
After Imran, a college student, is found dead in the dorm's water tank, Ady and Bakhtiar is accused of being responsible. But they insist that it was the fault of a mystical entity.
An emotional roller coaster presented with a touch of fantasy, the film revolves around a young man who embarks on a journey of love and self-discovery.

Berdasarkan kisah benar seorang guru Bahasa Inggeris yang berazam untuk menubuh kumpulan 'choral speaking' di sebuah sekolah yang mempunyai kemahiran Bahasa Inggeris dan pencapaian akademik yang rendah.
An illuminating tribute to actor and filmmaker Adrienne Shelly, celebrating her life and work while exploring thetragedy of her death.

At her father's funeral, a young girl has a quiet life upended by the sudden appearance of an uncle she has never met. The two of them are thrown together to fend for themselves, and against each other!

name: Adventures of Rufus - The Fantastic Pet

info.plot: Friends Scott and Emily, are at Scott's grandmother's home when they suddenly discover a mysterious creature Rufus and the wizard Abbot in a secret room.
A military officer cripples his arch-enemy for killing his friend and escapes with his sister.

"When two survivors of a bus crash awake to discover that they are the only people left in the town, they must unveil the truth behind their isolation. As events unfold, nothing really is as it seems."
When a high school girl is suspected of having jumped to her death from a bridge, her body cannot be found. Her best friend is suspected of instigating the suicide and becomes the target of bullying.

name: After Truth: Disinformation and the Cost of Fake News

info.plot: Filmmaker Andrew Rossi examines the rising phenomenon of fake news and how it impacts the average citizen in the United States.
A biopic about the avant-garde artist Wladyslaw Strzeminski, who battled Stalinist orthodoxy and his own physical impairments to advance his progressive ideas about art.
A heartwarming story exploring the imagination and creativity of a young boy as he tries to invent his own Astro dish after viewing live telecast of 1996 Olympics.
A rejected CIA analyst turns into a super soldier with the ability to communicate with aliens when he is exposed to an ancient 'dust' and is trained to defend Planet Earth!
When a crane operator starts controlling illegal trades at the harbor, he winds up clashing with another gangster
Story of a man who is not satisfied at all with his current life, even though he is living in luxury. Other than greed, the film also tells the story of love, loss and revenge.
Documentary about the life of Giovanni "Gianni" Agnelli, an influential Italian industrialist and principal shareholder of Fiat.
When a person loses her entire family to an accident, it leads her to a disorder along with hallucination and depression.
A psychic reader and a medium are invited to a party. A mistake causes something to come over from the other side to haunt the party. They must solve the mystery before it is too late.
In this high-grossing Singaporean comedy directed by Jack Neo, a spoiled rich kid is enlisted for National Service and learns alongside his mates the importance of military training.
Ken and his band of brothers return to serve the nation again, with Ken determined to change & prove himself a better man. However, his mates feel otherwise, causing tension among them.

Mashood believes his wealth comes from his father, not the Almighty. His daughter, Mastura disagrees. Insulted, he marries off his outspoken daughter to a poor villager, Syawal, to teach her a lesson.

This story is about a father's journey to help his disturbed blind 7 year old daughter which leads to the unveiling of ancient Hindu histories of the Indus culture millenniums ago linking to Lord Murugan.
Yamuna, a journalist, is haunted by a vengeful spirit when she visits her grandmother in a remote village.
A Malaysian thriller that tells the story of a group of people who are all connected by their own unique visions.
A neighborhood is plagued by mysterious tragedies when a young man becomes the conduit for an unknown spirit, the "Aiyai," which lures victims to their chilling fates.
After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.
Filem komedi klasik mengenai seorang suami yang miang cuba untuk memikat seorang wanita yang bekerja di sebuah kelab malam.
Azhar is a deaf young man who falls in love at first sight with a mysterious girl named Sarah. However, Azhar remains distant despite his feelings as Sarah did not seem to care for him.
Farisa is a girl looks tomboyish, but in heart fills with love when she engages in a love triangle with her schoolmates.
Dalam misi pencarian 'Superbibik', Ina mengadakan temu ramah ala-ala pencarian bintang realiti tv dan hanya mereka yang benar layak dan memenuh kriteria yang diingini akan dipilih.
Seorang despatch yang jatuh cinta kepada anak majikannya, berusaha memenuhi permintaan wanita tersebut demi memenangi hatinya.
Personality clash between roommates is bringing chaos into Thaqif's life as a college student and a dorm resident.

Usop dreams of being a soldier as he is embarassed by his family's generations of postmen. But he becomes a postman after Fauziah's father rejected his proposal out of scorn for his father's occupation.

name: Aku Posmen, Kau Latifah, Dia Joseph

info.plot: A story about mistaken identity that leads to confusion. Latifah mistaken Joseph as her late fiancée Yusof the army. One day the truth prevailed but not as rosy as Latifah's imagination.
Silah bercita-cita untuk menjadi pelawak terkenal di kampungnya namun kurang berjaya. Tetapi dia tetap mendapat sokongan padu daripada anak lelakinya.
Seorang gadis pernah diculik dan diseksa sewaktu kecil. Tidak mampu melupakan kisah silamnya sehingga dewasa, dia merancang untuk membalas dendam terhadap semua orang yang pernah menzalimi dirinya.
Pergolakan rumahtangga Johan dan Arlisa selepas Johan mengalami kemalangan jalan raya. Adakah rumahtangga yang dibina akan kekal bahagia atau hancur akibat tragedi ini?

Apabila tunang yang garang tiba-tiba berubah menjadi seorang wanita yang lemah lembut, maka Amar jatuh cinta kembali pada tunangnya, Faz. Namun tanpa disedari sebenarnya alien telah menakluk jasad Faz

name: Al Morir La Matinee Aka Red Screening

info.plot: The rain is pouring. The only refuge is a near-empty old cinema. Where a murderous maniac is on the prowl.
Documentary explores the story of a Pentecostal minister, accused of attempting to murder his wife with a rattlesnake in Scottsboro, Alabama. Based on true events.
Vichu, a Hindu boy, and Mary, a Christian girl, fall in love with each other. However, when Vichu asks for Mary's hand in marriage, her brother arranges for her to marry someone else.
Fakhrul and Kudin, two robbers, are given a little thieving troll by Pak Umar. Sadly, their troll is not very good as a thief.
A police officer is torn between putting away a suspect in a mysterious disappearance, and seeking the suspect's help to save his own son from torment.

name: Alemi Cin AKA Zone Of The Djinn

info.plot: A young woman starts having nightmares about her family. With the help of a friend, she must face the world of jinns.

name: Ali & Cavett: The Tale of the Tapes

info.plot: The life and times of Muhammad Ali, as shown through the lens of his numerous appearances on The Dick Cavett Show.

One day, when he is gathering firewood, Ali Baba who is poor spots a group of thieves marching towards a cave carrying loot. He enters the cave after they leave and discovers a variety of riches & wealth…
Ali seorang mahasiswa sering mengusik pelajar lain termasuklah Asmidar yang kerap menjadi mangsanya. Namun perasaan Asmidar bencikan Ali akhirnya bertukar menjadi cinta.
Sebuah kisah tentang sekumpulan makhluk asing yang terhempas di bumi dan cuba mencari jalan pulang. Pelbagai kejadian pelik dan asing terpaksa mereka harung supaya dapat mencari jalan penyelesaian.

Aliff mewarisi saka daripada nenek moyangnya yang membolehkannya melihat dan melawan entiti paranormal tetapi lebih kerap dia menggunakannya, lebih kuat saka itu dan lebih lemah Aliff dapat mengawalnya.
Two brothers run a bird hospital rescuing injured black kites that drop daily from New Delhi's smog-choked skies.
A little girl is rescued from an orphanage by a mysterious woman who turns her into vampire. Now, she has to learn to live in profound and painful loneliness, trapped inside her childhood body.
A riveting behind-the-scenes look at President Lyndon B. Johnson's tumultuous first year in office in the wake of President Kennedy's assassination.
A dysfunctional family comes together for the holidays for the first time since their mother's death.

Siamese twins Pim and Ploy made a pact to stick together for life but only Pim survives the surgery to separate them. On a visit back home, Pim is haunted by the ghost of Ploy. Repressed trauma resurfaces.
An ambitious achiever falls in love with an unfocused biology student. Eight years after breaking up, they meet and fall in love again.
Ah Kiao meets a handsome coffee shop worker, which threatens to distract her from her dream.
Having fallen in love with a blind telemarketer and realizing her blindness was his fault, a former boxer decides to fight in an underground fighting contest to earn money for her surgery.
Comedian/actor Amanda Seales, well-known for her role in Insecure, stars in her first HBO stand-up special, taped in front of a live audience at the Edison Ballroom in New York City.
Amaran is loved by everyone in the village as they look up to him as their very own 'Robin Hood'. Watch how unfortunate series of events end up making Amaran lose his closed one's
A crook is asked by an ex-gang leader to hold the commissioner's daughter captive for two days to ruin the family's honor. The girl while captive falls in love with the crook, but he rejects her.
Six weeks pre-D-Day, UK, US, and Canadian soldiers rehearsed the Normandy invasion, leading to a perilous dress rehearsal. Explore the investigation into how this exercise turned disastrous.
America's Treasures is inspired by the National Museum of American History's special exhibit of 150 of the most unique objects in the Smithsonian's collection.
In 1970s America, a detective works to bring down the drug empire of Frank Lucas, a heroin kingpin from Manhattan, who is smuggling the drug into the country from the Far East.
During the SARS outbreak in 2003, a teenage girl struggle to adjust to life in Taipei after returning from LA, due to her mother's sickness & her younger sister's misdiagnoses with SARS.
Tom Cruise stars in an international escapade based on the outrageous, true exploits of hustler and pilot recruited to run one of the biggest covert operations in the U.S
American Pain is the story of the greatest drug racket to hit the Sunshine State since the cocaine cowboys of the 1980s.
A vacation home in Fall River, Massachusetts, has a sinister past. And now it houses a deadly poltergeist.
After visiting a supposedly haunted forest, a teen girl comes to believe that a violent poltergeist has followed her home and is stalking her.
Sniper Chris Kyle is a hero on the battlefield but the darkness of war takes a devastating toll on him and his family.
An inventive film that documents the mundane tribulations, random experiences and cultural enthusiasms that makes up Pekar's day-to-day existence in Cleveland, Ohio.

name: Americans Underground - Secret City Of WWI

info.plot: An amazing discovery has been made beneath a farm field in Northern France: a vast underground city where World War I soldiers took refuge a century ago.
Desperate to escape the Brotherhood, the gang they once so admired, two criminals discover that they have a far more dangerous threat to worry about.

Amshar was nicknamed Asha by her mother. Every month they seek treatment at a specialist hospital. Various accusations were thrown until Asha was very depressed, but he remained steadfast to be himself.
An ex-soldier is offered a place to live in a dilapidated house inhabited by a young woman and her dying mother. As the days goes by, he begins to sense that something sinister is going on.

name: An American Girl: Chrissa Stands Strong

info.plot: When Chrissa moves to a new school in the middle of the year, she is greeted by the girls in her fourth-grade class with teasing and tricks.
Feeling like her life has plateaued, a young woman finds herself unexpectedly spending the holiday with her ex and her eccentric family.
Based on a true story, Ana, is diagnosed with cancer as a child, motivating her parents to try to fulfill her last request.
Anais is a pastry chef in her thirties that is having a heartbreak for the first time in her life and having difficulties controlling her emotions.
Anak merupakan cerita tentang kesusahan dan rintangan yang dilalui oleh Amir dan Intan dalam perkahwinan mereka yang belum dikurniakan zuriat.
Two young women have just moved into a new house in the city but they are incessantly harassed by a boy of about 5 years and the two women cannot grasp the meaning behind all these disturbances.

Harun is heavily in debt and to pay off the debts, he has to lie to his father saying that he needs the money to get married. So when his father pays him a visit, Harun has to borrow his driver's wife.

Kerana rindukan atok dan neneknya, Adam pulang ke kampung walaupun dilarang keras oleh ibunya. Kepulangan Adam disambut oleh 'sesuatu' yang menjadi punca mengapa Adam dilarang pulang ke kampung selama ini.
The story of a beautiful woman who is admired by many men, but has been hiding a secret for a long time.
The movie is about love between a man and a woman, dreams that can come true and a father`s extreme love for his son.
A heart throbbing story of Veeramah who stayed at old folk home and render her service to unfortunate people.
A beautiful loving family broken up by the husband's affair. He goes on a rollercoaster ride of love, lust, pain and tears.
Anbarasu, an ad-filmmaker, goes to Bhubaneshwar on a business trip and gets stranded at an airport due to heavy rains.
A love story between two interesting characters who share a passion for food and cooking.
A weak-willed girl has to deal with a mystical disturbance caused by a grandmother's heirloom stone mortar.

name: And Just Like That... The Documentary

info.plot: A one-off documentary, chronicling how the new chapter of the beloved hit series "Sex And The City", came to be.

A teenager accidentally murders a man he wrongfully believed was assaulting his girlfriend. 25 years later, the only witness of the crime resurfaces without warning, dredging up painful forgotten memories.
A food delivery guy finds himself captivated by Subbu's charm. However, their lives take a tumultuous turn when a series of unexpected events unfold, plunging them into a chaotic world.
Seorang wanita berada dalam koma setelah kemalangan jalan raya dan dalam keadaan tidak sedar itu, dia didatangi penampakan seorang lelaki yang meminta bantuan tentang jin yang mengganggu keluarganya.
Reeling from her parent's divorce, Denise begrudgingly celebrates CNY with her mother and widowed grandmother when she comes across a magical red pen that grants wishes.
The film revolves around mysterious events that unfold in a forest resort during a twelve-hour investigation in a non-linear play.
Angah, a disabled person, is pregnant out of wedlock without anyone knowing who is the father of the child. The unfortunate tragedy continued to befall Angah until he was gone forever.
Jiman a village youngster has failed many times in business who later got the idea to do traditional medicine business but has received opposition from Tok Mat.
An HBO Original Movie, Angel Rodriguez tells the tale of Nicole, a social worker, and her relationship with Angel, a bright but troubled inner-city teen.
Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon continues to work to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican.
When Tess and her mother move to a new town, she begins to have terrifying visions of a girl who was killed in a car accident. Soon, Tess's mind, body and soul are taken over.
The film follows a disabled man who arrives in Mumbai looking for his gangster brother and learns of the events behind his disappearance
A vintage children's doll becomes a conduit for evil after a young couple is terrorized by a satanic cult.
A nun and several girls from a shuttered orphanage become the target of a possessed doll.
A village bumpkin poses as a Mafia don to uncover the gang.
Velan feels happy when his sister, Lakshmi, marries Selvam, a police officer.
Ramanujam, who suffers from multiple personality disorder, works as a lawyer by day and a vigilante at night. He uses tips from the 'Garuda Purana' as his tools to expose various antisocial elements.

Eddie Murphy and Nick Nolte star in this sequel to the 48 HOURS in which a hard-bitten San Francisco cop, the prime suspect in a shooting, is forced to re-team with an ex-con in order to clear his name.
A love story about two people who fall in love but are violently torn apart only to be reunited through tragedy again.
It follows the story of Rahul (Aayush Sharma), a youngster from a small-town, who ends up becoming one of the most dreaded land mafias in Pune.
A bereaved Satanist couple kidnap a pregnant woman so they can use an ancient spellbook to put their dead grandson's spirit into her unborn child but end up summoning more than they bargained for.
Dhayalan, a friendly father, encourages his son to pursue his dreams. In contrast, Singaperumal imposes his own perspective on his son
Appalasamy promises his late wife that he will take good care of their daughter which causes him to become an overprotective father.

A seasoned journalist is requested by the Vatican to investigate reports of visitations by the Virgin Mary. But he ends up uncovering uncomfortable realities that shake his faith in god and men alike.
Two elderly people fall in love with each other at an old-age home.
A story of friendship among eight girls and boys.
A young woman believes her neighbours' odd behaviour has something to do with the spate of strange deaths in the area. She soon finds out the frightening secret behind it all.
The Aqua Teens split up then get back together to fight everyone's favorite corporate overlord, Amazin, led by everyone's favorite tech mogul, Neil.
Arthur Curry finds out that he is the heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis. With this new knowledge, he not only will have to step up to lead his people but also become a hero to the world.
Having failed to defeat Aquaman the first time, Black Manta, still driven by the need to avenge his father's death, will stop at nothing to take Aquaman down once and for all.
Unable to find a medicine that can cure her brother of his disease, Nihal turns to spell books instead, and comes across the Book of Kitab'ul Azazil.
A large family returns to an ancestral property (palace) to sell it off. Meanwhile they discover some supernatural elements in the palace.
At a remote and mysterious palace, a man falls in love with a woman who's guarded by angry spirits
Thirunavukkarasu, a soft-spoken man, has two good-natured parents who are involved in the upliftment of society.
An injured hunter and a married couple are trapped inside a claustrophobic tent by a supernatural threat.

Kidnapped teenagers find themselves the stars of a reality horror show, where a shadowy figure traps them one by one to play the twisted and terrifying games of death, as he exacts his revenge on them.
A group of people breaks into Area 51, where they find terrifying proof of alien presence.
An exfiltration specialist masquerades as a Hollywood producer in order to rescue six Americans who are held captive in Tehran during the US hostage crisis in Iran.
A Kabaddi player turns saviour for women who are trapped and sexually exploited by a notorious gangster
Arjun Varma is a young surgeon with functioning alcoholism and a furious temper.
A young Jewish-American boy befriends an African-American classmate and begins to struggle with expectations from his family after growing up in a world of privilege, inequality and prejudice.
When 12 alien spacecraft land around the world, a linguistics expert and a theoretical physicist are recruited by the US military to obtain the answer to one question: "What do they want?"
This documentary delves into the life and character of Arthur Miller through the lens of his daughter.
Fammy meminta Jay Johan untuk menculik sepupunya Amira yang bakal dikahwinkan dengan suami orang tanpa menyedari Amira adalah presiden kelab 'haters' Jay Johan.
Arul, the youngest of four brothers, faces the wrath of his father as he takes the blame for a mistake committed by one of his siblings.
A private investigator accidentally becomes a vigilante as he tries to save his friend & family who are abducted by a dangerous militant group that is going to release a chemical bomb.
When a young woman named Rasty takes four of her friends for a vacation at her parents villa, strange events begin to happen after they invite a little girl to join them.
An epidemiologist tried to satisfy her obsession with food when she was assigned to investigate a bird flu case.
Arunachalam, the son of a prominent village elder, discovers the truth about his past.
Nirmala, a young woman who wants to become a nun, unexpectedly falls in love with Muthuvel.
A novelist is visited in her nightmares by the restless spirit of a broken woman. But the nightmares soon turn real.
A satirical comedy about a community of flat residents who have to work together to bring down the remains of Nordin's father from the 25th floor after his sudden death.
A romantic adventure in which Rosalind and Orlando's celebrated courtship is against a backdrop of political rivalry, banishment and exile.
Jeon Yoo-Kyung works together with Special Forces agent, Jo In-chang, to stop Baekdu Mountain's volcano eruptions from destroying North and South Korea.
A disillusioned speech therapist entering a child's world to heal her, also finds himself healing in an unpredictable turn of events.
When the young and seductive Katie decides to take a year off before college, she starts chronicling her sexual adventures in an anonymous blog that exposes her innermost desires, shames and secrets.
A group of vloggers discover an evil presence while exploring an abandoned British mansion that was once owned by a mysterious archaeologist

name: At the Heart of Gold: Inside the USA Gymnastics Scandal

info.plot: A new documentary about the sexual abuse scandal that shook the sports world in 2017.
A police officer, investigating the death of another officer, uncovers a bigger secret than he had anticipated.
Probing the devastating impact of the illegal dumping of radioactive waste in North St. Louis communities, the moms-turned-advocates fight for answers.
In her first HBO special, comedian Atsuko Okatsuka reveals how her unconventional upbringing perfectly prepared her for a repeated household intruder.
Upon learning that his father has been kidnapped, Austin Powers must travel to 1975 and defeat the aptly named villain Goldmember, who is working with Dr. Evil.

name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me

info.plot: Dr. Evil returns from space just as British spy Austin Powers learns on his honeymoon that his wife, Vanessa is a fembot under Dr Evil's control.
Siblings Naveen and Gowri find themselves in chaos and danger with a looming life threat which unravels a mysterious quest to uncover the identity of Rajni.
Divya keeps rejecting Jeeva's love due to her dreadful past with her husband, which she later reveals to him.
In the pursuit of solving an ancient mystery of Amaravati, Narayana, a corrupt cop must battle the dangerous clan of dacoits. Cast : Chandrajith
Mateen falls in love with a girl who is phobic about people from Terengganu. With Teja's help, Mateen pretends to be from Kuala Lumpur.
Samantha returns to her hometown to find out if her father did indeed kill her mother. But the more she uncovers, the more sinister the town becomes.
Dua gadis jelita di sebuah kampung mencari calon suami yang mampu membimbing dan menjadi imam mereka selepas berkahwin. Pelbagai usaha dilakukan jejaka-jejaka yang ingin memenangi hati mereka.
In Karla's desperation to cure her brother of Fatal Familial Insomnia, she agrees to take part in an experimental treatment in an abandoned hospital.
When two siblings have difficulty taking care of their senile father, they explore ideas, and come up with solutions.
Tuan Borhan belum pernah dapat merasa bagaimana rasanya menjadi seorang ayah tiba-tiba terfikir untuk melakukan sesuatu yang "gila".
Ustaz Muiz dan isterinya mengajar ajaran sesat dan mahu pengikutnya mengikut telunjuk mereka. Lama kelamaan, pengikutnya bernama Kamal mula merasa sangsi.
A corrupt police officer finds his life changing when he takes on a case of gang rape.
Krishnasamy becomes rich by indulging in illegal activities, but his wife and daughter, Amudha, leave him due to his work.
The movie highlights Vijay's first-ever dual role in his career portraying both an MBA student and a womanizing, money-minded character who happens to look like him.
Baba is an atheist who always questions the higher power. A turn of events bestows Baba with divine powers.

name: Baba Yaga: Terror of the Dark Forest

info.plot: Egor notices that the new nanny is acting strange, but no one seems to believe him. Finally, the nanny disappears, along with his little sister. But his parents do not even remember that he had a sister!
The story of the film is based on UP, where a well to do family had always dreamt of their son's wedding with great pomp and show.

Hidup dua sekawan yang masih bujang berubah apabila terpaksa menjaga bayi yang tidak diketahui asal-usulnya. Mampukah mereka menjaga bayi itu? Dan berjayakah mereka memulangkan bayi itu kepada ibubapanya?

Baby is a talented getaway driver who relies on the beat of his personal soundtrack to be the best. He gets involved in a doomed heist that threatens his life after being forced to work for a crime boss.
Infamous fertility expert Dr. Quincy Fortier secretly used his own sperm to inseminate his patients. Now his biological children seek the truth about his motives.
Mami Jarum is back! and this time Mami is making sure her grand-daughter Asyikin will marry the man of her choosing, however Asyikin has a better plan (or worse!) for herself.
The tightly scripted world of a vlogger and influencer unravels after she becomes a mother.
Two grand-theft-auto and best friends Adam & Hatim discovered a baby at the back seat of a stolen car. Keen to avoid detection, they take care of the baby while figuring out how to return the baby

A silent film superstar, a young starlet, a production executive, and a musical sensation strive to stay on top of the 1920s Hollywood scene while maintaining relevance in an industry ready to move on to t
A carefree young man gets into a live-in relationship with his colleague, and gets her pregnant. What happens next?
Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must return to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to his life in 1985.
Marty McFly travels to 1885 to rescue Doc Brown and put the past, present and future on track so they can all get back to where - and when - they belong.
Backkom Bear is an agent known for his bad luck. To earn the respect of his agency, he tries to capture an alien monster but they somehow end up becoming friends & even save the universe together.
A rivalry between members of a fraternity house and their quiet neighbours escalates into all-out war.
Badang is a very unusual and very powerful person after he uses water ghost vomit. Even though he's strong there are certain things he can't do because of promises.

Four medical students breach professional ethics while conducting an anatomical inspection on a cadaver that had been a mid-wife. As a result of their behaviour, they must face the wrath of her ghost.
Helmi dan isterinya menyaksikan satu kemalangan jalan raya yang meragut nyawa seorang wanita berselendang merah dan tragedi ini bakal membawa kehancuran dalam hidup mereka.
When a kickboxer gets attacked by his enemies and ends up bedridden, his brother sets out to fulfil his dream of winning the kickboxing championship.
As Wak and his friends plan to rob a pawnshop's owner who refuses Wak to redeem his grandmother's brooch, they fall into a trap where someone else has a better plan hence stealing their thunders.
A man investigates a disturbing ring of young escorts, cyber harassment and suicide. He knows the importance of parents being aware of their children's problems.

A trapeze artist must decide between her lust for Sergio, the Happy Clown, or her affection for Javier, the Sad Clown, both of whom are deeply disturbed. A grotesque portrayal of fascism and its effects.
Kisah empat orang remaja yang telah menjadi musuh sejak sekian lama di lapangan balapan acara pecut 100meter peringkat daerah Selangor dan akhirnya menjadi sahabat seperjuangan.
A failed businesswoman decides to learn from a millionaire in Bali on how he becomes rich.
Tiga orang musuh sepejabat yang terpaksa bekerjasama untuk mencari jalan pulang beraya di kampung tahun ini.
Baltimore Rising follows activists, police officers, community leaders and gang affiliates, who struggle to hold Baltimore together in the wake of Freddie Gray's death in police custody.

Two former schoolmates reunite, fall in love and decide to get married. But an embarrassing incident forces Ryota to confess to Fumiko that he sees dead people. Things start to get even worse for Ryota.
Three cousins - Divya, Kuttan and Arjun, fulfill their childhood dreams of relocating to Bangalore. As they embrace the warmth of the city, they also face challenges that transform their lives.
A village being terrorized by a demon. This terror was caused by residents who performed pesugihan (ritual to get rich). The head of the hamlet and other residents tried to get rid of this terror.
About 3 best friends, Danny, Boy and Adam who doing paranormal-related activities at secluded places in order to confirm the existence of ghosts.
The film follows Barbie and Ken embarking on a journey of self-discovery in the real world following an existential crisis.
Greta Gerwig talks you through the making of Barbie!
Kerana kuih batang buruk, seorang atuk dan dua cucunya telah mula mengenali tentang cinta dan penerimaan apabila mereka terpaksa beraya tanpa nenek kesayangan di sisi.
Batman of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.

name: Batman and Superman: Battle of the Super Sons

info.plot: Jonathan Kent and Damian Wayne must join forces to rescue their fathers and save the planet from impending doom by becoming the super heroes they were meant to be.
Following the murder of his parents, Bruce Wayne trains with a shadowy organization and returns to Gotham City to fight crime under a new guise.
Batman must battle Two-Face and The Riddler with help of an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.
The physically deformed criminal genius The Penguin threatens Gotham City - and, helpless, the entire city can only pray that Batman Returns.

name: Batman vs. Superman: Dawn of Justice

info.plot: Criminal mastermind Lex Luthor manipulates Batman into a preemptive battle with Superman, whom Luthor is obsessed with defeating.

name: Batman: The Doom That Came to Gotham

info.plot: During an encounter with the Penguin, Bruce finds out that a doomsday cult is planning Gotham City's destruction, bringing with it actual ancient magic, fiery demons and interdimensional Old Gods.
When a suspect is caught and brutally questioned by the cops Pugazh discovers that he is a heart patient with a pacemaker and saves him.

name: Battle of Midway: The True Story

info.plot: An inside look at the Battle of Midway, the aircraft used on both sides of the fight, and the dramatic story of one fighter pilot and his pivotal role in America's first true victory of the Pacific War.
Okinawa was the site of the last battle of the war of the 20th century. Military cameramen risked their lives to film the conflict, from brutal land combat to fierce kamikaze attacks at sea.
A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.
Dua beradik kehilangan ibu mereka ketika mereka kecil lagi. Kerana rajuk seorang ibu yang kempunan telur ikan tembakul, dia rela dimakan oleh batu belah batu bertangkup.
Pak Ali has two wives, Labu and Kundor. As a result of his first and second marriage they were blessed with children named Bawang Merah and Bawang Putih.
Pak Mat is trying to find husbands for his two daughters fearing they would be old spinsters, he runs an audition causing further chaos.
A crime photographer often takes pictures of the sightings of strange entities such as giving a clue of an old case that still hangs in mystery without an answer.
Adapted from a South Korean movie, this drama tells the tale of two laid-off workers, Shi Zhen Bang and Yang Wu, who initially set out to collect debts but ended up adopting the debtor's daughter.
Three students, itching to find out what destiny has in store for them, agree to tarot readings. The wicked workings of fate can hardly prepare them for the grisly horrors that await.
The bumbling Mr. Bean travels to America when he is given the responsibility of bringing a highly valuable painting to a Los Angeles museum.
Based on true events, Tracey Deer's debut feature chronicles the 78-day standoff between two Mohawk communities and government forces in 1990 in Quebec.
Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster.
A recently widowed father and his daughters return to South Africa on a trip to a game reserve, only to find themselves hunted by a rogue lion intent on proving that there is but one apex predator.
A Hollywood director accidentally kills his actor and has to find an exact duplicate to proceed with the filming. To do that, he must agree to an evil pact which unleashes ferocious beasts onto L.A.
Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.
Starring Kwai Lun-Mei, Chen Kun & more, this movie is about a successful female lawyer who is forced to take on a new role as a housewife after an unfortunate accident on a highway.
Two young lovers face ancient magic spells and curses in order to be together forever.
This beautiful road movie is a refreshing take on horror, featuring the unique journey of a man on the run from the law, and a zombie on the run from her violent past.
This HBO Documentary chronicles the philanthropic billionaire's evolution from an ambitious, numbers-obsessed boy into one of the richest, most respected men in the world.
When a pediatrician at a historic children's hospital run by a church begins to comfort a sobbing child, she unintentionally opens up a portal into old secrets and a horrifying history.
Trapped and forced to face her past and the supernatural, Julie fights to protect herself and her unborn baby.
Barry, a bee, finds working with honey is uninspiring. On a trip outside the hive, Barry breaks rule and develops a bond with Vanessa, a human. He discovers humans eat honey and decides to sue them.
Beebo and his friends travel to the North Pole to help discover what truly makes Christmas meaningful.
A desperate mother, a sick child, an abandoned hospital.
Far away in the forbidden forest of Borneo, live the indigenous Dayak people. Their village has been attacked by zombies. The battle between the fierce Dayak warriors and zombies has begun.
Based on the Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, this film depicts how a woman, who caused her brother's death, finds herself haunted by his vengeful spirit on returning to their family home.
Desperate to save her ailing father, Belle surrenders herself to become a prisoner to a vicious beast in return for a miraculous red rose.
In WWII, the US submarine, USS Tiger Shark, picks up three survivors. With the intruders and crew trapped in the sub's constricted spaces, a series of chilling, otherworldly occurrences is set off.

Kisah seorang ayah dan anaknya yang tidak sehaluan. Setelah berlaku pergaduhan besar, mereka bagaimanapun bertukar badan. Ianya mengelirukan dan berlaku huru-hara dalam kehidupan mereka yang sedia rumit.

Nisa yang baru sedar dari koma dihantar ke sebuah sekolah berasrama oleh makciknya. Disitu dia sering mengalami kejadian aneh dan kejadian itu ada kaitan dengan sebuah pohon beringin misteri di sekolah itu
Kisah Umar dan Fatimah yang mengidap barah tahap 4. Keadaan itu menyebabkan mereka cuba menghabiskan sisa-sisa hidup mereka demi mendapatkan keredhaan Ilahi.
An HBO Original which explores a relationship that took place behind closed doors between a rich heiress and her butler.
Pengorbanan seorang bapa yang terpaksa bekerja keras demi melihat anak-anaknya berjaya.
The story of legendary blues singer Bessie Smith's transformation from a struggling young singer into one of the most successful recording artists of the 1920s.

A lazy thirty-something is happy to sit out the zombie apocalypse in his fortified suburban abode, until his wife acts on a more pragmatic strategy for survival, forcing him to become a zombie killer.
This special includes stirring readings from Ta-Nehisi Coates' book about growing up in Baltimore's tough inner city. Features documentary footage from the actors' home life and archival footage.
Varun, an NRI medical student, and Bhanu, a vivacious, young woman, fall in love with each other.
Bharath is framed for the murder of his elder brother by Gangadharan, a powerful businessman.
Sofia diberi tugas untuk memasarkan tudung mewah koleksi raya terbaru daripada pereka fesyen terkenal, Aisha Aminuddin dan dia juga perlu bekerjasama dengan Ketua Pereka syarikat bernama Mael Lambo.
Kisah percintaan dua remaja yang mempunyai latar belakang keluarga yang berbeza. Randy Pangalila digandingkan dengan Elfira Loy dalam kisah romantis.
Milah yang terlalu berharap untuk berkahwin, akhirnya menemui jodoh secara tiba-tiba. Lakonan Didie Alias, Hairul Azreen dan Nabila AF.
Seorang gadis yang terperangkap di antara dua dunia percintaan, sebuah cinta suci dari alam realiti dan juga cinta yang penuh misteri dan kehitaman dari alam mistik.
Berdasarkan Syair Bidasari merupakan satu kesusasteraan Melayu klasik bergenre syair romantik yang amat popular dalam masyarakat Melayu abad ke-18 dan ke-19.

Following an incident that befalls his best friend, a former football player has to take over as coach for the women's football team that the friend has been coaching and struggles to lead them to victory.
3 brothers having the urge to come up in life are suddenly stuck in between a rival gang fight. Determined to succeed they show another side of themselves and brave through victory.
A man earns a living by taking beautiful young women to be abandoned on a mountain. One day, his ugly wife finds out what he has really been up to.
Kisah tentang pengembaraan Bidin dan geng motosikalnya ke Thailand yang berdepan dengan pelbagai konflik dan tragedi.
With the help of his friends, Eddy and Aidil, Bidin tries to solve both his romance problem and his enemy problem.
A movie star aspiring to be a movie producer, a long-suffering director, and his film crew are plagued with trouble and shenanigans while shooting a film.
The sudden presence of a little girl in a man's life raises thousands of questions, yet it also blossoms into a pretty special relationship.
A village bumpkin poses as a Mafia don to uncover the gang.
Lydia dan Rudy telah pun berkahwin. Lydia nak anak walaupun Rudy belum bersedia lagi. Perangai Lydia makin menjadi- jadi apabila mengikut hukum hakam dari kakiberamal.com.
The story of famous singers who gets an invitation to perform for a corporate event but unfortunately everything turns chaotic when they are chased by zombies that hit the area.
A group of students decide to reveal the behavior of an award winning director whom was classified as mentally ill.

During a decade of violence that saw the drug trade take root in Colombia, an indigenous family becomes entangled in a deadly war to take control of the lucrative business, destroying their own culture.
Harley Quinn joins forces with a singer, an assassin and a police detective to help a young girl who had a hit placed on her after she stole a rare diamond from a crime lord.

Wak Selamat struggles to see his daughter who is hooked to a life support machine in a hospital in Australia after she met with an accident but he never travelled overseas nor he has the money to do so.

The son of a biscuit maker grows up to become a worker in the company that his dead father founded. One say, a guardian angel walks into his life, and tells him stories that change his life for the better.
After a tumultuous decade-long career filled with injuries and missed opportunities, 38-year-old UFC middleweight Michael Bisping finally got his due, and he plans to go out swinging.
Garment factory workers who labour for more than 12 hours a day and spend their any free time they have mulling over the value of their work and existence, in this documentary about China today.

Nearly 5,000 years have passed, Black Adam has gone from man to myth to legend. Now free, his unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society.

name: Black Art: In the Absence of Light

info.plot: Inspired by the work of the late artist and curator David Driskell, this illuminating documentary spotlights the indelible contributions of some of the foremost African American artists.
Unwilling to become victims to the killings of a stalker, a group of sorority girls put up a fight to end this charade once and for all.
A doctor's hand is severed in a bizarre accident but her lover manages to reattach it using a new technology. But there are unexpected consequences.
American soldiers get a brutal education when a mission gone awry results in the US military's biggest firefight since Vietnam. Directed by Ridley Scott.
A girl finds among the trees a mysterious cubic device with the ability to change the past.

A psychotic killer is killing Russian-American women in Hollywood. The LAPD turns to Moscow for help. In comes Vladimir Kazatov, Russia's finest. He and LAPD cop Emily Smith become an unstoppable force.

An undercover agent awakens to find himself imprisoned on a submarine. With the help of a fellow prisoner and an amateur agent, he must race against the clock to escape the vessel & expose who set him up.
A government operative with a shadowy past discovers a plot targeting U.S. citizens, and finds himself in the crosshairs of the FBI director he once helped protect.
300 years after "47 Ronin," the battling Samurai clans still exist. A powerful force reunites them against a common evil who wants power for himself.
A blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner who's been missing for 30 years.
Blanka, a street urchin, wants to buy a mom, but meets a blind street musician who teaches her to sing.
While location-scouting for a film project, three students find themselves in a notoriously haunted apartment complex and meet the eccentric residents. Then, things go haywire for them.

A hardened special forces agent fights to protect a young woman from a sinister criminal gang then soon starts feeling a special connection to the young woman, as if they have met in a different life.
Two bickering single parents are stuck with each other when their families are forced to share a suite for a week at a resort.
While on a journey to recover his eyesight and magical powers, a blind shaman discovers the evil master plan of another wicked shaman and starts to question everything he has ever believed in.
The former SWAT captain, Dong Gu, suffers from visual loss after a failed mission. Gradually, he manages to adapt to his situation, until his nemesis appears, putting his daughter in danger.
A teenager learns to live life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of Bruce Springsteen during the austere days of Thatcher's Britain.
Horror and romance collide at a guesthouse, where various incidents come to a head on a very eventful BBQ night.
One of the main rules of the Valentine Blood institution is not to fall in love. However, Rinrada falls in love with Sun, which makes Chris decide to get rid of Sun.

Ann is a recently widowed mother whose son is brutally murdered. The detective assigned to the case doesn't pay it much attention, prompting her to stalk a group of Brooklyn gangsters to uncover the truth.
An ancient relic with alien biotechnology known as The Scarab chooses Jaime Reyes to be its symbiotic host, bestowing him with a suit of armor with extraordinary powers
The cricket captains of Arakkonam, Ranjith and Rajesh, ignite a rivalry that ruins their chances of playing when politics interferes..
A group of alien treasure hunters has arrived on earth and kidnapped Ochobot. BoBoiBoy and his super friends must now race against time to save Ochobot and uncover the secrets behind the Sfera Kuasa.
BoBoiBoy and his friends must find a way to defeat the ancient villain who is chasing after them to take back his elemental powers.
Trust can be as dangerous as it is necessary for survival in this bold spy thriller about CIA's hunt for the mastermind of terrorist attacks.
A young man who has lost his way in life gets a chance to start over when he rescues a damsel in distress. They soon head for disaster when it turns out that she is no ordinary young woman.
Kisah tentang dua remaja, Amy dan Tasya yang menjadi mangsa kerakusan kekejaman manusia berhati binatang.
An examination of America's oldest law enforcement agency: The Postal Inspection Service.
Akash and Sana facing few mysterious incident and what will happen when they got to know that everything is because a doll.
Dimas and Jean survived the Devil Dolls tragedy in 2007. They think all the dolls had been destroyed. But to their shock, one of the dolls survived to cause a reign of terror.

An eerie family drama, an inescapable curse. This is the story of a religious but broken family who innocuously trigger a curse when the devout father refuses to participate in a game. Bad things happen…

name: Book of Mountain and Seas: Teeny Little Families

info.plot: Adapted from ancient Chinese mythology, this animated film depicts how a prince from a lilliputian kingdom goes on a touching rescue journey, after he causes his father to turn to stone.
Strange paranormal events at a secluded property intrigue a team planning renovations, but the occurrences may have a rational explanation.

name: Boonie Bears : Blast into the Past

info.plot: In this Chinese animated adventure, the Boonie bears & bareheaded Qiang time travel to ancient times. As they seek their way back, they meet strange animals & a primitive tribe.
When Vick learns the thrilling new Wild Life park is hosting a competition with a massive grand prize, he teams up with Bramble & the mysterious Leon to enter. However, trouble follows.
In the fifth installment, Briar, Bramble & the bald Qiang wind up tiny – thanks to a shrinking device ! Now, they must find Qiang's missing father, the device, and their families.

name: Boonie Bears: The Big Top Secret

info.plot: This Chinese animated adventure comedy depicts how Briar, a vain bear, finds circus fame less glamorous - and much harder than he imagines.
Tina is a customs officer with an almost super-human ability to detect contraband. One day, she uncovers a memory card filled with child pornography. The next day, she stops a strange-looking man.
Boris has everything that he wants in life. But when his wife Beatrice becomes depressed, things start to change.
With only thousands left in the wild, Bornean elephants in Sabah coexist with humans amidst the challenges while conservation efforts are made to safeguard this precious legacy.
Kisah 3 orang gadis penyiasat persendirian yang cuba untuk melumpuhkan sebuah sindiket jahat yang diketuai oleh Malik.
Bhaskaran, a college dropout, along with his friend Nallathambi starts a coaching class for students in order to win the love of a young professor, Chandrika.
Five college boys while away their time by going after girls and getting drunk at parties. However, they are forced to earn a living when one of them gets married against his parents' wishes.
A fertilizer used in a gated community transforms its residents into zombies. Can a teenager and his baby sister break free from the quarantined island before turning into zombies?
A logger and his father head to their hunting cabin, hoping for a quiet weekend. But find themselves fighting for survival as they encounter a gang of ruthless drug traffickers.
A lonely inventor invents an artificially intelligent robot named Charles in this humorous and heartwarming story about friendship, family, love and letting go.

name: Bring It on: Cheer or Die

info.plot: A cheer squad decides to practice their routine in secret at a nearby abandoned school unaware that they're locked inside with an unknown killer.
Kisah Jenin yang telah masuk ke zaman kini. Dia berjumpa dengan seorang animator, Emily. Wujud perbezaan pendapat maka terjadi lah kisah2 lucu dan akhirnya Jenin terpaksa pulang ke tempat asalnya.
A cowardly youngster and his friend run for their lives with their lovers as they are being chased by a dreaded don.

After his parent's divorce, Amar grows up in the village with the animals from his grand father's farm. He enjoys his lax lifestyle, until his father appears, determined to bring Amar back to the city.
This movie chronicles the loves and lives of three bachelors and best friends Ramli, Aziz and Sudin who share a rented room in a house owned by a wealthy and beautiful widow, Cik Normah.

Thaqif dan Zia,suami isteri yang masih mentah dalam rumah tangga.Mereka berpindah ke kampung untuk memulakan hidup baru.Di kampung Thaqif berkenalan dengan sepasang OKU yang mengajarnya erti cinta sebenar
Pada tahun 1950, satu tragedi berlaku di Bukit Kepong apabila sebuah balai polis diserang oleh 180 pengganas komunis yang membunuh 18 anggota polis dan meninggalkan kesan kekejaman pihak komunis.

Apit seorang chef di restaurant yang terkemuka di Kuala Lumpur mengalami depression. Masakan dia semua tak menjadi . Apit menerima panggilan dari tiga orang kakak yang memberi khabar neneknya telah hilang.

name: Bully. Coward. Victim. The Story of Roy

info.plot: This documentary looks at the life and work of controversial New York lawyer Roy Cohn, chief counsel to Senator Joseph McCarthy in the 1950s, and later, political mentor to Donald Trump.
Fate has brought Bunga and Noah together be it on the road or at the hotel where Bunga has been working at. Does this encounter give meaning to both of them?
Travis and Whitney visit their grandparents and stumble upon the evil plan of a greedy land developer. Travis falls through a magical portal which transports him to the world of American hero.
Ojai resident and filmmaker Michael Milano documents firsthand the experience of his own community in California being ravaged by a massive wildfire.

Vera, a student falls in love with her college friend, Adil. But Adil sees her only as his friend, and he is trying to get back up after being dumped by his girlfriend. Will Adil fall in love with Vera?
Kak Wan is suffering because of the frog swelling magic that someone has done to her. The magic has caused a conflict between Kak Wan and her husband second wife, Laila. Who is the real mastermind?
A must-watch film for lovers of horror comedy, about the quest to clear the family name of Cikgu Hassan, who was found dead in mysterious circumstances.
Three siblings reunite when their estranged father calls them home to their small Turkish village. They reconnect and get to know each other again after having been separated for 30 years.

name: Buy Me A Gun AKA Comprame Un Revolver

info.plot: Set in a futuristic Mexico, the film explores the lives of children in a world controlled by drug cartels, where the orphaned and abandoned children must stick together, guerilla-style, in self-defense.
The story begins when a newlywed couple moves into a home bought from an auction. Things begin to take a dark turn when they realize that.
Yoon went searching for her groom Taeyoung who didn't show up on the wedding day. She arrives at a strange place called 'Cafe Midnight' by chance and found a younger Taeyoung.
In this action-packed thriller, director Lo Wei plays a fishing village bully, whose son lusts after a local beauty.
A gravedigger who gets an address about death when his hoe swaying began to be dominated by greedy nature and planned to get more graveyard bookings.
Gye-choon and her lost granddaughter Hye-ji reunited after 12 years, yet Hye-ji's strange behavior raise questions on what happened to her while they were apart.
V P Sathyan, a professional Indian footballer, goes through various ups and downs in his career as he strives hard to fulfil his ambitions.
Kavitha and Kalyan, a married couple, go to a hill station on a vacation. But their peace is shattered when strange things begin happening at the guest house they are staying in.
The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.
Based on a miraculous true story that drew the attention of the entire nation, this is a thrilling drama about the spiritual collision of two broken lives.
Lost in depression, a woman is taken on an emotional roller-coaster ride by an obsessed photographer, giving police little time to find the truth about 2 missing women.
Friedmans, a seemingly typical, upper-middle-class Jewish family whose world is instantly transformed when the father and his youngest son are arrested and charged with shocking and horrible crimes.
A man with a special ability, tries to discover the identity of a mysterious hit-and-run driver who has put his father in critical condition.
As a social critique, 'Cart' tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.
A social worker fights to save a girl from her abusive parents, only to discover that the situation is more dangerous than she ever expected.
Tom Hanks stars as a survivor of a plane crash stranded on a desolate island who miraculously makes it back home after four years.
Adam, seorang pelakon terkenal secara tidak sengaja terjumpa sebuah cafe untuk bersembunyi daripada paparazi. Cafe tersebut dipunyai oleh seorang ibu tunggal yang langsung tidak mengenali Adam.
Newlywed Adam and Maya lives a happy and loving life. However, their marriage is put to the test when they gain instant fame after their videos become viral.
In colonial Brazil, a devil-worshipping priest and his followers were cursed to live forever in a cemetery. When the carnival comes to town, the time finally comes for their resurrection.

Wany dan Ismail balik ke kampung untuk beraya dengan abang Andi. Keesokan harinya, mereka terjaga dan tersadai di pulau asing. Mereka melalui pelbagai insiden yang aneh untuk pulang ke rumah atuk mereka.
Pada ulangtahun kelahirannya, Jaja mula didatangi oleh entiti misteri yang mahu mengambil nyawanya dan misteri perjanjian yang dimeterai 30 tahun dahulu oleh abangnya Hassan mula terbongkar.…

name: Cha-Ching'S Money Adventures: A Musical Series

info.plot: A musical series featuring six lively members of the Cha-Ching band, to help children learn about the fundamental money management concepts of Earn, Save, Spend and Donate.

Jiwa wanita susah untuk difahami-kisah Chalie yang menghadapi konflik diri sehingga menyebabkan dia terpaksa 'berpisah' dengan suami tercinta.Namun dia mula melalui pelbagai cabaran tanpa suaminya di sisi
Jeff seorang tiktokers terkenal. Jeff telah berjaya membuat seoarang gadis,Fatimah jatuh cinta padanya tetapi akhirnya Fatimah mendapat tahu yang Jeff hanya menggunakannya demi populariti.
The journey of a former minor-league basketball coach who, after a series of mishaps, is ordered by court to coach a Special Olympics team.
It revolves around a woman who suffers from dissociative identity disorder that affects a family, and a psychiatrist who intends to solve the case while risking his life.
Tom Hanks and Julia Roberts star in this fact-based tale about a Texas congressman and the role he played in escalating tension in the Middle East.
A trio of elite private investigators armed with the latest in high-tech tools track down a kidnapped computer ace and keep his top-secret voice-identification software out of lethal hands.
In the Angels' new adventure, the captivating trio once again demonstrates their expertise as masters of espionage, martial arts, and disguise.
After a farmer's daughter saves a baby pig from the axe, the piglet befriends a spider who spins webs of miracles to keep the pig alive.
This action crime drama stars Donnie Yen & Andy Lau as a drug kingpin and a corrupt policeman who team up to build an underworld empire in 1960s Hong Kong.
An ambitious young woman faces a supernatural force through technology. Will she be able to survive the onslaught and solve this unheard phenomenon?
A deadly game show takes place in an abandoned hospital filled with vengeful spirits.
Three brothers conspire against each other in a bid to take over their father's criminal empire following his sudden death.

Chellam, has an ambition to fly to the top of the rainbow. Shekar who has forcefully occupied an ancient well is threatened by Princess to clear off. Shekar kidnaps Leela. Chellam wants to rescue Leela.
Princess Chempaka Biru is about the missing king's princess kidnapped by pirates. Before his death, the Sultan asked that his son be searched again and as long as the child was not found.
Featuring popular faces from the Lollywood television industry, Chhalawa is the story of Zoya (Mehwish Hayat), who wished to wed Sameer (Azfar Rehman).
Richard Gere, Catherine Zeta Jones and Rene Zellweger dance their hearts out in this Oscar® winning musical.
Bringing astounding new detail to the rescue story that captivated the world, this program portrays the epic fight for survival of thirty-three men, trapped under half a mile of rock.
Raja learns about his father's death and meets his lookalike stepbrother, Dilip.
After months of matrimonial bliss, Akid relapsed into his old condition of allergic to attention by Chinta! They must now find another way to solve Akid's issue once and for all
A man is raising his niece like his own daughter, and everything appears normal in their life until the little girl goes missing.
After her mother's death, Mimi's family fell apart. One day, Mimi finds Chomel, a cat and brings it home, only for it to cause a series of events that brings her broken family back together again.
Eddie's mother falls very ill after a serious car accident. He and his brother face the daunting prospect of potentially losing their mother just as Christmas approaches.
For 13 years, a murderer goes on killing sprees while dressed as Santa. This year, the police tracked his next target to a small village in the north, where a group of friends are having a reunion.
Meet Carole McKay, she doesn't love Christmas at all. But this Christmas Eve, Carole's past, present and future are about to collide.
Hairi accidentally drinks coffee that has been contaminated by a virus-infected gecko and becomes superhero.
Professor Klon is back and wants to control the world's supply of fresh water. The planet has only 72 hours before turning black. Cicak-Man comes to the rescue.
Man has to keep his hero title when he realizes there is a new hero wants to replace him.
This is a lighthearted family drama about a teenage girl who is closely guarded by her mother.
The rivalry between Cikgu Daud and Cikgu Samad culminated by the arrivals of 2 ghosts, Cikgu Syima and Ismail who seek the truth about their death.
Zeynep, a pregnant woman, is staying with her mother-in-law, Fatma, at her small village when her husband has to return to the city for his work.
A Cinderella dress ends up in the hands of a sound designer, who soon gets arrested for a couple of murders and the movie is a horror thereafter.

Budak kampung yang jatuh cinta pada Qalid seorang pemuda yang menuntut di sebuah sekolah pondok. Mereka bercinta dan berjanji setia namun sesungguhnya soal jodoh, hidup dan mati semuanya rahsia Ilahi.
Four old friends gathers for a reunion ten years after their University graduation. What should be a happy occasion is overturned when love and jealousy begin to show its ugly face once again.
A wife grants her husband's wish for divorce, with the condition that he would carry her everyday in his arms, like he used to when they first married, for thirty days.
Qasidah kecewa apabila tunangnya, Ryan dipaksa berkahwin dengan Saleha kerana mengikut wasiat dituntut keluarga Saleha.
Farid is a nerdy guy who always been bullied by Syakirin, his senior. Farid determined to enter an MMA tournament organized by their university so to put an end to being bullied by Syakirin.
Many believe the longest highway in Indonesia is guarded by a spirit. In less than a year after it was built, many accidents have occurred.
Anthony assumes several identities and kidnaps three government officials in order to succeed in his secret mission.
The number-one sweeper Ryo Saeba and his partner Kaori receives a new assignment in Shinjuku. The client is a model, Ai Shindo, who wants a bodyguard because she has been targeted and followed.
A former amputee athlete picks up a girl from a village to train for national championship event.
