Views of Egyptian revolution from the back of a police truck in Cairo.
A blind street performer listens to the murder stories from a man's novel. Later, the stories become reality.
A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.
A socially distanced comedic satire that spotlights five characters breaking down and breaking through as they grapple with politics, culture, and the pandemic.
A mathematician genius Mathi who has another identity Cobra who commits intelligent crimes using Maths.

Little Peter is plagued by mysterious tapping from inside his bedroom wall that his parents insist is all in his imagination. But soon, Peter believes that his parents is hiding a dangerous, dark secret.
After consuming a significant amount of cocaine, a 500-pound black bear embarks on a drug-fueled rampage on the visitors assembled in a Georgian forest.
Balu comes to the city for better opportunities and stays with his friend. He falls in love with Sumithra, his landlord, but her evil cousin, Mahesh, creates a rift between them.
A wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.

The captain of Iran's Futsal National Team is left behind as the team flies to Malaysia for the Asian Games, all because the laws dictate that a woman needs her husband's permission to leave the country.
A cab driver held hostage in his own taxi by a contract killer, finds himself intertwined with the killer in ways neither of them would ever have imagined.
After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.
A young man awakens from coma after a mysterious accident, only to find that the world has changed. He must figure out this strange new dystopia, while looking for an exit back to the world he knew.
A man decides to visit the father he has not met in 30 years to try and make up for lost time. The only problem is, he barely knows this eccentric man who is his father.
A teenage runaway takes part in a sleep study that becomes a nightmarish descent into the depths of her mind and a frightening examination of the power of dreams.
After a devastating earthquake, the survivors congregate at the Hwang Goong Apartments in Seoul, the only building left standing.

The charming Fletch becomes the prime suspect in a murder case while searching for a stolen art collection. He turns his focus to a cast of eccentric characters to investigate the case and clear his name.
After the murder of his lover, Min-ho hires the talented attorney Shin-ae to defend his innocence since he is the prime suspect found in the hotel room alongside the body.
Chuck Barris, famous TV producer, talks about his apparent life doubling up as a covert operative for the CIA.
When a crime organization from North Korea crosses borders and enters South Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.
North Korean detective Im Chul-Ryung is sent to South Korea to team up again with Detective Kang Jin-Take on a new mission, their target being crime organization leader Jang Myung-Joon.
A look behind the curtain of Washington politics, depicting the explosive 1991 Clarence Thomas Supreme Court nomination hearings where Anita Hill accused him of sexual harassment.
While vacationing in their chalet by the lake, a little girl starts playing a game of congkak with a friend that only she can see. Then, she simply vanishes. Will her family be able to find her?
This is the historical recreation of the 1942 Wannsee Conference, in which Nazi and SS leaders gathered to discuss the "Final Solution to the Jewish Question".
A man realizes his life will be better if he shrinks himself which allows him to live in wealth and splendor.
Freddy Heflin idolises the police, but his slight deafness excluded him from joining the force. Now he is Sheriff of a town home to many NYPD cops, but all is not well in cop land.
When a disgraced Olympic gold medalist boxer comes across a young talented boxer, he vows to start a boxing team at the school he teaches at to give his student a shot at the nationals.
Four couples go to a tropical island and get sucked into the resort's couples' therapy.

name: Court Cam: Top Five Courtroom Confrontations

info.plot: A look at some of the most outrageous and bizarre confrontations that occurred in courtrooms across America: an attorney's comment sets off a judge; an inmate causes chaos when he attacks a bailiff.
Five emerging filmmakers spotlight their frontline families, providing intimate accounts of Covid-19's impact on their lives.
This remarkable documentary reveals the human reality of life under lockdown near the epicenter of the coronavirus pandemic.
After the death of a famous artist, his daughter inherits two portraits from his art collection depicting a mysterious woman. It is when cracks form in the paintings that odd things begin to happen.
After witnessing a brutal murder in a remote cabin, plumber Robert hides in a cramped crawlspace while the killers scour the property for a hidden fortune.

name: Crazy Kwai Boo: Sanxingdui Spirited Away

info.plot: In this Chinese fantasy adventure, Kwai Boo & his friends begin a thrilling treasure hunt. When they stumble upon a parallel universe, what happens when the golden rod of ancient Shu goes missing?
Kung fu idols Wang Yu, Lo Meng & Loh Lieh star in this comedy set in a Shaolin temple where Hung Hsi-kuan & Fang Shih-yu become disciples.
This documentary follows Dr. Dorothy Otnow Lewis, a psychiatrist who studies murderers, seeking answers as to why people kill by probing into the hearts and minds of the killers themselves.
When Cal learns that his wife wants a divorce, he reluctantly faces the prospect of single life with the counsel of a smooth young bachelor.

Deep at night, in a popular online chat room, sleepless teenagers discuss a scary game. Based on urban legend, it is said that players can curse whoever crossed them. A dangerous game for reckless youth.
Ryoko tries looking for her missing student and stumbles upon an online game of hide-and-seek that is linked to demonology and the supernatural.
Eager members of a high school film club try to shoot a movie at midnight on school grounds. They get far more than they bargained for.
Reality adventure on Crocodile Dream Island: strangers vie for the prize, unaware of lurking dangers and the puppeteer's sinister motives.
The Bible teaches that those who kill themselves are sinners, condemned to eternal damnation. Disturbed by the scripture, Lee kills suicidal people, turning them from sinners to innocents.
Tess Harper, a crossword editor, joins a crossword-solving contest with a new supercomputer, but ends up involved in investigating the murder of the tech CEO.
Upon learning that her mother intends to arrange her marriage, Nadia asks Kyle to convince her mom that he is interested in marrying her.
Disaster hits when two teenagers are caught in a fire on the 20th floor of a skyscraper. Their parents are on the 60th. Will they survive the flames?
Kupid Cubit is a dating app that enables the masses to find love. But for Katarina and Saiful, it's a platform for healing people with unrequited love.
In this comedy, a delivery worker's family restaurant is badly hit by the pandemic – but when his father takes out a mortgage on it to buy a columbarium, what follows?
Hanna, an active woman, is becoming bored with her daily life. She soon gets the idea to start a business selling cupcakes.
Kisah seorang ejen di sebuah syarikat penghancur jodoh yang ditugaskan untuk memikat seorang wanita supaya dapat melupakan suaminya yang telah diisytiharkan meninggal dunia.
A group of children from a money begging syndicate were force by their keeper (boss) to go to the houses and collect Raya money.
Eeva Elyana wanita muda daripada keluarga berada cuba menenangkan diri setelah dikhianati Remy lelaki kaya yang cuba disatukan oleh keluarga.
After a security engineer unwittingly becomes involved in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.
When the female students of an engineering college mysteriously disappear and are found dead, a young man and his friends decide to look for the culprit.
Waking up from her coma, Lena is placed alone in a flat where she starts to experience horrific events.
Vikram uncovers a medical crime that sends shockwaves through the place.
A frustrated songwriter met his old bandmate and a school band "Destroyer", who inspired him to complete an unfinished track.
A horror film from Turkey, telling the story of seven nights of supernatural experiences suffered by a family, as recorded on security camera.
Legendary Korean spy Dachimawa Lee is assigned to recover the stolen national treasure, a Golden Buddha, and reveal the dark plot. However, his mission ends in failure.
A man embraces fatherhood and provides unconditional care and love to his child while balancing the brutalities of life being a single parent
The legend of Mae Nak Prakanong, a female spirit from the era of King Rama V, has been repeatedly told through the ages, though not much is known about her stillborn son Daeng.
A young woman's corpse remaining beautiful despite being dead for a long time raises a thousand questions for the 2 coroners in the autopsy room.

Gaza must decide whether to follow in the footsteps of his father, a human trafficker, or be guided by his own conscience. With everyone seeks humanity, is Gaza any different from the exploited refugees?
A shepherd's son who lost his mother went through a difficult time when he had to part with his beloved buffalo. He tried to find various ways so that his father would not sell his beloved buffalo.
After several years Damayanthi returns to exact her revenge on the people who brutally murdered her entire family for getting the inheritance.

Strange things happen in Nuraiza's boarding school and she is seized by hysteria. Will her parents realize the error of their ways in time to rescue their beloved child from the clutches of the devil?
Indah tidak dapat menerima kenyataan yang ayahnya telah berkahwin baru. Dia berkenalan dengan Kerk, jurulatih selam yang membawanya meneroka lautan, dan akhirnya jatuh cinta.
While swimming in a lake, five friends find a chest and drag it ashore. They are soon set upon by the ghostly spectre of a little girl. They can return the chest to the lake, or let the terror go on.
In order to try and realize their dreams, Thomas Uncles and Megan White enter in the mother of all dance battles.
Peperangan tercetus di kerajaan kayangan hanya kerana merebut Puteri Kesuma Gemala Dewi. Puteri Kesuma dicampakkan ke bumi oleh ayahnya, Dewa Kayangan agar peperangan reda.
The film tells the story of Dang Anom, the son of Sang Rajuna Tapa, who is engaged to Panglima Malang. However, the Sultan had fallen in love with her and made her his concubine.
A pregnant woman and her husband move to the country. Small town life seems picture perfect, until their neighbours pull them into a twisted fantasy.
A reformed sociopath escapes prison to attend his brother Sean's funeral. Once there, he struggles not only with his own mental health issues but also with a group of mercenaries.
A family reunion at a remote mansion takes a lethal turn when they are trapped inside and forced to play a deadly survival game where only one will make it out alive.
A real estate agent finds himself trapped in a haunted house with a mysterious squatter and must learn to conquer his fear to escape.

name: Dark Secret AKA Sarp Son Sop

info.plot: A young couple move into a house, hoping to start a new life after losing their child to a miscarriage. But they get no peace at all.
A spurned woman is so desperate to win her husband back that she turns to black magic. Her wish comes true, but not in the way that she imagines it would turn out.
As Hitler's forces close in on the United Kingdom, Winston Churchill is elected Prime Minister and is tasked to lead and protect his nation from the lethal threat.
Three teenagers go on a graduation road trip. Along the way, they meet zany memorable characters from all walks of life. Slowly, each of the boys discover their purpose in life.
The compassionate male family barber owner, Ah Xin, embarks on a journey to serve a distant client despite her children's objections. She decides to hang the "Day Off" sign and provide the service.
Dayang Senandong, seorang gadis disumpah menjadi hitam mengahwini seorang putera raja, namun dibenci oleh ibu mertuanya kerana kehodohannya.
In the near future, a deadly plague ravages America...and a repressive government's only response is to quarantine its victims.
When a car hits a truck full of explosives, it causes an explosion in an underground tunnel between Manhattan and New Jersey. Kit attempts to save the people stuck in there before the air runs out.
Mourning the death of his older brother, 13-year-old Dayveon becomes drawn to the camaraderie of a local gang while spending his days roaming around his rural Arkansas town.
In DC League of Super-Pets, Krypto the Super-Dog and Superman are inseparable best friends, sharing the same superpowers and fighting crime in Metropolis side by side.
A medical doctor and his family relocate to a remote village in South Sulawesi. They are warmly embraced by the locals. However, not everyone is pleased with the appearance of Zaldy.
A cursed diary tragically affects the fate of two couples. What happens next will surely send you on a roller-coster of emotion and then when you least suspect, a shiver down your spine.
A young woman must save herself and her friends from an ancient evil that stalks its victims through the real-life phenomenon of sleep paralysis.
A comedy-horror venture about an aspiring hiphop group who head to Mermaid Island to shoot a music video, expecting bikini-clad girls and sunshine but end up battling ghouls and demons.
"After Becca receives a distressing call from her suicidal brother Richie, she rushes over to his apartment and finds him alive and well - surrounded by copies of his own dead body."
A group of deaf children must fight to survive when their bus gets hijacked by three escaped convicts.
A young widower returns to his hometown to search for answers to his wife's murder, which may be linked to the ghost of a murdered ventriloquist.
An action thriller based on a popular video game, it follows a group of young recruits who must travel to the origin of an outbreak to find a missing team of scientists who were searching for a cure.
Set in 1876, when the richest gold strike in U.S. history drew a throng of restless misfits to an outlaw settlement in the Black Hills of South Dakota.
In an age of artificial intelligence, the traditional deity of marriage sets out to connect an internet-addicted convenience store clerk & a male customer - a real love with no cyber links.

The story revolves around young Nathan and Salma's endless ups and downs in their relationship. Even after a forced separation, they still find their way back to each other. Will they be together, ever?
Nathan and Salma enter the world of social activism. Salma chooses to express himself digitally while Nathan chooses to take to the streets.
This heartfelt movie is based on items from famed HK superstar Anita Mui's estate. Watch fans strive to return small gifts, handwritten cards & letters to their original senders.

Village girl Nok goes to Vientiane to look after her rich cousin, Ana, who is going blind but can now communicate with the dead. Nok quickly acquires a taste for luxury, leading to her eventual downfall.

Trapped in their school by a maniac, a group of elite students must solve a series of puzzles or suffer horrible fates. A chilling metaphor for the high-stakes university entrance examinations across Asia.
Seorang penyanyi baru yang semakin meningkat naik terpaksa bergelut dengan cinta dan penyakit misterinya.

Hakim has his own YouTube channel aimed at exposing the existence of ghosts. One day, Hakim received a short message inviting him to spend the night in a haunted hospital and various events took place.
A sequel of the horror comedy telemovie Debunk.
A former soldier tormented by his past receives a cryptic phone call about a bomb planted at a soccer stadium that will detonate when the crowd's noise reaches a certain decibel.

A man begins a relationship with a bar girl, not realizing that she is a student in his wife's college class. His wife discovers the affair and moves the girl into their house to observe what develops.
Three friends explore the catacombs of Paris and are shocked by the discovery of a deep dark secret remnant from World War II. Trapped deep below the pavements of Paris, they fight for their life.
Nawin, a secret agent, goes rogue to rescue a mysterious woman, Jin, from the private military force that abducted her. They flee to her birthplace, pursued by nefarious forces.
A couple travel to a remote island for a restaurant famous online, yet unexpected danger awaits when they met the restaurant owner.
A sloshed novelist barges into a police station describing a future kidnapping with eerie details.

After staying apart for 11 years, Ain and Adam give love a second chance. But, their love is put to the test when Ain receives a bouquet of roses, which makes Adam jealous, and their ill-fated love fails.
When 17 year old Jakob is sentenced to serve time on his uncle's farm, he discovers there's much more to the farm than meets the eye.
As a contract killer investigates a kidnapping related to him in Thailand, he finds himself pursued by a man whose brother he has killed.
An aspiring filmmaker rents an abandoned apartment in the city to work on his script. The events that occur there make him discover some dark secrets inside the building.
Go on a courageous quest with Hsiao Feng-ling & her classmate, as they try to capture the lute demon Chin Mo and send him back to the netherworld.

Mengisahkan tentang Aris, remaja lelaki yang melatah dan telah disalah anggap meninggal oleh orang kampungnya. Kekecohan bermula apabila orang kampung menganggap Haris adalah hantu yang menggangu mereka.

name: Dendam Hantu Latah 2: Roh YB Lama

info.plot: Kampung Latah is on the verge of local election, and nothing stops Hashim Kalimantan from being nominated as the candidate. However, bigger catastrophe is facing the kampung.
Kampung Lompat Katak was surprised by the presence of Leha Letop and Cikgu Wahab.

A family realises that they are being haunted by an evil spirit in want of a master when their daughter suffer from increasingly serious hallucinations about a mysterious old woman that no one else sees.
Seorang pelukis muda yang mempunyai banyak masalah dalam kehidupan hariannya mendapati dirinya kini keseorangan dalam dunia tanpa manusia. Apa sebenarnya telah terjadi kepada dunia?
A young mother, her son, and her best friend venture into the wilderness to scatter her late husband's ashes. On the way home, they realize that a hiker has been stalking them...
Vying to be "World's Greatest Villain", Gru and his crew of hilarious minions plot the crime of the century: steal the moon -- but he meets his match when three little girls steal his heart.
Gru, his adorable girls, and the Minions are back in this comedy blockbuster where this super-dad finds himself balancing fatherhood with his secret agent role in the Anti-Villain League.
Gru and his twin brother join forces to take down a former 1980s child star who's out for revenge.
After the events in Bangkok & New York, partner Tang Ren & Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, which also attracted another famous detective, sparking a rivalry.

name: Detective Dee and the Dragon of Fire

info.plot: Di Renjie and his fiancée Liu Yueru investigate the mysterious "palace arson case" but are faced with various obstacles and even assassination attempts from mysterious forces.
The 41st Hong Kong Film Awards Winner. The police form a task force of 'chosen sleuths' to catch the group of vigilantes calling themselves 'The Chosen Sleuths'.

Two students wake up to find themselves trapped in their school & haunted by demons as they find a way to survive, search for their missing teacher, and confront the dark & horrific truth about their fate.
Thayamma works hard to educate her brother Kalimuthu. Although in love with Tulsi, she sacrifices her love for his family.
Hema and Arun meet in a road accident and develop a bond. However, there's more to them than what meets the eye. What happens next after their chance encounter forms the crux of the story.
Dexter receives a message from the future appealing for help against a tyrannical leader - so he builds a time machine to save the world from his arch-enemy - Mandark.
Dharmadurai, a simple villager, helps his brothers financially against his father's wishes.
Dheena works for his brother Adhikesavan, a gangster, and is very close to him, until things turn sour between them after a misunderstanding cost them the life of their sister.
Kanagavel, an aspiring police officer, beats up a man for misbehaving with his girlfriend.
Kind-hearted Larasati is murdered and her spirit returns for revenge. But the orphans she cared for can always depend on her when they need her.
A tale of Cambodian youth caught in the rush towards modernity and progress, as they learn about life, love and survival.

Chinta selalu gagal dalam cintanya diberikan sebuah diari ajaib untuk menulis babak cinta. Impian yang ditulis Chinta itu menjadi kenyataan dengan kemunculan Ben namun tidaklah selancar yang disangka.
What happens when a diary founded in a secondhand bungalow began to haunt Sharvesh and his wife? The crux of the story is about the mystery hidden in the house.
In this animated tale of a dinosaur family who take a stand for their homeland, Woody travels from the future seeking his partner - but he meets Yaya, a dinosaur & a new adventure begins.
As a grieving medical student copes with reality, an energetic photographer tries to open his heart to love while keeping her own truth under wraps.
Six high school students turn sleuths are on the trail of the new girl at school who has disappeared without a trace. But instead of finding her, they find themselves followed around by ghosts.
A patient wakes to find he is trapped in a deserted hospital by forces that refuse to let him leave.
While escaping an overturned ambulance, a group of paramedics are trapped with violent prisoners. They quickly discover that they are the victims of an ambush.
Masdo (Do), Amore (Re) and Minami (Mi) coincidentally met when they were capturing a snatch thief. They became close and venture into small businesses but which always seem to fail miserably.
Anak-anak kampung yang kelihatan serba kekurangan tetapi jauh di dalam diri, mereka mempunyai jiwa kental, bersemangat waja dan tidak kenal erti putus asa.
After witnessing his wife committing adultery, a psychopathic plastic surgeon begins his killing spree, which starts to reveal his killer instinct.
Jacques Blanchot loses everything: his wife, his home, his job. He gradually alienates himself from the world around him. Until the day when the owner of a pet shop takes him in.

After his wife's death, the eccentric famed veterinarian doctor Dolittle had isolated himself until he is forced to go on an epic adventure to a mythical island in search of a cure for Queen Victoria.
Sabrina, Tabby, Angel dan Sasha ingin mencapai cita-cita dan minat mereka dalam bidang Muzik. Namun, mereka terpaksa mengharungi dugaan demi untuk mencapai impian mereka.
Dolly finds herself taking a private journey into her past, guided by the mysterious appearances of her personal Three Wise Men.
Follows young Chakaravarthi a.k.a Don as he grows in life, from being a carefree college student to a caring husband.
A group of friends break into the house of a wealthy blind man, thinking they'll get away with the perfect heist. They're wrong.

A police officer encounters a deadly supernatural being when she interrupted a ritual during a case. To her horror, the bloodthirsty being attaches itself to her, intent on torturing her and her family.

Shawn and Zach, move into a cottage together. When violent episodes begin taking hold of Zach, he slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood that may have been the result of demonic possession.
This psychological thriller follows the emotionally unstable Emmy, who is led to Ireland where a stranger guides her investigation on the sinister origins of her family's curse.
A 1950s housewife living with her husband in a utopian experimental community begins to worry that his glamorous company could be hiding disturbing secrets.

For an overview of Indonesian superstitions, these six spooky stories are sure to strike terror in your heart. A collaboration between 3 production houses, shot at different locations throughout Indonesia.
Paranoia sets in when a young woman living alone starts to suspect that a stranger is breaking into her apartment.
One night, someone violently pulls Fang Hui's door. The security explains that the CCTV on her floor is not working. While sleeping, Fang Hui is vaguely aware of someone sneaking in.
Millions of mysterious alien "doors" suddenly appear around the globe. To determine the reason for their arrival, mankind must work together to understand the purpose of these cosmic anomalies.
A father and his daughter buy a used car which is possessed by an unknown spirit, which yearns for revenge on criminals who had killed a little girl sometime before.
Five young friends are curious to know more about the ghostly legends surrounding the Melati Dorm and decide to pay a visit to catch a glimpse of Melati's ghost. But what awaits them at the dorm?
"An impoverished young couple forced by corrupt cops to be hired killers. The couple must kill to survive and take down the members of the drug syndicate who are out to silence them."
A widow and her late husband's mistress work together to uncover the truth behind his murder.
A gifted athlete meets an aspiring anchorwoman at the hamburger restaurant where she works a late night shift. The two continue to chat and support each other in their dreams.
After the sudden death of their midwife, an L.A. couple hire her son to be their live-in doula.
Adapted from the hit TV series, the story follows the Crawley family, the wealthy owners of a large estate in the English countryside in the early 20th century.
After the dowager countess suddenly inherits a villa in the South of France, the Crawley family decides to go on a grand journey to uncover the mystery of the inheritance.
Jason Scott Lee puts on a riveting performance in this moving tribute to the life of one of the most influential martial arts stars of all time – Bruce Lee.
A senior officer has been killed during a power cut and who is the killer?
A young girl misuses her newfound ability to create and control other people's dreams to teach her bothersome stepsister a lesson.
Shakti, a young man, is spoilt by his father and leads a wayward life.
In this comedy directed by Song Xiao Bao, brothers Xiao Bao & Er-Ge leave their poor village for a better life in Shenzhen. However, plans change when they stumble upon a parentless baby.
In a reflective and confessional hour of stand-up, Drew Michael airs his issues with relationships, social media, and the limits of mining jokes from his own life experiences.
Owen Wilson is Drillbit Taylor, the cheapest of mercenaries, hit men and bodyguards, tasked to protect a trio of freshmen from the high school bully.
Memaparkan pemikiran remaja sekarang terhadap perkahwinan dari sudut kos atas syariat agama tetapi tertekan cara hidup zaman kini yang mahukan kemewahan.
A desperate father makes a deal with an alleged murderer to help him find his missing child, only to find out the truth about her sinister plans.
A man about to get married goes to an island vacation with his friends, only to become entangled with a gang of robbers in a series of unfortunate events that will change his life forever.
Adhitya and Ganga, who do not wish to marry, slowly start falling in love with each other.
Fong Lai Kuen fakes a pregnancy to keep her job when she finds out that she is about to be fired. She begins to feel guilty about her lie when she receives much care from her colleagues.

In the far future of humanity, Duke Leto Atreides accepts stewardship of the dangerous desert planet Arrakis, also known as Dune, the only source of the most valuable substance in the universe - the spice.
An epic heist for a lost relic goes dangerously awry when an unlikely band of adventurers cross the wrong people in this hilarious and action-packed adventure.
In May 1940, German troops advanced across France, trapping Allied soldiers on Dunkirk. Civilians were recruited to bring the soldiers back to safety.
Dupa yang miskin dan tempang pergi ke pulau puaka dan terjumpa sebuah patung yang kemudiannya bertukar menjadi wanita jelita bernama Chendana. Semenjak itu hidup Dupa berubah.
A teenage boy living with abnormal symptoms of having thorns grow on his hand and having difficulty to control it. Will that thorns from his hands will cause trouble all over again?
A horror comedy about a dead woman's five sons who try to fulfil their filial duties but get the shock of their lives when mommy dearest returns as a zombie.
A young couple move into a haunted house to contact the other side. Until their conduit, a painted black mirror proves to contain a malevolent presence hell-bent on bringing harm to their new family.
Shia LaBeouf and Michelle Monaghan are pawns of a faceless enemy who seems to have limitless power to manipulate everything they do.
A love letter to the Filipino-American community, stand-up comedian Jo Koy stars as a man returning back to his hometown for a celebration with his riotous but loving family.
A high school girl with a flawless reputation uses the rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.
After inheriting her grandfather's house, Alysa experiences some paranormal events and must confront the mystery of his sudden death and the evil that hides inside.
Nam and Fire are top racing drivers. Nam is depressed after causing a young racing driver's injury. Fire decides to compete in an illegal street car race to stand up for Nam. Can he succeed finally?
Periyasamy's simple and joyous life turns into a nightmare of internal familial disputes, until Eeswaran enters their lives and shows them what they have left behind and forgotten - their roots.
A journalism student investigates the history behind the mysterious disappearance of girls from her dorm and stumbles upon an unholy covenant.
A student thinks that she is doing a good deed when she tries to help Burcu, a sick girl who is locked up in a special room. But is she really helping, or merely a pawn in a game of death?
An old man, fated to collect souls for eternity, seeks atonement after trading his daughter's soul.
A story about the unlikely partnership during World War I between a young British scientist named Arthur Eddington and the brilliant physicist, Albert Einstein.
Ejen Ali embraces his role after he's accidentally recruited as a MATA spy, but he begins questioning his place when a new invention is introduced.
A mild-mannered schoolteacher vows to rescue a kidnapped girl from the deadly outlaw El Diablo.
A hard-hitting HBO Original docu-drama by director Gus Van Sant that delves into the reality of high-school life.
Determined to gain control of her life, Ella sets off on a journey to find her fairy godmother to lift her "curse" of obedience.
A young man gains superpowers after receiving a strange object from an alien planet. However, he is not sure if the aliens want to retake it or enable him to do good
Elvis Presley's former manager, Colonel Tom Parker, who is on his deathbed in 1997 after having suffered a stroke, he looks back on how he first met the future King of Rock and Roll.
In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest live on an overpopulated ruined Earth.
When a man dies of mysterious reasons after the departure of a plane, fear and chaos quickly spread, not only on the plane but also on land as news of a possible terrorist attack have already spread.
Burdened with student debt and unable to find work, a college graduate becomes involved in a credit card scam, acting as a dummy shopper and buying products with stolen credit cards.
Arun, a computer hacker and a thief, decides to change his ways when he falls in love.
A light-hearted telemovie where a daughter finds a match for her single mother.
Vicky is an insomniac who agrees to try a pill that will help him dream the life he aspires. Soon events in his dreams are replicated in reality.
Tantari, a trained 'pendekar' embarks upon a journey of vengeance seeking out the bandits known as 'Enam Jahanam' who brutally raped and murdered his wife when they were robbing his textile store.
Zhen Xin starts college and befriends a student named You Mei. Living in the dormitory, they often hear strange sounds and are even attacked by charred beings!
The Devil has a phone number, and if you call him on your mobile phone at midnight, he will grant you a wish. In return, he will control your life for the duration of the call.
United by the planet's biggest conservation project -- The Red List -- conservation heroes around the world are risking everything to save giraffe, gorillas, big cats and other endangered wildlife.
A woman navigating through love and heartbreak over the course of one year. During that time, she will unlock the secrets to her life in a sudden turn of events and in the most surprising of places.
Two brothers, a drug lord and a police officer, are involved in a drug cartel's turf battle. After the younger brother's hidden identity as a drug lord is unveiled, an endless battle begins.
A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend...
Vijay falls in love with Meenu during a business trip and decides to marry her.
Former childhood friends enter into an intense rivalry fuelled by their escalating competitive nature.
A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.
While on a vacation in Paris, Kamal meets Kayal who falls in love with him and saves him from being killed by some men.
Rajini plays Kumaran who marries his love interest but she elopes with someone else for his riches.
Bukhary membawa diri ke Pulau Leros, Greece dan menjadi sukarelawan membantu pelarian Syiria. Di situ dia mempelajari nilai kehidupan dan kemanusiaan.
Rival diplomats from North Korea and South Korea are trapped in Mogadishu, Somalia as civil war rages. With no aid from either governments, their only shot at survival is to join arms.
Ray Breslin teams up with Trent DeRosa once again, this time to rescue the kidnapped daughter of a Hong Kong tech mogul from a Latvian prison.
Six people from different walks of life participate in an escape room competition to win ten thousand dollars. Things change when they find themselves in horrifying circumstances.
A young couple's anniversary vacation turns into a nightmare when they unknowingly befriends a dangerous fugitive who's determined to keep them from ever leaving the island.
A journalist, decides to investigate the Covelone Estate, which is believed to be haunted. What follows is a series of events that puts their lives in danger.
A young man who is embarrassed by his name opts to run a marathon to prove himself.
Singarasu is the guardian to a group of villages and goes about resolving disputes.
Renowned old poet Jeokyo 's relationship with his son-like student Jiwoo starts to crack when a 17-year-old girl Eungyo steps in.
Second episode of the two-part Euphoria special.
In the aftermath of being left by Jules at the train station and relapsing, the first special episode follows Rue as she celebrates Christmas.
The awe-inspiring journey of two different expeditions challenged beyond their limits by one of the fiercest snowstorms ever encountered by mankind.
The closure of a beloved New York City diner deeply affects its employees and neighbors in this HBO Original Movie.
When an interdimensional crisis threatens to unravel reality, an unlikely hero must connect with parallel universe versions of herself to save the world.
During a diamond heist, Jelly steals the loot and flees, with his other cohorts hot on his heel. They stumble onto a remote village with strange villagers and mysterious eerie occurrences.
A reunion between two estranged sisters gets cut short with the rise of flesh-possessing demons, thrusting them into a primal battle for survival.
A glamour model tries to make it as a popstar. After some time, she receives a beautiful song and thinks she has made it. She soon learns that this unearthly music brings death to all who hear it.
Zack and Sham, two youngsters who love drift racing. But, conflict arises between two of them as Sham feels for Fasha, Zack's girlfriend.
Sham and Joe want revenge on Zack. Sham has his leg broken after he involved in an accident, and Joe because he has a scar on his face and his greed to monopolise drug syndicate.
Vicky and his wife Angel cast their first film and a talented young girl enrols to approach Vicky. Her intention however, is to take revenge on Vicky for causing her sister's death.
The story of two people who meet by chance and develop a bond that increases from warm friendship to deep attraction.
A Cambodian-French filmmaker explores his life as a teenager under the brutal rule of the Khmer Rouge.
When a mysterious and dangerous gas envelopes Seoul, Yong Nam and a friend must use their skills as rock climbers to get everyone to safety.
4 college friends on spring break turn off at a haunted exit. They meet a mysterious store clerk and are haunted by the self-fulfilling ghost stories he tells.
Amidst Republic's dawn, Wang's son dies from opium. Disguised as Taoist, he infiltrates Chen's to bust opium trade.
Sir Ranulph Fiennes is credited as the World's Greatest Living Explorer, being the first to circumnavigate the world from pole to pole, cross the Antarctic on foot and discover a lost city in Arabia.
A former CIA operative is kidnapped by a group of terrorists. When his son learns there is no plan for his father to be saved, he launches his own rescue operation.

When military tactics instructor Zhang Chen is unjustly framed for a murder, he's forced to go into hiding. In order clear his name, he recruits Chu Wu and the only survivor of the serial killer, Demi.
A drug squad goes undercover to take down a criminal organization. However, they find themselves in a situation they never expected.
Eyang strange behaviour put some threats on her granddaughter, her step grandson and Eyang herself when oddity and changes in her behaviour occurred more frequent.
A mother takes the law into her own hands when a serial rapist who raped her daughter goes scot-free on legal technicalities.
The journey of the Malaysian national blind football team that qualified for the 2017 Asean Paralympic Games to win the title.
Yukari faces a string of unbelievable bad luck, and wonders if it has anything to do with a mysterious girl that peeps at her through the peephole.
A young woman falls in love with a man and wishes to marry him. However, everything changes when she learns about her father's involvement in his first wife's death.
The three best friends spent the summer in every possibility, experimenting in chaotic ways in living life as ultra-modern young women.
A man wakes up in a hospital room to discover he now has a new face. He soon finds himself stalked by a mysterious hooded figure while trying to uncover the truth behind his new appearance.
Forced to travel with her boyfriend to a horror festival, Laine begins to experience unexplained premonitions and disturbing visions associated with the urban myth of The Creeper.
It follows an actress, fashion designer and real estate assistant who attempt to become social media influencers by purchasing fake followers and bots to boost their popularity.

For best friends Becky and Hunter, life is all about conquering fears and pushing limits. But after they climb 2,000 feet to the top of a remote, abandoned radio tower, they find themselves stranded with n
In WWII, British journalist William Courtenay, with a camera and MacArthur's friendship, documented the Pacific campaign, including island attacks and aftermaths of Nagasaki and Hiroshima bombings.
This documentary follows former New Jersey Governor Jim McGreevey as he reinvents himself after his extramarital affair scandal with another man.
The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai's offering follows five fallen angels who suffer love & loss amidst the crime & chaos of Hong Kong's neon nights.

name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them

info.plot: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.
Stephen Fry embarks on a journey to discover the stories behind some of the world's most fantastic beasts that have inspired myths and legends in history, story-telling and film.

name: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald

info.plot: To prevent Grindelwald from ruling over all non-magical beings, Albus Dumbledore joins forces with his former student Newt Scamander to take him down.

name: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore

info.plot: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful Dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world.
A middle-class mother takes a call centre job due to her financial reasons, and that gives her freedom, but it leads into a web of dangers.
Brian O'Conner, now working for the FBI in LA, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.
Dom Toretto's peace and quiet is shattered when the sins of his past catches up to him in the form of his forsaken brother, putting the lives of his loves ones in danger.
Dom Toretto's peace and quiet is shattered when the sins of his past catches up to him in the form of his forsaken brother, putting the lives of his loves ones in danger.
Despite their dislike of each other, Luke Hobbs and Deckard Shaw must work together to take down a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist, Brixton.
The tenth and final chapter to the movie franchise, the film chronicles Dom Toretto and his family confronting the most lethal opponent they've ever faced.
The film consists of three short horror stories: A man received a haunted mail predicting his death; A man mourns the death of his beloved wife; Three brothers clashes over dinner.
A writer as a single father tries to get back on his feet and tries to regain custody of his daughter after he suffers a psychotic episode due to a tragic accident.
Based on a true story about a band that performs a great gig in Chuncheon, and stay on for a good contract, but soon get more than they bargained for.

Min-Kyung struggles with all the costs she has to pay and all the hardships she faces, due to the bad decisions she keeps making. To make matters worse, she keeps turning down chances at a fresh start.

Felicite is a singer who desperately needs money when her 14-year-old son Samo suffers a serious accident. She soon finds financial and emotional support from Tabu, a regular in the bar where she performs.
Set in 1950s Pittsburgh, Fences takes a passionate look at former Negro-league baseball player Troy Maxson and his family.

name: Fengshen the Fall of King Zhou

info.plot: When King Zhou defied divine orders & offended the gods, a stage was set for an epic war spanning years involving the human, divine and demonic realms.
A young woman goes to Malaysia in search of a cure for her disease and her spiritual roots.
Golnar goes to Tehran seeking a red Ferrari to fulfil her dreams. Nader, a cab driver, tries to return her to the realities of life but they get involved in some adventures.
In the aftermath of a tragedy at a summer camp, a group of camp counselors find themselves fighting for their lives against a masked killer.
Sabahan filmmaker Myles Storey in search of Solo, a white-handed gibbon believed to be the last of his kind in an isolated forest in KL. See the direct impact from human development to wildlife.
Finding the Way Home is a window to the painful realities of the eight million children living in orphanages around the world.
An adaptation of Stephen King's classic thriller, a girl with extraordinary pyrokinetic powers struggles to protect her family from the sinister forces seeking to capture her.
The last day of school turns into a nightmare for two high school teachers as they settle their differences the hard way.
Follows Audrey, an enthusiastic Christmas-obsessed fitness instructor who begins a holiday romance with a charming, mysterious businessman.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's [A Look Inside]

info.plot: Go behind the scenes. Rent the movie on Astro First now.
Go behind the scenes. Rent the movie on Astro First now.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's [For the Fans]

info.plot: Go behind the scenes. Rent the movie on Astro First now.
Watch an Extended Preview of Five Nights At Freddy's. Rent the movie on Astro First now.
Watch a Trailer of Five Nights At Freddy's. Rent the movie on Astro First now.
Based on a true story, an earthquake causes the gas pipes in an industrial park to break, resulting in explosions & fires in the area. Firefighters must fight to safeguard lives, including their own.
When a Chinese dumpling learns of a technology that can remove the lucky coin lodged in her head, she & her friend, a plump bun, barrel into a journey full of shocks & surprises.
Soon-to-be-married Ben encounters an exciting stranger after his plane is struck by a natural disaster.
A court police with an anger issue accidentally lets a domestic violence offender escape. He goes on to recapture the man & to learn to seek forgiveness from his family.
A retired CIA agent and his son are besieged in a high-tech bunker by a group of criminals. Are its steel walls and advanced weapons enough to stop them?
Weeks after the deadly assault on the Fortress, a new attack breaks out and retired CIA agent Robert Michaels is confronted with a familiar face he thought he'd never see again.
Set in Seoul right after the Korean War, a kung-fu master, combat instructor, explosives expert & missiles specialist take on a drug smuggling ring.
Short Film - An elderly man seeks to reconnect with his estranged son, after a traumatic incident in their family.
A girl with supernatural abilities is kept locked up at home and forbidden to see the outside world. She finally escapes, only to set in motion a series of horrifying discoveries and death.
A mystical, ancient dagger causes a notorious serial killer to magically switch bodies with a 17-year-old girl.
After escaping slavery at age 20, Frederick Douglass went on to become the most famous Black man in the 19th century, known for the power of his words.

Under a tin-gray sky in a hollowed-out corner of northern China, a stranger arrives bearing magical soap - but a sniff will cost you dear. Nearby, two unenthused cops try to crack a seemingly simple case.
The brand new four-part story follows Haruka Nanase, Rin Matsuoka and friends as they embark on the next stage of their lives after high school graduation.
In the last summer before graduation, Haruka Nanase, a third-year high school student at Iwatobi High School, finds himself lost and uncertain about his future after graduation.
Since young, Rin Matsuoka has been working hard to fulfil his deceased father's dream of being on the world stage as a professional swimmer.
Hilary Swank is a committed teacher who must find a way to bring her racially disparate class together in the shadow of the LA riots.

name: Frequently Asked Questions About Time Travel

info.plot: A trio of social misfits stumbles into a time-travel conundrum and set off on a wild adventure that carries them through alternate dimensions.
Award-winning Korean film that follows four childhood friends whose lives take difficult turns when two of them end up on opposing sides of a violent gang war.
This sequel to the box-office hit Friend picks up 17 years after the events from the last film. After serving a 17-year prison sentence, Joon-suk is released to a vastly changed and unfamiliar world.
Three friends, who are extremely close, face many complications after several people plot to break them apart.

A group of high schoolers play a twisted game where their friendship is put to the ultimate test, in order for them to win a large sum of money to pay off debts. In this final stage,can they pull through?
The first of a two-part live-action adaptation of popular manga series "Tomodachi Game", about a reality game that its friends against each other in the pursuit of money.

After 2 million yen worth of money for a school trip vanishes, 5 friend become caught up in a "Tomodachi Game" that puts their friendship to the ultimate test. Can they trust each other and win the game?

name: Friends Games The Movie Final Part

info.plot: A group of high schoolers play a twisted game where their friendship is put to the ultimate test, in order for them to win a large sum of money to pay off debts. In this final stage, can they pull through?
A retired spy Ling Ling Chat, now a meat vendor is brought in to investigate a case after a giant dinosaur skull is stolen.
Dewi finally realizes her mistake when she finds out about Sean's affair with Suzan, who eventually decides to follow Lukman to Bali.
Chow Yun Fat stars as a retired gambling genius who is challenged to a high stakes game to elicit his kidnapped daughter's freedom.
After foiling the criminal plans of the international money-laundering syndicate DOA, our hero from Macau, Ken, is ready to sit back and enjoy life.
The latest sequel to the action-comedy FROM VEGAS to MACAU brings Andy Lau & Jacky Cheung back in a power-packed new tale.
A group of employees is tasked with handling the meltdown of the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant after the 2011 earthquake and tsunami.

Night vigils are done at funerals as the dead's souls are said to linger three days after death. Si is a gambler who only goes home when he needs money from his mother and is not around when she dies.
3 friends facing tragedies while deliver a bag of black money. Cast : Manikandan.
Piah became known when a video of her cooking with his grandmother went viral on social media. Piah was then offered to be K.O.L in a company in Kuala Lumpur and her life began to change
Gautham gets entangled in a medical conspiracy when he tries to fight against his nemesis, a top pharmaceutical company. Unfortunately, the two women in his life also fall victim to his fight.
Gajendra, an orphan, is brought up by his wealthy master and soon is to marry the latter's granddaughter.
The lives of six individuals across the city change just as the city is reeling under floods. Will they all make it safely to the other side?
It follows John McCain's 2008 presidential campaign, from his selection of Alaska Governor Sarah Palin as his running mate to their ultimate defeat in the general election.
A game night of murder mystery party with fake thugs and faux federal agents turns chaotic with unexpected twists.

name: Game of Thrones: The Last Watch

info.plot: The world's most ambitious and complicated TV show has come to an end. Prominent British filmmaker Jeanie Finlay shows an in-depth look at the creative process behind the making of final season.
On the night of Mikayla's 22nd birthday, her good friend Aima was murdered. Since that night, Mikayla's been stalked by a mysterious young man.
When notorious East Coast mob boss Mickey Cohen looks to set up his operations in L.A., it's up to a group of hard-nosed LAPD cops to take him down.
Edgy escapades starring Riki Lindhome and Kate Micucci, who portray roommates who enjoy a (small) measure of viral celebrity as their alter-egos "Garfunkel and Oates," a musical comedy duo.
A school teacher tries to prove her father's innocence, after he's accused of assaulting a child.
Gary Gulman offers candid reflections on his struggles with depression through stand-up and short documentary interludes that provide insight into his mental health journey.
In this follow-up to his Oscar nominated film Gasland, Josh Fox uses his trademark humor to take a deeper, look at the dangers of hydraulic fracturing.
A misguided man who wants a timid, subservient wife unknowingly ends up getting married to an intrepid wrestler. What happens when he learns the truth about his wife?
Kisah Hamdi dan Dolah yang memulakan perniagaan dodol tetapi sering disabotaj oleh Amira yang cemburu dengan perniagaan dua orang sahabat ini.
Story of a couple who are always at loggerhead.
A hoodlum faces challenges from a rival gangster and local police after falling in love and deciding to go straight.
An ex-convict is forced to take a road trip with her high school best friends in order to rescue her kidnapped mother from her old gang members.
Black is a failure of a gangster, being too soft hearted with people. After meeting Mawar, he is determined to change despite the objections of others.
The film is a fairy-tale comedy about a workaholic man who enlists the help of a magical genie to help win his family back before Christmas.
Mengisahkan mengenai Unit Gerak Khas yang ditugaskan untuk menghancurkan satu sindiket yang terlibat dalam kegiatan pengedaran VCD lucah dan pil ekstasi.
Mengisahkan Inspektor Mazlan dan Inspektor Aleeza ditugaskan untuk menyiasat tentang satu sindiket penyeludapan dadah terbesar di Malaysia yang diketuai oleh seorang penjenayah yang bernama Raziman.
Mengisahkan Unit Gerak Khas cuba menyelesaikan kes pembunuhan Suzana di sebuah pangsapuri mewah yang dipercayai mempunyai kaitan dengan Raymond.
Perisik kerajaan membongkar rahsia Komando Jeaman yang mengasaskan Perisik Rusia.
A record company intern is given two days to drag an uncooperative rock legend to Hollywood for a comeback concert.
Steve Carell is Maxwell Smart, a top-secret spy who blunders through every mission with Anne Hathaway, who stars as the sexy Agent 99.
A washed-up racer must drive as commanded by a mysterious man to save the life of his kidnapped wife.
This popular series depicts how little Joyce finds herself in a fantasy world where she meets her childhood hero - GG Bond. He's not the way she remembers, but goes all out to save her.
GG Bond & friends are back on a new mission to save the underwater world from an impending disaster! Alongside their new friend Bean Sprout, they search for his lost brother - and uncover a crisis.
Dani gembira mendapat peluang kedua apabila dia sedar daripada koma. Namun kegembiraan itu tak bertahan lama sebaik saja dia sedar bahawa hidupnya dikongkong oleh isteri yang 'psiko'.

Two exorcists capture their work on video and upload it to YouTube. They come to the attention of a production crew trying to save its TV show from cancellation. They get more than they bargained for.
A student is hired as a live-in nanny to a wealthy woman's little girl. But spooky things happen every night in the lonely secluded mansion. Will the truth be exposed?
A new doctor needs a job at a hospital believed to be haunted where he meets a beautiful nurse and they uncover the secrets found in the hospital.
In the near future, Major is the first of her kind: a human saved from a terrible crash, then cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.
Miyu's search for her missing sister takes a tragic turn for the worse when she she slowly uncovers the true identity lying beneath the masks of those whom she holds dear.
A pair of newlyweds buy a cursed property and soon, a streak of bad luck befalls them. A robbery leads to Mak falling into a coma and his wife Nak enslists the help of monks to exorcise him.
Skeptical professor Phillip Goodman embarks on a trip to the terrifying after being given a file with details of three unexplained cases of apparitions.
When roommates Brad and Sergio accidentally arouse the dead, they team up with sexy amateur ghost hunter, Fernanda, to expose the evil inside their home.
A photographer becomes entangled with a woman in red, leading to the deaths of his relatives. When the girl he likes dies mysteriously, he uncovers the secret of a "ghost marriage".
Aliah seorang gadis yang ingin berkahwin, mempunyai satu phobia dimana dia takut dengan acara perkahwinan itu sendiri setelah apa yang terjadi keatas dirinya semasa dia kecil.
Aliah seorang gadis yang ingin berkahwin tetapi mempunyai fobia takut dengan acara perkahwinan. Ada seorang jejaka berkongsi masalah yang sama Aliah.
Amir dan Mastura yang bakal menduduki peperiksaan SPM, melarikan Mastura ke selatan Thailand untuk bernikah. Dari sinilah bermulanya keriuhan dan kekecohan.
Kisah Rudi yang telah menjalinkan hubungan kekasih bersama Tasha, atau lebih dikenali sebagai "Girlfriend Dari Neraka".
Commodus takes over power and demotes Maximus, one of the preferred generals of his father, Emperor Marcus Aurelius. As a result, Maximus is relegated to fighting till death as a gladiator.
The Saint of Gamblers (Andy Lau) and the Saint of Gamblers (Stephen Chow) clash, then combine to defeat their master's nemesis.
Years after a nuclear disaster tore their family apart, a father and son reunite just as Godzilla re-emerges to battle beasts that threaten humanity.
As Monarch unearths clues to the origins of the Titans, a human conspiracy threatens to wipe Godzilla and Kong from earth forever.
A crypto-zoological agency faces off against the god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla who collides with his ultimate nemesis, King Ghidorah.
Rishi, the son of a wealthy man, leads a carefree lifestyle. However, his life changes when he meets Nila, a simple college student and gradually falls in love with her.
Sebuah filem remaja kontemporari, demi seorang lelaki, Putri sanggup belajar bermain futsal. [Tamat tempoh 48 jam selepas pembelian]
Zak and Yaya, two university students are assigned to do charitable works under disciplinary action by university management as an example to other students.
Tong Song suspects orchestrated incidents around An Yi. Tong Song's team vows to uncover the truth. Who plots against An Yi? Is there a real organization behind the attempted murder?

Former mercenaries reunite for a noble heist only to realize that one of them is double-crossing them. Filmed across Europe & Asia stars Ekin Cheng, Jordan Chan, Michael Tse, Jerry Lamb & Chin Ka Lok.
A group of former mercenaries working as con artists decides to get together again for one last heist. But, they unwittingly get caught up in a heist planned by an international drug lord.
Two private detectives hired to investigate a little girl's disappearance are faced with a moral dilemma that tears them apart.
The crew of a horror web series travels to an abandoned asylum for a live broadcast. They encounter much more than expected when they move deeper inside the nightmarish old building.
When his ski equipment business is about to fail, Samir is forced to represent his country as an athlete at the Winter Olympics.
A man must overcome his biggest life problem, snoring, as it starts straining his relationship with his newlywed wife.
Manohar, a schoolteacher, leads a dull and unexciting life after the death of his lover but turns of events soon changes that.
An original story by Nabil Ahmad, abut a weird scientist who tries to change his childhood friends' past by using a time machine, only to change the course of their lives for the worse.
Their love which flourished during their student days in Barcelona was tested when the wife was tempted with money and wealth by her ex-boyfriend.
A talented jockey Joo Hee is injured in an accident during a horse racing match and loss of her own horse. To overcome depression, she goes to Jeju Island where she meets a champion jockey Woo Suk.
A lady begin facing horrific incidents at night after knowing grandma's death
When debris destroys their shuttle, a medical engineer and a seasoned astronaut find themselves floating through space, with no connection to Earth.
Catch live performances and interviews from the 50th anniversary of the iconic New Orleans Jazz and Heritage Festival, an annual event showcasing the heritage of the region.

Greed makes us do the unthinkable, but what if the price for your prosperity was another person's death? Han Joon is torn between losing credibility as an author, and holding on to his fame and riches.
Drew Barrymore and Jessica Lange star in this award-winning HBO Original Movie based on the lives of eccentric relatives of Jackie Kennedy.

Surviving a near-fatal crash, Rachel wakes up and tries to convince those around her that Death is stalking her, but is incarcerated in a mental institution with others who had an identical experience.
Thirty years after their last title fight, two retired boxers and lifelong rivals decide to step into the ring once more to settle an old score once and for all.
Gubra continues from where Sepet left off whereby Orked is now happily married. There is also a second story about a bilal and his wife who befriended two prostitutes.
Married couple Anwar and Zarra encounter supernatural events since buying over a warehouse for their tiling enterprise. Will their marriage and family survive the hauntings?
Two investigators, down on their luck due to the pandemic, are hired to track down a ghost of a girl named Alice, who is said to be haunting a private college after her disappearance a year prior.
Meet the U.S. Army's unsung heroes: the five-ton moving monsters that defended convoys and shaped today's combat tactics. Watch the story of a weapon built by teen soldiers fighting to stay alive.
Guna, a mentally-disturbed man, imagines a fictitious character of a woman to be his future wife.
Gurindam Jiwa tells the story of Dahlan, a village youth who loves poetry and marries a village girl named Dahlia.
Guru, a young man who aspires to be successful, is very loyal to his playboy boss, Krishna.
The story of an honest police officer caught between the game of money and power.
Guy Ritchie's The Covenant follows US Army Sergeant John Kinley and Afghan interpreter Ahmed. After an ambush, Ahmed goes to Herculean lengths to save Kinley's life.
Wilson Cruz, Mickey Melendez, Carla Morrison, and many others celebrate and reflect on the U.S. Latinx experience in this new documentary special from the Habla series.
"Habla" is a documentary program featuring interviews with everyday heroes, a cadre of inspiring celebrities and influential Latinos from all walks of life.
Pleasantly plump teenager Tracy Turnblad teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.
Zahir experiences strange happenings when he gets married to Laila. When Adi, Zahir's friend tries to help Zahir and Laila, more unexpected paranormal incidents surface.
The Halloween franchise reaches its epic conclusion as Laurie Strode (Jamie Lee Curtis) faces off for the last time against Michael Myers. Only one of them will survive.
A meme virus starts spreading around the campus. Whoever receives it must share it along with their deepest darkest fears. If not, the thing you fear the most will hunt you down and murder you.
If you have ever had a mushroom trip, then this mind-bending horror flick from Indonesia will make sense, where a girl suffers from insane hallucinations after accidentally ingesting magic mushrooms.
In this Golden Horse winner starring Gordon Lam, a retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian drug mule.
Based on the legendary Admiral Hang Tuah of Malacca, and his four sworn brothers; Hang Jebat, Hang Kasturi, Hang Lekir and Hang Lekiu.
A detective and a criminal profiler pursue a serial killer whose crimes are inspired by a children's game called hangman.
Hani is a junior manga artist who returns to Malaysia but is troubled with her latest assignment related to a haunted doll.
A daughter returns to her hometown, only to be faced with contempt and fear from the locals who think that her return will only bring more tragedy. But is the truth really that obvious?
After meeting an mysterious girl on an dark stretch of road, a young salesman is invited to a beautiful house with bizarre secrets and no way to escape.
Story about five friends looking for a trick behind the term 'The Ghost Returns in the Morning' that haunts Penyu Village.
Joni and Zain are partners in distributing pirated discs in Kuala Lumpur. In one video, a girl appears to have been killed and found dead. Joni wants to take a chance to make a profit on the video.
Amran telah menang dalam perlumbaan motor haram dan diberi habuan bohsia, Maya. Ketika pulang, mereka kemalangan menyebabkan Maya mati. Sejak itu dia telah diganggu oleh hantu Maya.
A group of friends vacationing at Fraser's Hill meet a mysterious local girl, who directs them to a creepy hotel haunted by apparations and an old mystery.
Three friends are hiding a secret of burying a corpse, not realising the secret is about to become a nightmare.
Azri, Epul and Rina release a ghost that was caught by Nek Temah, the grandmother who cares for them and is a shaman.
A reckless rogue steals a ring, not knowing that it is haunted by the ghosts of three former gang leaders. Now, he must help them settle their final business before they can all rest in peace.
Damar brings his friends to his hometown but that turns out to be a fatal mistake. He learns of the curse that his family has inherited, and the ghost that terrorises them.

When Drajat's cigarette factory goes bust and he starts acting strangely, his worried son Ryan cannot rest until he uncovers why. All clues lead him to Gunung Kawi where he learns of a pact with the devil.

10 years after the success of Hantu Jeruk Purut, the original actresses return in this reboot of the original story, as though arisen again from the cemetery! This time round, the mystery is unravelled.
Kampung Pisang's hero, Husin, is finally home after working in Singapore for years. He discovers that his neighbor, Kak Limah, has been dead for days and has been haunting the whole village.
Crime does not pay for a group of scammers who are being dogged by the authorities. They think they have found the perfect hideout in a remote homestay, but Lady Luck is not smiling on them.
Mysterious incidents beset five friends after they bury a girl who was accidentally killed during a party.
The story tells of a woman who went missing in a village and became the talk of the villagers.
Salleh likes to take pictures of himself to upload to the internet. One day, Salleh accidentally captures a picture of himself with a beautiful ghost!
Mengisahkan 4 jenis hantu Pontianak kg Batu, Kum Kum, Tangisan Langsuir dan Penanggal. Keempat empat hantu ni berpindah ke kampung baru dengan niat nak bertaubat.
Kampung Lenggong is in trouble, a ghost in prayer garment is seen around, leading the villagers to accuse the Penghulu for being the reason

The hilarious story of an expert in traditional circumcision rituals who is ashamed when he fails to properly circumcise the village headman's son. Tragedy follows when his ghost returns to take revenge.
Ustazah Supiah sering dibuli oleh anak muridnya sehingga satu hari, dia hilang sabar dan menghilangkan diri. Suatu hari Ustazah Supiah kembali sebagai hantu dan mengganggu mereka semua.

Saleh still misses Emma, and hopes that Emma is still with him. Reza turns into a ghost after committing suicide in prison and wants revenge on Saleh. Does Saleh survive being haunted by Reza's ghost?
Three childhood friends who spend all their time together, also happen to have feelings for the same girl, Laila. But then Laila returns to the village, and spooky incidents happen inexplicably.
Filmmaker Jamie Redford embarks on an enlightening cross-country journey to discover the current state of clean energy and see what lies on the horizon.
Tom and Janet's friends are jealous of their lustful relationship. When a visit from a mysterious stranger leads to a dead body, they begin to question the loyalty of their so-called friends.
A rewinding thriller that follows a college student who relives the day of her murder until she discovers her killer's identity.

name: Happy Little Submarine : 20000 Leagues Under the Sea

info.plot: In this Chinese animated adventure film, Ali, the little submarine & friends begin an adventure 20,000 leagues under the sea. As they track a mysterious 'sea monster', a shock awaits!
This Chinese animation film follows Ali, the little submarine, and Beibei on a thrilling adventure to help the alien baby WUGU to find his parents. A challenging quest lies ahead!

name: Happy Little Submarines : Adventure of Octopus

info.plot: This Chinese animated adventure follows the little submarine Olly, Bebe & the family as they help Paul, the octopus, investigate the mystery of the one-eyed shark & find his family.

name: Happy Little Submarines : Magic Box of Time

info.plot: This Chinese animated adventure follows Olly the submarine & friends on a treasure hunt - and a quest to save the underwater world, after little Mesa's magic box goes missing.
This China animation film depicts the adventures of little submarine Nick, Bebe, Mumble & the family, as they seek the legendary rainbow treasure.
Marcos is used to living a marginalized life, but after a tragic event, his life takes an unexpected and unexpected turn.
On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.
Dokumentari istimewa yang mengisahkan perjalanan pasukan Harimau Malaya untuk melayakkan diri menyertai Sukan Olimpik Moscow 1980.
Toshio hires his old acquaintance and ex-con Yasaka in his workshop. Soon, Yasaka begins to meddle in Toshio's family life.

name: Harry Potter & the Deathly Hallows Pt 1

info.plot: The story follows Harry Potter on a quest to find and destroy Lord Voldemort's secret to immortality – the Horcruxes.

name: Harry Potter & the Deathly Hallows Pt 2

info.plot: Harry, Ron and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

name: Harry Potter & the Order of the Phoenix

info.plot: The story follows Harry Potter's fifth year at Hogwarts as the Ministry of Magic is in denial of Lord Voldemort's return.

name: Harry Potter 20th Anniversary - Return to Hogwarts

info.plot: The cast members across all eight Harry Potter films reunite to celebrate the 20th anniversary of the franchise's first film, Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone.

name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

info.plot: The story follows Harry Potter's second year at Hogwarts as the Heir of Salazar Slytherin opens the Chamber of Secrets, unleashing a deadly monster that petrifies the school's pupils.

name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

info.plot: The story follows Harry Potter's fourth year at Hogwarts as he is chosen by the Goblet of Fire to compete in the Tri-wizard Tournament.

name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

info.plot: The story follows Harry Potter's sixth year at Hogwarts as he becomes obsessed with a mysterious textbook, falls in love, and attempts to retrieve a memory that holds the key to Lord Voldemort's downfall.

name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

info.plot: The story follows Harry Potter's third year at Hogwarts as he is informed that a prisoner named Sirius Black has escaped from Azkaban and wants to murder him.

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

info.plot: The story follows Harry Potter's first year at Hogwarts as he discovers that he is a famous wizard and begins his magical education.
After a mental breakdown, a young and angry loner awakes to find that a man has been reported missing, and he just may be the killer.
Hati Batu tells the story of two siblings from an unsanctioned marriage who became victims of their grandfather's abuse
Menceritakan kisah cinta Anuar yang terpaksa memilih antara cinta pertamanya, Qistina yang koma selama 10 tahun dan isteri keduanya Lara yang begitu menyayanginya sehingga sanggup menjadi madunya.
A horror omnibus of three shocking tales that are bound to send chills down your spine, taking place in various locations around Thailand.
Catch three of the scariest tales ever told around the campus bonfire: The "C" Bed, The Final Year's Cheer and The Old Science Building.
A team of researchers set out to investigate a disappearance on the high seas.
Pitchfork is back to terrorise the survivors of the Hayride Massacre, and hunt down everyone else in the hospital.
Aguli's Wolf Guards attack Liulei city for treasure and Shi Tian Jiao. General Shi Wan Fu and Xiao Bu Ping's curses defeat them, saving the city and Shi Tian Jiao.
Claire, an ambitious young woman, starts working for a successful and rich businessman, but unknowingly gets involved in an affair with his wife.
Fans of "found-footage" horror should not miss these three short tales made up of images from surveillance cameras set up in a creepy mansion, a convenience store and finally, in a broken lift.
Ibrahim, Musa dan Anis adalah perompak professional. Ibrahim dihantui dengan iklan-iklan hari raya bertemakan keluarga yang menyentuh hati kerana tidak pernah merasai Aidilfitri bersama keluarga.
Misi kali ini ialah misi mustahil apabila Geng Tiga Malam terpaksa mempertaruhkan nyawa mereka di liga yang berbeza. Sebuah medan pertempuran yang tidak pernah dijejaki mereka.

In a gory twist to the usual coming-of-age trope, a lonely teen longs for companionship and cannot fathom why her mother keeps her away from other people. All hell breaks loose when a secret is uncovered.
An HBO Original that follows gawky English transplant, Stuart Pritchard, as he continues to struggle in finding excitement, romance, and maybe even a soul mate.
Inspired by K-pop culture, this popular Thai romcom is about a couple who met by coincidence while on vacation in Korea, getting closer while keeping their names a secret.
Middle-aged Frank has Tourette's syndrom. When his caregiver dies, he suddenly faces the world alone. Worried for him, the caregiver's daughter Laura takes him along on a life-changing road-trip.
Two friends are haunted by their childhood ghost, revealing their hidden past.
High schooler Aoi falls in love with Shinno, not knowing he is the younger version of her sister's ex-boyfriend who time-travelled back 13 years from the future.

Mami is a drop-out and recluse. Her father finds her a job debugging videogames. She silently plays videogames for a job that wasn't supposed to involve talking with anyone, but things don't go as planned.
A struggling actor dies right after a bad breakup and finds himself in an afterlife where he's told that he must find true love in order for his soul to move on to the other side.
A group of firefighters are investigating the illegal selling of land, done by an international gang of criminals.
Jude, a mathematical genius with poor social skills, visits Goa with his parents after the demise of his aunt. There, his life changes completely after he meets Crystal.
When his wife, Aparna, is raped during the Partition, Saket is unable to cope with his tragic loss. He joins a gang who want to kill Mahatma Gandhi because he advocates peace with Muslims.
Kisah seorang lelaki muda dan kaya (Zain Hamid) yang selama ini menjalani hidup secara mewah dan bebas, tiba-tiba didatangi seorang budak perempuan yang mengaku sebagai anaknya!
Raykal and Soraya, two teenagers who have just reached adulthood, begin their adult lives with tragedy.
Mika, Nizam and the crew head off for Highland Towers to shoot a paranormal activity documentary. The moment they arrive on the spot, things spiral out uncontrollably.
A grieving mother met a homeless young family taking shelter in highway rest areas when they asks her for money.
Mak Yah suffers from Alzheimer and is taken care of by her ailing husband Pak Brahim, whose only source of help is Arman - their illegal immigrant adopted son.
As a result of opening his 'hijab', a man lives in terrified when he always sees a ghost family in his house.

Eva is diagnosed with cancer and prays that she could travel back to the past in order to prevent the love between her and her husband so that her husband can lead a happy life. Her prayer is granted…
Sekumpulan pelajar nakal dikenakan denda membersihkan kawasan kolej selama seminggu dan ditempatkan di dalam dorm yang menyeramkan.
A talented underdog gets momentarily sidelined from chasing her musical dreams when her van breaks down in a small town just before Christmas.
Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.
Honey Daniels is a struggling hip hop dancer who's got all the moves, talent and relentless passion to succeed, and now her dream is just a step away.
Chi-ho is a successful product designer. Il-young works in a loan company. They meet at her company when he try to pay his brother's debt. Coincidence brings them to become closer.

name: Honk For Jesus, Save Your Soul

info.plot: In the aftermath of a huge scandal, the proud first lady of a Southern Baptist Church and her pastor-husband attempt to rebuild their nearly non-existent congregation, making the biggest comeback that comm
A young lad travels to a remote temple on an island to visit his brother, only to discover him missing after being framed for murder and theft. Now he has to uncover the truth behind the mystery.

When 4 cops attempt to avenge the murder of their captain by gangsters, a war ensues between the 2 factions. But they soon find that they are not alone. Will they join forces in their quest to survive?
The story follows a girl sneaking into a college hostel for boys with the help of a group of boys trying to keep her hidden from the eyes of their warden.
When a Russian nuclear submarine collides with an American submarine, the two captains must work together to prevent a nuclear meltdown.
A family falls victim to unimaginable terror when they invite their sweet young neighbors over for Xmas dinner.
A small and quiet port in Busan outskirt became the battlefield of local gangsters.
A living family bought an uninhabited house and have moved in. An elderly ghost couple Pannir & Pushpam step up their scare game and have to chase the family out before it's too late.

Teenager Vicki is held captive and terrorised by a disturbed couple and must find a way to escape - by driving a wedge between her captors. But her efforts backfire and Vicki has one chance left to escape.
After a car crash, a doctor is held hostage by escaped prison inmates in a large house in the woods. But the doctor discovers that the violent convicts are not the most fearsome ones in the house.
Two friends throw the party of the year. At LeBron James' House. What could go wrong?
A woman who is under house arrest is trapped in her haunted childhood home with her irritating mother, and she has nowhere to hide.

name: How Do You Measure A Year?
