info.plot: For 17 years we watch Ella grow as her father, filmmaker Jay Rosenblatt, asks her the same questions on her birthday.

When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World

info.plot: When Berk befalls the darkest threat in the history, Hiccup and Toothless must journey to a hidden world that is thought to be mythical, and to fight to protect everything they have grown to treasure.
A newlywed couple's relationship is tested by the pandemic & return of an ex-boyfriend. See if their new union can take the strain in this CNY must-watch telemovie.
Weary of fulfilling countless human wishes in the new year, the Holy Queen Mother escapes duty by sneaking away. When General Pigsy is assigned to get her, chaos follows in the mortal world.
Catch the hilarious battle of the zodiacs! Freddie Ng and Yuan Yang bring laughter as they compete to help a lady find her Mr. Right! Also starring Kevin Soo, Min, Yoke Chen and other local artistes.
A young orphan, who lives alone in a railway station in Paris in the 1930s, searches for a key to his most treasured possession; his late father's automaton.

It is about composer Amirís tragic relationship with singer, Aminah. Their four-year marriage is spoiled by Aminahís affair with Hassan, whom she ultimately decides to run off with, bringing her son along.
Qi Hua is devastated after her fiancée died in an accident. As suggested by her best friend, Qi Hua uses witchcraft to mix her fiancée's ashes into a porcelain vase…
The infamous Kg. Pisang is once again the centre of strange events when Husin returns to the village from Singapore.
A boy is raised by five fathers who is attached to the criminal underworld. A sinister past is about to be revealed as he is forced to join the killing spree.
Lingesan, a successful model, falls in love with his co-model Diya and the two decide to marry. However, their happiness is short-lived as he starts suffering from physical deformities.

name: I Am an Animal: The Story of Ingrid Newkirk and Peta

info.plot: A documentary about Ingrid Newkirk, president and co-founder of Peta, who sparks worldwide controversies with her radical campaigns for animal rights.
This documentary explores why hundreds of thousands of rape kits are untested, and how victims and advocates are taking critical steps to solve long-neglected cases of sexual assault.
Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.
A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.
The story of the history-making Nottingham Forest team that won back-to-back European Cups in 1979 and 1980, led by the mercurial Brian Clough and his assistant Peter Taylor.
In this comedy that explores what it truly means to be a friend, a successful realtor embarks on a series of "man dates" to find a best man for his wedding.
I Not Stupid Too is a comedy keenly centred on the theme of increasingly difficult relationships between parents and their children today, due to a lack of communication.

name: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry

info.plot: Two straight, single best friends pretend to be a gay couple to receive domestic partner benefits on an insurance form. Things get complicated when an agent decides to verify their story.
An uplifting sports drama focusing on a property agent who leads an aimless, unfulfilling life & his P.E teacher, as they seek to find purpose in their lives.

name: I Want to Eat Your Pancreas

info.plot: Haruki happens to find a diary in a hospital. The diary belongs to his classmate, Sakura, who is revealed to be suffering from a terminal illness, and only has a few months left to live.
Five cousin reunite at the house of their recently deceased grandmother, where they discover a curious board game that will grant any wishes, at a heavy price.
After a heart attack at work, Daniel Blake is declared unfit for work. Now, he must battle a broken system in order to receive welfare benefits.
A demon possession of an innocent girl prompts a doctor and a police to uncover the connection between the demon within her and a recent suicide case.
A couple and their adopted children move to a quaint house in the tranquil foothills of Mount Salak while they await the arrival of a new addition to their family. But the house is not what it seems…
Raimy bercita-cita menjadi peniup trompet akhirnya berjaya dan terkenal di Singapura. Ratna mengatur rancangan untuk mengikis Raimy dan merosakkan hubungan dengan ibunya Raiha.
Saiful, budak lelaki berusia 9 tahun menyembunyikan rahsia besar di mana ibunya telah pun meninggal dunia di dalam bilik selama sebulan.

Kassim Selamat, a poor musician falls in love with, and marries, Sabariah, the only daughter of a wealthy woman. But their happiness is destroyed through the machinations of Sabariahís arrogant mother.

Amassing close to $20 billion dollars over the last half century and at the forefront of some of the most legendary business deals of our times, Carl Icahn is a feared negotiator and master strategist in t
This documentary highlights the effects of excess carbon on the Earth, and how some humans are innovating cutting-edge efforts to mitigate climate change.
A 12-year-old Honduran boy, is forced to flee his home and seek asylum in the United States, only to find himself trapped in the U.S. immigration system.
Ida "Red" Walker may not survive her terminal illness while incarcerated for armed robbery. She turns to her son, Wyatt, for one last job and a chance to regain her freedom.
Prakash, who is diagnosed with terminal cancer, and Geethanjali, an equally ill patient, fall in love with each other.
The descendants of two men who betrayed a royal family centuries ago gets caught up in a series of events that involve ghosts, revenge and a kidnapping.

After the death of her father, Olivia moves back in with her mother. When her mother breaks her hip, Olivia hires health aide Jake, who seems too good to be true. Can she trust him to keep her mother safe?
The 1st Asian New Media FF's Best Actress Chrissie Chau reunites with Ekin Cheng in this story of three jilted men, who decide to invest in android girlfriends.

A story that revolves around Sevinder Singh who believes that all his married sons should stay under one roof with him. He was shattered after his youngest son brought his newlywed wife all of a sudden.
A man meets a woman and a new story begins, one they will write together. After a time, their mutual story diverges, and mind games ensue. Who is a hunter? Who is the hunted?
Four Filipino migrants in Japan struggle to survive life in a foreign country as conditions become increasingly difficult for them.

A series of strange events is happening in a village, including a corpse that resurrected from its grave. Police investigation ensues, but as things start to unveil, another mysterious find is uncovered.
Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.
Don Johnson leads a group of men in the fight to save the cavalry's last horses from slaughter.
After discovering their respective spouses' infidelity, Mo Wan and Li Zhen begin an affair of their own. Tony Leung won Best Actor at the 53rd Cannes Film Festival for his leading role.

name: In the Shadow of the Towers: Stuyvesant High on 9/11

info.plot: The documentary offers a unique eyewitness perspective on that tragic day and its aftermath from former Stuyvesant students.
When a poor, working-class man is falsely accused of murder, he teams up with an heiress to bring down the corrupt system before their time runs out.
A thief, who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

Putera raja kembar yg lahir dengan senjata hikmat. Senjata anak panah bernama Panca Indera, kepunyaan Putera Indera Shahperi dan senjata pedang pula bernama Panca Alam, kepunyaan Putera Indera Bangsawan.

An honest veteran, having served in the Indian Army, decides to teach corrupt officials a lesson. He targets officials, ministers and bureaucrats to make them work diligently without accepting bribes.
A rare screening of a Venezuelan film, banned in its home country for criticizing Chavismo, tells of an outbreak of a new rabies virus in Venezuela and a father trying to save his son from contagion.
From the award-winning team behind the mind-blowing blockbuster, the secrets, finally revealed in this highly anticipated prequel.

A private investigator who specialises in exposing lecherous, cheating husbands thinks she's met the love of her life in a chance encounter but as it turns out, this dream man may be her worst nightmare.
Jane is trapped in a parallel universe and is forced to find a way to alter her reality before it is too late.

News channel employee Hasret has had recurring nightmares, leading her to question whether her parents really were killed in a traffic accident 20 years ago, or if they died in some other, horrific way?
It's a story of how Jewish US soldiers and a theatre owner were both planning to assassinate Nazi leaders in France during World War II.
Based on a real-life story, the film focuses on Ahn Jung-in, a lawyer who uncovers the secrets of a small village while defending her estranged mother in a murder trial.
After children go missing in a town and the adults around the missing children die suspiciously, local newspaper reporter Shunya Ezaki begins to investigate the truth behind the strange deaths.
Behind-the-scenes footage and interviews with cast/crew/producers/writers on the larger cultural impact of INSECURE.
Two disabled men, not related to each other, become like brothers after living together for 20 years.
A high-end art thief becomes trapped in a luxury high-tech penthouse when his heist does not go as planned.
The Lambert family seeks to uncover the childhood secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world.
Psychic Elise Rainier reluctantly agrees to use her ability to contact the dead in order to help a girl who has been targeted by a dangerous supernatural entity.
Parapsychologist Dr. Elise Rainier faces her most fearsome and personal haunting yet - in her own family home.
Penderitaan tiga orang adik-beradik yang kehilangan ibu dan bapa mereka akibat suatu kemalangan maut.
When a bribery trial is delayed after the defendant absconds & only witness goes missing, the ICAC launches a full-scale operation to track them down.
A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
A college professor, claims a mythical forest creature killed his wife transforming him into a man haunted by obsession and revenge.
A continuation of 2002's The Gathering Storm, the film concentrate on British Prime Minister Winston Churchill during World War II.
Three men break into Anna's house, assuming it to be empty. However, the thieves have no idea what they have gotten themselves into.
A future that's reality is a far cry from the one we live in today. The Earth has been sent out of control, affected by a cruel and inhuman mechanism that turns back Darwin's theory of Evolution.
A cop races against time to get hold of a psychopath, who is also the reason behind the deaths of his loved ones.
A group of women activists encounter various struggles and make many sacrifices in order to claim the rights of women in the upcoming generations.
Iron Monkey teams up with a band of revolutionaries to fight a malevolent gang of weapon smugglers and takes revenge for his friend's death.
An independent young woman, who stays alone in her apartment, is murdered by a stranger. Who is the killer and what forced the person to take her life?

A grumpy boxing coach takes on a young, rebellious woman under his wings and starts training her for a world championship. Little that he knows, their biggest battle has to be fought outside the ring.
Follows three couples, navigating inevitable challenges, and seeking self-discovery to salvage their relationships
When a car breakdown forces a couple to seek shelter in a nearby home, conversations with the stranger inside soon suggest there's a killer among them.
Shot mainly in a haunted hotel, this is a found-footage film about the search for a missing person.
Anandan, a struggling actor, shares a bond with a writer who is part of a political party.
A cop goes undercover in a prison to find a murderer. When the prison warden enrols him and other inmates for a secret mission, he finally finds the murderer.
Seorang pencuri telah melarikan kasut Ismadi dan kemudiannya lari sehingga dia telah mati dilanggar.
A group of friends head in to a local cave for a bit of spelunking. They find themselves hunted down by a creature... from another world.
An inside look at the migration crisis in Europe, focusing on refugees in search of a better future and the Italian locals who are left to cope with the tremendous influx of newcomers.

name: It's a Hard Truth Ain't It

info.plot: Filmed at Indiana's Pendleton Correctional Facility and co-directed by 13 incarcerated men, the documentary follows them as they reflect on their lives and the consequences of their crimes.
Twenty-seven years later, the Losers Club have grown up and gone their separate ways, until a devastating phone call brings them back.
The film revolves around the reunion of former students from a 2004 batch class fifteen years after their graduation.
The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.
In the 1980s, an estranged family hires a cult deprogrammer to take back their teenage son from a murderous cult. They are under siege when the cultists surround their cabin, demanding the boy back.
When a solemnization ceremony is cancelled due to stolen bride wealth, an adjuster reveals a sabotage among the family and friends respectively.
The story revolves around two brothers who trying to full fill his grandfathers wish of getting reunited with his children.
When a skillful and carefree gangster is recruited by a foreign underworld baron to take out a rival, the moral dilemmas that ensue take him by surprise.
Amal dan Nina adalah pasangan suami isteri yang kurang menjaga hubungan dengan Tuhan. Setelah didesak ibunya untuk kembali ke jalan benar, Amal mula berkenalan dengan Ustaz bernama Malik.
A pregnant woman from a tribal community is desperately searching for her husband, who is missing from police custody. An advocate rises in support to find her husband and seek justice for them.
A common man decides to rise up and change the state of education in the country.
Arjun, a computer engineer, fights for the poor people's right to education. He demands that all private schools be nationalised.
Three youngsters in a resettlement colony that houses people displaced from their neighbourhood because of gentrification try to chart out a life for themselves.
Empat sekawan cuba mematahkan rancangan seorang lelaki yang cuba merosakkan gadis-gadis jalanan dengan membawa mereka ke jalan yang haram.
This film by Dharma Aizat tells of the tales told by those who experienced strange and mysterious happenings while travelling through Jalan Puncak Alam.

Fadil seorang usahawan yang berjaya dan hidup mewah dengan isterinya Aisyah dan anaknya AJ. Tetapi dia lupa pada tanggungjawab sebagai seorang Islam. Akhirnya tuhan menarik balik kemewahan dan perniagaan d
Kisah perjalanan Jamil pulang ke kampung untuk meminang kekasihnya setelah pinangannya pernah ditolak beberapa kali. Berjayakah misi Jamil kali ini?
Dengan bantuan bomoh, Kamil telah berjaya memikat Rosnah seorang janda muda namun keputusan Rosnah untuk berhijrah ke Kuala Lumpur telah membuat Kamil kecewa.
An intimate look at Oscar®-winner Jane Fonda's journey, which was marked by controversy, tragedy and transformation.
Julia is a Sarawakian girl who goes to Kuala Lumpur to plan her wedding to Farid. But to she unknowingly uses a hairpin belonging to Janet, who had been a ritual sacrifice in building a bridge.
A hiker stubbornly ignores advice not to listen to a paranormal radio show when he is alone. He ends up getting followed around by a ghost. Now he must literally "radio" for help.
Hidup Lina yang kaya-raya menjadi porak peranda apabila dia terpaksa tinggal serumah dengan Afiq setelah di'scam' oleh suaminya sendiri
This horror comedy is a parody on the hit film with the same name. In this story, Dharma must solve the mystery behind the death of this girlfriend, Rose, who is thought to have committed suicide.
Four friends take turns experiencing unspeakable terror whenever they find themselves alone. The ghouls are hunting them down one by one, but what exactly are the spirits looking for?

name: Jangan Takut, Kalau Kau Takut, Aku Pun Takut

info.plot: The delinquents make the journey to KL after being thrown out of their homes. They hitched a ride with a girl named Malaika, starting a road trip filled with horror stories to last a lifetime.
After waking from a coma as a result of a terrible motor accident, Natasya begins experiencing supernatural encounters with a girl who disappeared mysteriously 2 years ago.
A neurosurgeon who is stuck in a time loop tries to save his estranged wife from being killed by a mystery man.
Kisah misteri seorang lelaki bernama Jantan yang meninggal dunia dan jenazahnya tidak mampu di angkat untuk dikebumikan. Apakah sebenarnya yang berlaku di sebalik kejadian tersebut?
Seorang anak lelaki merasakan menjaga ibu yang sakit sebagai beban telah bertukar menjadi redha dengan ketentuan Ilahi.
A daring robbery in a jewellery showroom kickstarts the hunt for Japan, a notorious robber, who is a law unto himself.
Former CIA assassin and psychogenic amnesiac Jason Bourne is drawn out of hiding to uncover more explosive truths about his past.

Jay-Jie dan Cik B-Yonchey sengit bersaing untuk menjadi rapper muda terbaik di Malaysia. Namun, mereka terpaksa mengetepikan perasaan benci mereka apabila ditugaskan untuk berduet dalam lagu Raya terbaru.
Madhumita and Vishwanathan fall in love with each other but his father disapproves of the relationship as he wants his twin sons to marry two identical twins.
An ex-gangster leader is forced to confront his past when his new family's safety is threatened.
On an eventful New Year's Eve, three close friends face different problems and are forced to resolve them as soon as possible.
Forced to travel with her boyfriend to a horror festival, Laine begins to experience unexplained premonitions and disturbing visions associated with the urban myth of The Creeper.
Jeeva, an unemployed youth, lives an ordinary life with his widowed mother and younger sister. His life turns upside down when his family gets murdered.
Three gangsters have RM15 million to invest in World Cup gambling. Zack accepts a job from Malek to steal the money from them, but nothing seems to go as planned.
Three drug dealers, Jil, Jung and Juk, who are assigned the task of transporting a car coated with cocaine paint, get drunk and mistakenly drive off in a similar-looking vehicle.
Darshan and Hema wished desperately for their parents to understand them better and their wish was granted in the strangest of ways; when they unexpectedly swap bodies with their parents!
When Ray finds out about the existence of a genie in the resort, Ray tries to dig into the history of the genie as well as the history of the resort and the people around.
Kannan falls in love with Gayathri but both decide to win the hearts of each other's family members and marry with their consent.
Two rival families decides to marry off their children in order to gain peace, however, their children has different ideas
Megat returns to his village to be married off to a woman of his mother's choice. Awang and Kulup, are tasked by Tok Chai to look for a dead body to bring back to life.
The romance of a young man who is in love with his college mate ends in heartbreak. Can he find happiness again?

name: John McCain: For Whom the Bell Tolls

info.plot: In-depth look at the life of John McCain, from his time as a POW in Vietnam to his three decades of service in the US Senate.
Johnny is a half-human, half-zombie, who, under the guidance of a martial arts master, seeks vengeance on the evil corporation that created him.
During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.
Aruljothi is a young pregnant woman. Somehow by the time of her adjunct absence, her unborn toddler is dislodged and abducted from her womb mysteriously.

name: Journey to the Center of the Earth

info.plot: On a quest to find out what happened to his missing brother, a scientist, his nephew and their mountain guide discover a fantastic and dangerous lost world in the center of the earth.
The story of Fred Hampton, Chairman of the Illinois Black Panther Party, and his fateful betrayal by FBI informant William O'Neal.
2 gadis kilang memenangi percutian menginap di hotel mewah dan mereka mula bergaya seperti anak orang kaya

Telemovie sekuel Jula Juli Bintang Cinta kini kembali! Kali ini, Jula dan Juli mengalami konflik percintaan dengan Dani & Izham sehingga mereka memutuskan untuk berpisah dan melarikan diri ke kampung Juli.
A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Alan Grant to go to Isla Sorna (the second InGen dinosaur lab), resulting in an unexpected landing and unexpected new inhabitants on the island.
The park is up-and-running on Isla Nublar, but visitor rates are declining. In order to re-spark visitor's interest, a new attraction is created - a hybrid dinosaur, which backfires horribly.
Four years after Isla Nublar's destruction, Earth is once again dominated by prehistoric predators, prompting two generations of heroes to unite to save the destiny of both humans and dinosaurs.
When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.
Sebagai seorang Islam, Pak Sahid yang baik hati yang tinggal sendirian di sebuah desa bercita-cita menunaikan Haji di Mekah.
Vinod survived physical and mental abuse in his childhood. When he falls in love with Divya, he gets so obsessed with her.
Story follows Kaala who vows to save his hometown and its people for power crazy politicians and developers.
A poor singer befriends a college student from a wealthy family through the phone. They soon fall in love with each other despite never having met each other in person.
A con artist gets locked up with his family inside a bungalow haunted by 14 ghosts and the only way to get out is to fulfill their wishes.
Lovers Ram and Pooja have been together since they were in school and they were forced to break up. They meet again when they are adults and this is their last chance at redemption.
Rambo who lives a double life as a cab driver and bouncer falls in love with two women with contrasting personalities. What happens when he is forced to make a choice?
The film narrates the story of an Indian Air Force pilot who recalls his romance with a doctor in the lead up to the war, while being kept as a prisoner of war at a jail in Rawalpindi, Pakistan.
A group of bungling crooks, escaping the wrath of a gangster who they worked for, heads into a deserted village in search of hidden treasure, only to find a literal ghost town.
ASP Lawrence and his team consisting of join forces to hunt down criminals involved in drug and human trafficking. Will they succeed in their mission?
The story revolves around Meera, who develops feelings in her bodyguard Bhoominathan and begins calling him as an anonymous caller named Ammukutty.

Two witnesses give conflicting testimonies in a murder investigation. Only one of them is telling the truth or are they both lying? A psychological thriller set in the present time of the "new normal".
Gunasingam, a family-loving farmer who hails from a small town, tries his best to keep his big family united despite him being misunderstood by many.
A genuinely pure and hearteningly moving drama, that's set as beautiful ode to life, agriculture and its people.
A wayward youth believes that bad will triumph over good. To prove his point, he implicates his classmate who is good hearted and god fearing, into a case of adultery and murder after several years.
Dharmaraja is a renowned builder. Raj plans to hinder Dharmaraja's works and the building is in a state of danger.
An interesting love story that blossoms between two unknown individuals, Udhay and Aatheeni who ends up meeting each other unexpectedly.
A village girl falls in love with an orphan with visual impairment. Her mother wishes her to marry a well-settled man and opposes her decision to marry her lover, but she elopes with him.
Chitambaram doesn't want his daughter Kausalya to marry Suresh. Suresh then decides not to marry Kausalya without her father's permission. Finally Chitambaram relents and the lovers reunite.
Prabhu, a college student, falls in love with Shruthi, a governor's daughter. On knowing about their love affair, her father imprisons Prabhu and forbids him to meet Shruthi.
Jeeva loves Mini but her three brothers end up beating him every time he meets her. The couple decides to elope against their parents' wishes.
Veer marries a blind girl and is disowned by his brother. What happens next forms the crux of the story.
Kaiji is about to have his life changed. The adventure is not without risk and danger however. He is given four games, which are challenges, and include life and death situations.
Three sisters are homeless after being orphaned. They finally find a suitable place and are relieved to finally have a place they can call home. But strange things start happening.

Demi memenangi gelaran "social media influencer" terbaik, Kak Kek mempergunakan seorang jejaka Korea, Hyun untuk menaikkan jumlah 'views' videonya tanpa menyedari niatnya itu akan melukakan hati Hyun.
A black and white film noir which unravels the mystery of lost Senduduk Rimbun residents after every single full moon night. A truth-hungry, strong-willed journalist named Saleh tells the story.
Kanmani, who stays at her stepsister's house, ends up falling in love with her brother-in-law, Akhilan, and tries to woo him.
Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu tunggal yang sanggup bekorban dan bekerja keras untuk membesarkan anak-anaknya. Kesempitan hidup mereka diduga apabila anak perempuannya disahkan mengidap barah.
A determined and unorthodox coach Uncle Choo defiantly returns to the football scene in 1977 for one last shot at restoring Singaporean pride.
Mengisahkan dua orang yang masih mentah usianya, Tookoo dan Din, yang melarikan diri daripada rumah penjaga mereka untuk mencari kebebasan dan rezeki di bandar
Five good friends become famous after they accidentally include an eerie sound in their song.
Berlatarkan rumah penghulu Wak Sudir, penduduk kampung bekerjasama untuk membuat persiapan bagi menyambut 1 Muharram.
Five best friends spend their last few weeks together before moving on to adulthood, navigating family conflict, drug abuse, friendship and love.
The journey of 2 good friends since college days who are now the founders of the 'KamiTV' broadcast on the digital platform, turns into a 3 -way romance when a girl appears in their lives.
Pak Din and his friend are helping their fellow village boy named Teck Zee to get married with his lover, Bulan, despite Teck Zee's father disagrees and does not give his blessing to the marriage.
The residents of Kampong Pisang work together to prepare for the Raya feast while dramatic chaos abounds among the villagers. Will the lively village festival succeed?
Di dalam sebuah kampung, pasti terdapat perebutan kuasa. Siapakah yang bakal memegang jawatan tertinggi? Saksikan gelagat lucu mereka berentap untuk digelar ketua kampung.
A village divided between two opposing chiefs.
Kg. Latah becomes chaotic when the pharaoh's mummy has risen and disturbed the villagers. At the same time, the disappearance of one of the residents becomes a mystery.
Chaos erupts at Kampung Malar as residents rush to put together Deepavali celebration for YB Adnan, while dealing with blackouts. Will they manage to celebrate the Festival of Lights without lights?
The film begins with a man trying to kill Lakshmi, but he missed his attempt and killed her aunt.
A young man comes up with a dream plan to help society, but things take a turn when he meets a man who promises to finance his project.
A young musician, along with his two friends, goes back in time to prevent the death of his mother. What happens next?
Just as everything was falling into place for Anand, he is distraught when the girl he loves dies in a blast.
After Kanchan receives a beating from Sang Nila, he declares to take some martial arts lessons from an expert and sets out to save the villagers from Sang Nila's tyranny.
When three spirits possess a timid young man and start making him act like a woman, his mother consults an exorcist who unearths a heartbreaking tale of societal injustice, murder and vengeance.
Story of love, hope and redemption.
Kathalan avoiding marriage due to some mysterious reason until he meets Kanmani.
A family move into a new house were they start facing horrific incidents
A seven-year-old spends time happily with his father and stepmother. But with the birth of a new baby in the family, he is unable to tolerate the competition for parental love and kills the newborn.
Impostor with heart of gold wins over an ailing matriach posing as her long separated grandson
At the age of nine, Amudha learns that she is adopted. Armed with a few facts, she desperately searches for her biological mother in the war-ridden zones of Sri Lanka.
Vasanth learns that the girl he is in love with is his close friend Shankar's sister.
Three women from North Madras spells trouble for the recognition they received from a protest
Seetharam is in love with Kalyani and wants to propose to her. However, when two lovers, Akhila and Akash, play a prank on Seetharam that results in him losing Kalyani, he takes revenge on them.
After learning about Devi's relationship with Arun, her brother, Dharma, agrees to their union.
Stream the Tulu version of Kannada blockbuster 'Kantara' which has entered '400 crore club', with worldwide collections.
While driving along the federal trunk road, four friends decide to take a pitstop in Karak town. Little do they know that this short break will cause them to lose their lives.
Despite his struggles, Karnan, whose dreams to join the army lay shattered, finds a way to fight for justice on behalf of his village people.
A cab driver gets caught between the internal affairs of a shady businessman who has other plans in place.
Two fathers from distinct age brackets and social backgrounds attempt to reunite with their daughters. A son seeks to redeem himself.
Regina begins to read the story of an ancient book 'Karungaapiyam' and was surprised as the events have unfolded in the present era
The story of a pair of lovers between Hasnah and Dahlan. Their relationship is not blessed because Hasnah comes from a poor family. Dahlan still insists on marrying Hasnah.
Nina dan Rafiq sering berselisih pendapat. Namun sesuatu yang tidak diduga berlaku apabila kedua-duanya bertukar identiti ketika sedang bertelagah dan dipanah petir.
Siti seorang jururawat yang kehilangan deria penglihatan selepas terlibat dalam kemalangan. Sesuatu yang luar biasa telah terjadi ke atas Siti selepas kejadian tersebut.
New Orleans filmmaker Edward Buckles, Jr., who was 12 when Katrina hit the city, documents the stories of his peers who survived the storm as children.
Sebuah kisah keliru identiti oleh sepasang kembar iaitu Ikhwan dan Ehsan diantara ideologi pemikiran sekular dan kepercayaan agama.
A television reporter rebels against the corrupt practices of his employer.

name: Kawan Aku Mati Dalam Rumah Sewa

info.plot: One night, an illegal street racer who has just won RM10,000 in prize money is literally scared to death when he returns to his rented apartment to find a vampire there. What happens next?
Hadi, Janet & Ravi menyelamatkan Alin, makhluk asing yang mempunyai kuasa luar biasa dari kapal angkasa yang terhempas.
A film-maker aspires to make a gangster movie and selects the hardened Gaddalakonda Ganesh as his subject.
Tale of two friends, Moorkan and Bhoominathan who live in Ramanathapuram district.
Idin grew up in an environment of drugs and black magic, until he grew up to be a man who believed he was capable of being immune and eventually got involved in a murder case.
Hari terbahagia dalam hidup Nora berubah menjadi suram bila tunangnya menarik diri pada hari pernikahan mereka. Tambah buruk lagi, hari selepas tragedi itu asyik berulang atas sebab-sebab misteri.
Wak Jambi owns an antique shop located in a small town. He witnesses peculiar events of some customers who owned antiques from his shop.
Intruders shoot Chloe's friend and break into Chloe's home on an isolated island on a rainy night. Can the high tech security company help Chloe and her stepson?
Amri, seorang novelis dikunjungi oleh seorang gadis misteri yang muncul secara tiba-tiba di kedainya. Namun, hanya dia sahaja yang boleh melihat gadis tersebut.
Three students find themselves alone and trapped in their hostel during the nation wide lockdown due to the Covid-19 pandemic.

A father brings his family on a getaway to a large and quiet house but strange things keep on happening, scaring his children out of their wits and inciting fearsome quarrels among the family members.

A classic comedy over wealth and reputation. Osman is driven out by his unscrupulous father but with twist of fate he manages to clinch a recording contract and strives with the help of beautiful lady.
A family comedy depicting the hilarious and chaotic daily life of Haj Iskandar and his zany family including his wife, five children and their respective families
Kisah mengenai seorang pesakit kanser payudara, seorang mangsa kemalangan yang cacat seumur hidup dan seorang pesakit HIV yang berlaku di dalam sebuah hospital menjelang Syawal.
Follow the stories of several troubled individuals and their conflicts during the Malaysian Lockdown, as they learn the meaning of hope, love and family.
Keranda Berdarah is a Malay film published in Singapore in 1969. The Bloody Coffin is published in the form of a black and white film without color.
Mak Betong is a witch who is said to keep spirits. When she passes away, all kinds of strange and scary disturbances take place around the village until she is finally interred.
The disastrous result of a love triangle leaves a team of investigators wondering what went wrong for a sweet love story to end in tragedy.
Kerana terlalu menyayangi anak mereka Roslan, Mak Yah dan Pak Mail menerima segala perbuatan derhaka Roslan.
When a famous composer and his wife go back to their village for holidaying and to get some ideas for their new songs, they experience strange happenings in the village.
Iranian directors are getting slaughtered by an unknown serial killer and a blacklisted director, Hasan Kasmai, is curious about only one thing: Why isn't the killer after him?
After busting down the flesh traders to save his wife, Sameer returns to India. The story picks up one year later, where the couple struggle to find their new normal despite therapy and medication.

When three prominent politicians are kidnapped, Khun Pan is persuaded to take on one final mission – to hunt down the notorious bandits Mahesuan and Dam and rescue the politicians from their clutches. As K
A hospital assistant and his wife is harassed by haunting disturbances, made worse when an ex-girlfriend returns hellbent on getting her due.

A young advertisement director suddenly has the chance to take over a global corporation by masquerading as the fake son of the CEO. While being chased out by investors, he pursues a woman and keeps her.

name: Kill Chain: The Cyber War On America's Elections

info.plot: A chilling look at how vulnerable the technology used in the US voting systems really is.
The night after a man recovers from a total blackout, his wife is found dead. The police are on the hunt for the killer, but all clues lead back to him. Soon, his own convictions are shaken.
Two men decide to end their careers as assassins with one final mission. Through the course of their mission, they meet familiar face and unexpected people.
A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins.
A murder occurs in metropolitan Tokyo, the perpetrator unknown.
As a popular actress has growing discontentment towards her marriage, she begins planning to kill her rich husband with her neighbor.

Bella, pelajar Malaysia di Korea Selatan memutuskan untuk menghabiskan cuti semesternya di Malaysia. Tetapi hidupnya yang tenang menjadi kucar-kacir selepas terserempak lelaki Melayu-Korea, Daniel Lee.
An agoraphobic Seattle tech worker uncovers evidence of a crime. In order to get involved, she will have to do the thing she fears most — leave her apartment and step out onto the streets.
A detective is sent to far-flung TungMhaHong Village to investigate a heinous crime with no real leads but many rumours about supernatural causes. Can he uncover the truth and save the villagers?
Raja and his father, who live in Hong Kong, are devastated when an accident leaves the latter on the verge of death. He decides to reunite his father with his grandfather in order to make him happy.
The film chronicles the final chapters of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.'s life, revealing a conflicted leader who faced an onslaught of criticism from both sides of the political spectrum.
This Singaporean-Malaysian comedy starring Chapman To & Mark Lee revolves around Tin Ba, whose winning streak inspires him to challenge the King of Mahjong in the world championship.
Man-hee, imprisoned for accidentally getting caught up with a violent crime, shares a cell with the king of the prison.

name: King of Prison 2: The Prison War

info.plot: Two violent inmates exercising their power over the prison and both are unhappy with the king of prison in the cell.

Documentary follows the journey of Richard Williams, an undeterred father instrumental in raising two of the most extraordinarily gifted athletes of all time, who will end up changing the sport of tennis.
Based on a true story and set in the early 1960s, a politician, who dreams of changing the country for the better, runs for presidency with the help of an excellent election campaign strategist.
Perebutan kuasa berlaku di antara Raja Basyrah dan Perdana Menterinya, Karim yang inginkan Kipas Hikmat yang dimilikki oleh Raja itu.
Adam involves in a road accident and is being treated at a hospital. There, he meets a patient in the same room as him, and they start to tell horror stories of hospitals they have heard before.
Pada satu malam, sekumpulan pelajar asrama bercerita tentang pengalaman seram masing-masing. Tapi apabila malam kian larut, perbezaan antara cerita dan realiti menjadi semakin samar.
Kisah konflik mengenai dua adik beradik yang berlainan bapa. Mereka saling benci membenci di antara satu sama lain dan kebencian semakin membara apabila mereka meningkat dewasa.
An ex-convict is determined to turn his life around after his sentencing ends but finds it impossible when his members of his previous gang are hunting for him.
Loan sharks have been threatening Malek and Jai's family, as their deceased father leaves an amount of debt to them. Worse yet, they find tumor in their mother's body and their sister gets raped.
Raja Bersiong was an evil king fond of human blood and the patriarch of two feuding groups of vampire descendants - one is trying to conquer the human race, and the other, trying to save it.
A family on vacation at a remote cabin are held captive by four armed strangers who force them to make an impossible choice to prevent the apocalypse.
TV Host Allison and Ben, an unemployed pothead, had a one-night stand and Alison soon discovers that she is pregnant, forcing them to decide on their priorities in order to raise their baby.
On the bad advice of jealous friends, a man unwittingly causes his wife's death. She returns as a ghost to wreak vengeance on those who wronged her.
Rana, a noble warrior seeks revenge against the ruler of his kingdom, who killed his father. At the same time, he also ends up upsetting the neighboring enemy kingdom's ruler.
An IAS aspirant, who lands in Chennai to fulfill his mother's wish, gets into trouble with a local councillor and his men, leading to a power struggle.
When a famous model is killed, a smart detective investigates after realizing the incident seems to be a mystery.
Komban, who protects his locality from bad people, always ends up resorting to violence. He decides to stop being violent after his marriage, but his past records never let him be at ease.
Apabila anak saudaranya diculik, Zali cuba untuk membantu namun dia mula mengesyaki ada sesuatu yang tidak kena mengenai kes penculikan tersebut
A stranger enters the life of a family that has been suffering in poverty for years. What follows are the events that make their lives even more miserable.
A team of scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island where they ignite the ultimate battle between man and nature.

In 2001, divorce sent by text message was legalised. This is the story of how a woman, on the brink of joining her husband abroad, receives one such text message and has to deal with the sudden shock.
A former cop with mind-reading skills gets involved in a case involving rape and murder. Can he crack it while keeping a lid on the ghosts of his own past?
Wan who is always separated from his family. Wan is friends with Kudin who also always does criminal work. Shida's health is getting worse, Shida needs a kidney donor.
Hussein was arraigned in court for suicide. He gets acquainted with Rahimah Wahab's girlfriend, This incident makes Wahab take revenge on Rahimah and threatens to take revenge.
A girl has the unusual gift of seeing ghosts. One day, she spots a classmate. On investigating, it turns out that the classmate was last seen in a the Old City of Jakarta.
Neng, a mainland streetfighter, tries to start a new life in Hong Kong's Walled City. When he becomes implicated in conspiracies among its triads, however, can he find a way to fight back?
Upili, a dedicated person towards serving the village temple, marries Arasaee who plans to embarrass him while joining hands with Sundaralingam, a fraudster.
Bagong dies in a hit-and-run incident but his soul is trapped between two realms. He cannot go in peace until he finds out the reckless driver that cost him his life.
Shila punya sejarah lampau yang panjang. Pertemuannya dengan Ustaz Arif telah berjaya meluruskan jalan bengkang bengkok dan menerangkan gelap suasana kehidupan Shila.
Prathapa, a producer, is indebted to Boss, a ruthless moneylender, but refuses to pay his dues.
Zein yang belajar di Korea bercinta dengan gadis dari negara itu, tetapi hubungan mereka berakhir dengan kematian tragik gadis tersebut.

When an agrochemical company tests its latest pesticide, the folks of a small town in the American South are turned into zombies. It is left to crop duster pilot Lonnie to lead the survivors to safety.
Short Film - When a new bakery becomes more popular than the long-time local favourite, two girls compete against each other to bake the ultimate kuih and win over all the customers.
Satu demi satu pembunuhan misteri berlaku di sebuah perkampungan di Kelantan, di mana kulit mangsa akan di ambil dan dipercayai untuk dijadikan wayang kulit.
Two young couples head to a village to carry out a photoshoot, not knowing that their worst nightmare awaits.
Based on true events that happened in Vietnam, a deaf-mute woman marries a psychopathic murderer. She must find a way to expose him and save innocent lives, while finding a way to stay alive.
In this animation film, Super Bao, a naïve, yet passionate stuffed bun, aspires to become a hero. Joining an anti-piracy navy fleet on a mission, he begins a journey to his dreams.
Jay, using skills learned in the martial arts school where he grew up, leads his college basketball team to the championship game.
Ma goes looking for his father in Shanghai. He and his new friend are saved by some martial arts masters when gangsters hunt them down but the fight has only just begun.
Po, a noodle slurping dreamer who must embrace his true self-fuzzy flaws and all - in order to become the real Dragon Warrior.
Po's new life as The Dragon Warrior is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain determined to conquer China and destroy Kung Fu.
This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.
Muthu's sudden death forces Shakthi to take revenge on the culprits who were responsible for the same
A man wakes up from a strange dream with a horse tail attached to his body and begins a mind-bending journey to disentangle the real from the imagined.
Anjali, the daughter of a powerful gangster, is in love with Gurumoorthy, a young man.
A case involving the disappearance of a pregnant woman turns into a personal one for the cop who is tasked with investigating it.​
A family that hails from a village is struck by an unfortunate incident and gets into conflicts they never expected.
Naveen reluctantly agrees to take over an orphanage run by his ailing mother. A kid goes missing and Naveen must do everything he can to bring Harvish back home.
An expecting couple who has just relocated to the mystical, enchanted Kalimantan face unspeakable terror. They soon learn that it is retribution for their sins in the past.
On the set of a film recording some of Junji Inagawa's famous ghost stories, they start to turn real, and strange events target the cast and crew.
A film that tells the story of friendship, romance and the lives of two teenagers at Buriram Witthayaprasit School.
Labu and Labi are servants to Haji Bakhil, a miser, who has a beautiful daughter, Manisah. Labu and Labi fall in love with Manisah without knowing that they both admire the same woman.
A young attorney fights an uphill battle to prosecute members of the SS who served in Auschwitz, as the obstacles he faces begin to affect him personally.

When a family moves to an upscale neighbourhood, they discover life in their new home isn't so perfect when they encounter terrifying, paranormal events that drives the family to the edge of insanity.

A woman promises her heart for a haphazard man, who has fallen in love with her, unless he changes his attitude. Unexpectedly, the pair unravels the most tumultuous but sweetest romance ever imagined.
After the death of his precious beloved wife, a young man pours all of him into their young daughter, accompanied by a woman who mourns with him for his wife's death and deeply admires him, Katerina.
After she is sexually assaulted by her husband's employer, a woman with a problematic past must take matters into her own hands. Soon, corpses turn up in the village, with holes in their backs.
This film about rough and tough, tomboyish Laila who loves to play pool and ride her skooter.
Laila Majnun is adapted from a classic Middle Eastern love story about an unrequited romance.
Can and his new bride return to his haunted childhood village to face demons of his past. The curse of villagers must be defeated to save his marriage and move on.
Demi mendapatkan resepi laksa terbaik di Pulau Pinang, Mail dan kawan- kawan sanggup berbaik dengan Wati, gadis yang tak berapa lawa.
Bestfriends, Do, Re and Mi each receives a magical item from Princess Bamboo whom they have saved. With those magical powers, they help a kingdom that is under attack by a traitor named Fasola.
A school student, who is passionate about dance, sets out to join a national-level competition without her mother's knowledge.

Faizal bersetuju menyertai rancangan realiti untuk melamar teman wanitanya setelah dipaksa oleh bos. Tanpa diduga ketika menyediakan kejutan untuk program tersebut timbul pula perasaan cinta antara mereka.
Si lelaki sukakan si perempuan, tanpa sedar yang si perempuan itu psiko dan obses dengan cintanya. Cara untuk selamatkan diri hanya dengan jatuh cinta dengan si perempuan semula.
Narrating the struggle between two commanders, When Telani married Panglima Alang Yahya, Panglima Ali made a trick to His Majesty the Sultan of Siak that to launch his 'Lanchang Kuning'
A truck driver finds a young Mexican American girl inside his shipping container and his life takes a turn as he tries to reunite her with her family.

Elis experienced a miscarriage and is undergoing the Malay post-partum confinement process, but things take a crazy turn when her caretaker accidentally unveils a secret Elis had kept: she is a witch.

Abang Jue, Ismail meminta bantuan dari Jue untuk menjaga ibu mereka. Tetapi langit tidak selalunya cerah membuatkan Jue merasa terbeban dengan pilihan mahu menjadi anak kepada ibunya atau isteri suaminya.
Kisah Rosmina seorang ibu tunggal yang sanggup bersusah payah membesarkan anak-anaknya hingga ke menara gading.
A dying cab driver leaves his hometown for the first time and heads for Darwin. While there, his dying wish becomes an opportunity to live.
Kate, who works as an elf in a year-round Christmas shop, starts dating Tom after he walks into her life and seems to see through all her barriers.
Inspired by the true story of Kurt Cobain, the lead singer of the popular Seattle-based rock band Nirvana who committed suicide in 1994.
Theatrical feature film debut by the director that presents the story of 3 generations of women in a ryokan, at different phases of their lives. A miracle happens when time is rewound.
A lawyer must defend a murder suspect and win the case in order to save her daughter who has been taken hostage. As evidence emerges, she unveils the truth and the man behind the case.
Dani is recruited by a local silat guru upon discovering his hidden fighting talent. Dani's latah becomes his biggest advantage.
Hitomi and Akako are female comedians who perform in the same small theatre every night for 5 years, not seeming to get anywhere. One night, a teenager tries to steal Hitomi's bicycle. Fate changes.
Long lost memories are stirred up when Jane encounters an accident.
The story of Ena Manjalara, a new actress who changed her politics after approaching Zainon, an actress who excels in the world of acting.
Lebai Sampan tells a remarkable story of a Lebai who caught in between fulfilling the last pillar of Islam and taking care of his blind 75 year old sister.

The spirit of a murdered woman contacts four bachelors, enlisting their help to find her killer. A thrilling tale about the very real impact of psychic disorders, yet told with perfect comedic timing.

name: Lee Chong Wei : Rise Of the Legend

info.plot: This Datuk Lee Chong Wei biopic is now the highest-grossing local Chinese movie! It charts his journey from humble beginnings to the national hero that he is today, and captures his never-say-die attitude.
Karthik, a carefree youngster infamous for being a flirt, falls in love with Malar, whom he hated in college.
This is the story of war hero Lieutenant Adnan Saidi, a Malaysian soldier, who sacrifices his life defending Malaya from Japanese invasion during World War II.
Sebuah kisah dua beradik yang sanggup berkorban apa sahaja untuk keluarga dan rakyat jelata. Ia bermula apabila Puteri Zaleha menerima lamaran Putera Achewah yang hodoh.

Puteri Felora tercampak ke dunia asing. Berusaha cari jalan pulang, Felora terjumpa keluarga baru, tapi seekor naga muncul menghalang mereka. Dapatkah Ares selamatkan Felora, atau Felora memilih Flammar?
Supergirl attends the Legion Academy and uncovers a devious plot involving the mysterious group known as the Dark Circle. Join the Legion of Super-Heroes in this thrilling DC Universe Movie!

name: Lego Jurassic Park: The Unofficial Retelling

info.plot: The ever charming and now slightly older Chaos Mathematician Dr. Ian Malcolm retells the tale of what happened that dreadful night at Jurassic Park.
Sepeninggalan ayah mereka, Lela dan Manja didera oleh ibu tiri mereka sehingga menderita dan terpisah.
Datuk Karim Jaya death is good news to Datuk Bandung and his followers who want to seize power.
Late at night, a web designer is hard at work in the office, trying to deliver on a project. Suddenly, he senses that he is not the only one pulling the night shift in the office…

Tiga sekawan yang rindu zaman bujang mereka telah merancang 'road trip' setelah mendapat pelepasan daripada isteri dan teman wanita masing-masing. Tapi nasib tidak menyebelahi mereka di sepanjang jalan.
Featuring 3 urban ghost stories; a famous actor is haunted after he hit a girl while driving; a taxi driver is being drained dry by a ghost; a ghost child wanders a soon-to-be demolished mall.
A celebrated author takes a journey with some old friends to have some fun and heal old wounds. Her nephew comes along to wrangle the ladies and finds himself involved with a young literary agent.
A young girl decides to spend time with her future mother-in-law before getting married to her boyfriend.
A man wanted for homicide, on the run for many years, finally meets his daughter whom he has not seen for many years & finds out that he has a hefty price to pay for his mistakes.
Jim Carrey stars as a low-down lying lawyer who is forced to tell the truth for an entire day when his son makes a wish that comes true.
Follow legendary designer Diane von Furstenberg, in her quest to discover how sculptor Auguste Bartholdi's dream became a reality and what the Statue of Liberty means to people around the world.
A pessimistic man obsessed with death suddenly sees himself in a bad situation when a lot of dangerous people wants to take his life! With his life at stake, can he get away with it?
Accompanied by her husband, Seyeon leaves in search of her first love. They were reminded the most glittering and beautiful moments of their lives throughout the journey,
A 36-year journey into the lives of three friends plagued by vicious cycles of drug addiction and crime in theunderbelly of Newark, NJ.

name: Lil Rel Howery: Live in Crenshaw

info.plot: Known for his well-crafted storytelling and hilarious impressions of the myriad characters he encounters in life, Lil Rel Howery draws on his personal experiences in his relatable, uproarious stand-up.
Rani sets out on a journey to find the father of her child, who is suffering from rare medical condition
The documentary looks back on the four-time Olympian's transcendent career and offers an intimate look at the final chapter of her skiing journey.
A strict and old-fashioned patriarch, Jack Byrnes, is unhappy with his son-in-law, Greg, when he takes up a second job at a drug company. So, he wants him to prove his capability by testing him.
A self-proclaimed anti-establishment outlaw heads down a risky path to right the wrongs committed against him and those close to him.

name: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow

info.plot: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.
Adapted from a popular manga series by Rensuke Oshikiri, this is a touching story set in junior high, about the brutal and even sinister effects of bullying gone overboard.
Celebrate the new year with Lizzo, her band The Lizzbians and The Little Bigs, The Big Grrrls with special guests Cardi B, SZA and Missy Elliott for a spectacular show filled with incredible music.
Trying to reverse a family curse, brothers Jimmy and Clyde Logan set out to execute an elaborate robbery during the legendary Coca-Cola 600 race at Charlotte Motor Speedway.

name: Long Days Journey Into The Night

info.plot: Luo Hongwu returns to Kaili, the hometown from which he fled several years ago. He begins the search for the woman he loved, and whom he has never been able to forget. She said her name was Wan Qiwen.
A group of young heroes, fighting to reclaim their country, is betrayed by the envious and treacherous vice general of their own army, leading to the failure of their campaign.
Childless couple Rasappa and Geetha adopt the child abandoned in their car.
After his mother's suicide, a young man discovers that his memories of the past are vastly different from the truth.
Abandoned by his parents, Guo is brought up by his grandfather, who suddenly passes away. His father abruptly appears & refuses to leave Guo alone, starting a lifelong entanglement.
Ajay and Divya are head-over-heels in love with each other, but their lives turn upside down within a year of their marriage.
When a couple is separated by death, whichever lives will go through the greatest pain, which will evolve to an imagination of the other being alive. Although absurd, what if it comes true?
In a twist of fate, an unexpected occurrence befalls their seemingly mediocre and uneventful lives.
A year ago, Bo became blind in a serious car accident. One day, an intruder enters her house and takes her hostage. As she tries to survive, she discovers her husband's involvement in her accident!
Things go awry when an online comic seemingly based on real-life characters goes viral.
A young couple is made to exchange their phones for a day. What follows is a hilarious and emotional sequence of events that puts their lives in misery
Inspiring documentary of a trailblazing superstar from humble beginnings to international fame, showcasing her hard-earned success, love and pivotal moments that shaped her meteoric rise.
The story follows the journey of a couple who is willing to give their all to win the heart and approval of their parents
A couple, dating for six years, find themselves at the crossroads of their relationship as insecurity and possessiveness threatens to split them apart.
When her ability to see ghosts ruins her love life, a heartbroken woman seeks solace at a mountain resort, encountering several fellow singletons.
Kisah yang diinspirasikan daripada pemenang pingat emas Paralimpik, Mohamad Ridzuan yang menghadapi penyakit 'Cebral Palsy' dan abangnya yang sentiasa ada di sisinya.
Tok Demang yang angkuh dan zalim mencari anaknya yang telah hilang. Tanpa diketahui beliau, Lubalang Daik, hamba yang bekerja di istananya adalah anak dicarinya selama ini.
When police officer Akbar comes across a diary during an investigation, he learns about the happenings in the lives of a Kochi-based scrap artist, Luca, and his girlfriend Niharika.
A suburban woman finds herself stalked by a threatening figure night after night. When she can't get help from those around her, she is forced to take matters into her own hands.
When a film producer in her 40s suddenly loses her job, she moves into a rundown neighborhood where she meets an assortment of characters that inspire her in different ways.

Murugan, who has been unlucky since birth, wins a car through a contest, believes his spell of bad luck is finally over. When the lucky car gets stolen, he reluctantly join forces with a cop to find it.
A husband takes his family on a getaway to escape society in order to complete his first book. But after multiple visits from mysterious strangers, he begins to question his sanity.
A newly orphaned girl is gifted by her aunt a M3GAN prototype, a lifelike doll equipped with artificial intelligence, a decision that leads to unimaginable consequences.
Grieving mother Aini seeks revenge on the troublemakers in her neighbourhood who caused her 15-year-old daughter's death.
Rahim seorang pembuat nisan, akan mendapat mimpi tentang seseorang yang akan meninggal dunia. Sikap misterinya membuatkan orang mengesyaki dia ada kaitan dengan kematian yang belaku.
A journalist's investigation leads her to a series of complicated situations, unraveling secrets that can pose a threat to her life.
A mother finds herself at the mercy of corrupt cops while her children try their best to negotiate her release.
On the day of a public conference by the state's Chief Minister, a common man and a police officer are stuck in a time loop.
As a child, Paaru heard a beautiful fairy tale from a stranger. Years later she sees the same story painted on the walls of a coastal town, which prompts her to look for the painter.
A pair of conjoined twins strive to save their father's flourishing business from a spy.
The film revolves around a rude princess, who falls in love with a simpleton after initially being hostile towards him.
Sathya, a comic book artist, is forced to take on Jeyakodi, a corrupted politician, when a voice he hears in his mind foretells future events and constantly puts him in precarious situations.
A fortune teller predicts that Tung will be imprisoned for murder, he tries to change his fate but a veteran detective believes Tung to be a psychopathic serial killer & pursues him relentlessly.
With no idea what wild life is really like, four animals from New York Central Zoo escape, unwittingly assisted by four absconding penguins, and find themselves in Madagascar.
Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman are still struggling to get home. Their journey takes them through Europe where they find the perfect cover: a traveling circus, which they reinvent.
The animals try to fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African wildlife refuge, where Alex is reunited with his parents.
A love between Amy and Elam is tested when Amy has to leave for London as India gets its independence. Many years later, Amy comes back to her loved one only to find he is already dead.
A man gets into trouble when he marries three beautiful women and unknowingly they become friends and hilarious consequences follow.
A naive young man strives hard to learn English in order to win the girl of his dreams, but finds himself falling in love with his teacher instead.
An insecure American woman unexpectedly inherits her grandfather's mafia empire in Italy.

name: Magic & Bird: A Courtship of Rivals

info.plot: An exploration of the fierce rivalry between NBA superstars Larry Bird and Magic Johnson during their decade of dominance.

name: Magic Beyond Words: The J.K Rowling Story

info.plot: An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers-from her humble beginnings as an imaginative young girl and awkward teenager to the loss of her mother
Three years after Mike bowed out of the stripper life at the top of his game, he and the remaining Kings of Tampa hit the road to Myrtle Beach to put on one last blow-out performance.
Magic Mike heads to London with a wealthy socialite for what he hopes will be his last hurrah. However, once he discovers what she has in mind, will he be able to pull it off?
A story about how two siblings got lost in the "otherworld" after leaving the house at dusk.
Share the adventures of patriot Chu Tieh Hsieh & his three comrades, who head out with the aim of 'relieving' Mongolian invaders of their ill-gotten gains.
A middle-aged school teacher, Gandhi Mahaan, embarks on a journey of self-discovery after getting abandoned by his family.
From acclaimed Turkish horror director, comes a new offering that is based on real events and which delves into the themes of guilt, Purgatory and salvation.
Impian perkahwinan Nina musnah kerana kecurangan tunangnya. Sahabatnya Azam mencadangkan Nina untuk merancang perkahwinannya seperti 'main kahwin kahwin' ketika zaman kanak-kanak mereka.

A team of netball players spend the night in a dilapidated bungalow taken care of by an elderly couple. They are spooked by things that go bump in the night. Is it spirits, or something far more nefarious?
As Devís life turns upside down, he meets an orphan who is running away from a syndicate. Together they join forces to bring the boyís tormentors to justice.
After a long absence, a man returns to live with his wife and daughter. However, he has to face various obstacles in his attempt to reconnect with his family.
During the Japanese occupation in the 1940s, two men work together to secretly create a dictionary of the Korean language when the language was banned.
Julia dan Khairil berjanji untuk berubah setelah berumah tangga tetapi malangnya ajal menjemput suaminya ketika solat di masjid.
In bearing the pain of Suhaila's death, her husband faces an unexpectedly problem when she returns home at one of his 'tahlil' nights.
Ga-In suffers from Ripley's syndrome, believing herself to be somebody that she is not. Her symptoms are rooted in her deep jealousy of her high school friend, who has everything that she does not.
Madison is paralyzed by shocking visions of grisly murders, and her torment worsens as she discovers that these waking dreams are in fact terrifying realities.

Supernatural buffs eager to launch their supernatural programme need evidence of the paranormal, and they finally get their chance when they agree to be locked up in a haunted shopping mall for 24 hours.
Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.
A jaded and alcoholic ex-C.I.A. agent takes up a new job as a bodyguard to a child who helps reclaim his soul. But when his young charge is abducted, he vows revenge.
Shanmugam falls in love with Priya but disowns his feelings when he learns that Prakash wants to marry her.
Anjana embarks upon a soul searching journey after having to go through a turmoil in her family life. Meeting Arvind there will she be able to successfully regain reset or rebuild a life for herself?
When Manap is introduced to the wonders of karaoke, and realises the popularity of the favourite past time in his town, he gets the idea to start a business for a mobile karaoke.
Syawal who is mortuary employee at the hospital in his village where he started working and started learning about tips and taboos while managing the remains from his mother and Mr. Mokhtar.

A tale of vengeance that translates as an LSD trip in the sweltering desert heat, replete with satanic cult, biker gang, heavy metal and Nicolas Cage shooting an arrow. Nuff said. A gory fantastical treat!

3 brothers who have no interest in marriage are forced to marry by their parents. They end up divorcing their partners within a year only to realize they have actually fallen in love with their ex-wives.
Story about a guy who comes after his lost love and another guy who sacrifices his future for the sake of love.
Kisah konflik Ifti Liyana (Nur Fazura) yang terpaksa berdepan dengan cinta tiga lelaki iaitu Fredo (Josiah Hogan), Bahkhtiar (Faizal Hussein) dan Nazmi (Shaheizy Sam).
After his suspension, a police officer, along with his four gang members steal crores of rupees, but what happens when two of the members betray him?
Muzir is betrayed by Hasbi who gets him imprisoned. But with the help of black magic and an uncle who is the prison warden, Muzir is about to take revenge on his enemy.
In a bid to seek revenge for a past misdeed, a man asks his nephew to woo the daughter of his enemy.
An ancient demon kills her victims in their sleep.
Chon becomes a scapegoat when Shah Dani uses him to deliver goods to Dotty's customer. When something goes wrong, Dotty threatens Chon to pay the lost money or her henchman will kidnap his idol.

name: Marcel the Shell with Shoes On

info.plot: The film's director, Dean Fleischer Camp, is staying in an Airbnb after the collapse of his marriage when he meets Marcel, a 1-inch-tall mollusk who lives with his grandmother, Connie.
A group of college friends rent a smart house for a weekend of partying. However, they slowly start to realize that Margaux, the house's super advanced AI system, has sinister designs for them.
Two teenagers fall head over heels in love with each other. Trouble begins when family interfere with their lives.

name: Mariah Carey's All I Want for Christmas Is You

info.plot: When young Mariah sees a puppy at the pet store, she knows exactly what she wants for Christmas. But first, she must prove that she can dog-sit her uncle's dog, Jack, the worst dog in the county!
Ambikapathy escapes to Chennai to fulfil his dreams and he earns a living by selling goods on a beach.

A comedy featuring Mark,an English man who has been married to Suraya. He is forced to confront his anxieties when his father-in-law directs him to undergo traditional circumcision as promised by his wife.
Four crazy antiheroes on the run. Their leader is the unworldly innocent, naive Marnie, a house cat who is not allowed to leave the house and only knows about real life from television.
Four couples, who are about to be married, face compatibility issues and start having second thoughts about getting married.

Leah has terrible nightmares, but her mother is distant. A small, nightly visitor brings Leah comfort, but soon she will realise that her little visitor offers knowledge that might be very, very dangerous.

A possessed boat, a doomed trip to Bermuda, and a broken family. A stormy challenge lies ahead, not only meteorologically but also metaphorically when disturbing secrets surface during a sea adventure.
A contract worker in Sudan is abducted by mercenaries and his lover in India awaits his return.

Shaari and Norkiah are neighbours in a boarding house but they havenít seen each other. When fate brings them together interesting things happen. In fact, they learn so much from the other married tenants.
Masok Angin Keluar Asap is a Malay film published in Singapore which was then part of Malaya in 1963.
A college professor often gets drunk and has fun with his students. However, the college fires him after he gets blamed for a dispute between the students.
Young Li Xiuyuan, who is the reincarnation of the dragon-subduing Arhat, regains his enlightenment and his golden body after suffering hardships in the mortal world.

Master of Light follows classical painter George Anthony Morton's journey back to his hometown of Kansas City, where he hopes to heal a broken relationship with his mother and paint loved ones in the style

name: Master of the Drunken Fist: Beggar So

info.plot: MASTER OF THE DRUNKEN FIST: BEGGAR SO follows the story of So Chan, who is born to a wealthy merchant in Canton.

name: Master of the Nine Dragon Fist: Wong Ching-Ho

info.plot: The head of Guangzhou's martial arts alliance takes action into his own hands to destroy an opium business.
A quiet and honest physician, Wong Kei-Ying, finds himself tricked into assisting Wei, the ruthless and treacherous new governor of Canton.
Razak bertemu dengan Alisya yang sering diketawakan kerana kegagapannya tetapi Razak dapat mencungkil bakat Alisya sebagai penyanyi.
An ordinary man who dreams of becoming a secret agent finds himself tasked with finding a cure for a zombie virus while racing against time in this dark comedy romance.
Mat So'od merupakan penglipurlara di kampungnya. Namun berlawanan dengan kerjayanya, Mat So'od merupakan seorang pemurung hampir sepanjang hidupnya.
Manis and her fisherman father receive a guest named Suleiman at their humble kampung house. Unbeknownst to Manis, the young man is in fact a prince-in-disguise.
Fauzi seorang guru yang telah dihantar untuk berkhidmat di Sabah. Di sana dia telah berkenalan dengan seorang novelis yang sedang mengalami masalah 'writer's block' iaitu Yazid.
Two siblings feel annoyed because they are likely not be able to celebrate Hari Raya due to their mother's financial difficulties are planning to work to be able to return to their village.
Nedumaaran faces a lot of ridicule because of his short stature. How he navigates through his life, especially his relationship with his twin and the woman he loves, make for the rest of the story.
A father's death leads the family to discover the father's deviant practices, causing him to come back from the dead and haunt the lives of the family members.
Mariam, Nora dan Kamaliah terpisah dan bertemu kembali. Pertemuan itu sekali gus membawa mereka mengimbau kembali kenangan pahit dan manis semasa berada di alam persekolahan.
Three different stories which remind us that every one of us will face our own death at anytime.
An average high-school girl, May is on a quest to win the love of her school heartthrob. However, May has a secret: she shoots electricity whenever she gets excited.
The struggle of a single father with his daughter walking into marriage life. A story that shows how he guides his daughter from the socioeconomic struggles of women by being an optimistic father.
After entangling in a petty conflict, two complete strangers, a guy and a girl with two extreme opposite characteristics, got themselves in a "body switch" situation.

name: Maya the Bee 2 The Honey Games

info.plot: Maya creates a team of misfit bugs to compete in the Honey Games, in an attempt to save her hive's honey.

name: Maya the Bee 3 The Golden Orb

info.plot: Maya, a brave bee, and her best friend, Willy, leave their hive and come across a green ant with a golden orb. They decide to help the ant carry the heir to the ant kingdom back to safety.
Maya, a young bee, is suspected of being involved in a plot to overthrow her rulers. However, she must overcome several obstacles in order to prove her innocence.
Buzz along with Maya, a curious baby bee so excited about life that she keeps breaking bee colony rules. When she learns that the bees are going to fight the hornets, she decides to act.
Maathen, who works for a gang, is on the run after accidentally killing a police officer.
Karthik is a wildlife photographer, who meets Yamini, his friend's girlfriend, and gets married to her by a twist of fate. Their married life turns sour when Yamini has a miscarriage.
Aravind falls into Kavya's trap unknowingly that her family is more than what he learns to be.
A conman exacts revenge on a famous actress because of his imprisonment.
For the first and only time, the story of legendary tennis player John McEnroe, one of the most naturally gifted players to ever take to the court and also one of the most controversial.
A woman awakens to find herself inexplicably trapped in a series of dark and strange tunnels full of deadly traps. She must everything that she can if she wants to emerge alive.
Personified as a charming, but enigmatic young man, Death grants a media tycoon some extra time on Earth in exchange for getting to experience life as a human.
The misadventures continue in this sequel as the in-laws get together for the first time, with hilarious consequences.
A young man struggles to get the blessings of his girlfriend's father, a former CIA agent who is itching to subject him to his Lie Detector.

To boost the standard of Singapore basketball, Long, a magnate and known figure in the basketball scene decided to fund the import of young talents from China, hoping to reinvigorate the sport in Singapore
Meg 2: The Trench dives into uncharted waters with Jason Statham and global action icon Wu Jing as they lead a daring research team on an exploratory dive into the deepest depths of the ocean.
Kerana taat setia pada Sultan, Megat Terawis rela menerima dugaan dan fitnah terhadap diri sendiri dan keluarganya.
This light-hearted 'a-go-go' romance depicts how three doctors pursue three beauties who play hard to get!
An insurance saleswoman meets an old friend to make a sale. Her friend's house is old and eerie. As she starts to leave, a shadow is following closely behind …
In an attempt to save his troubled marriage, Armand, a chef sets out to win back the heart of his estranged wife, Kayla with his cooking throughout the month of Ramadan.
Venky, suspected of committing multiple murders, suffers from memory loss and finds himself entangled in a web of lies
Alex Lewis is an expert assassin with a reputation for discreet precision. When Alex refuses to complete a job for a dangerous criminal organization, he becomes a target
Two agents of a secret organization are on a mission to protect the earth from the deadly aliens and must also tackle the biggest threat present within their own ranks.
A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.
A story about love between a father and a son and a father whose willing to sacrifice his happiness for his son in order for him to be happy.
After more than 20 years, Atikah was told by her mother about her long-lost father to the Netherlands. With her best friend, she travels through Amsterdam in her quest to complete the podium.
Pak Wahid peniaga kaya yang semakin kaya dengan kehadiran Gulam . Setiap malam Gulam akan keluar dan beribadat dan berserah pada Allah.
Iman dipaksa berkahwin dengan Qaseh, anak kepada orang gajinya untuk mewarisi harta bapanya. Percutian mereka di Bosnia membuahkan bibit-bibit cinta.
When Thalia, Erlan and Ahmad studied the mental illness suffered by a patient named Nina, it reveals that they are dealing with superstition, mysticism, and cult.
Showcases the struggles and sacrifices of a soldier's family.
Set amidst a group of five deaf and dumb friends who accidentally kill a man during a road journey.
Saras has been able to see invisible beings since she was a child. One day, Saras is visited by a spirit named Dinda who asks for her help.
A retired military commander wants to organize a grand wedding ceremony for his youngest daughter, but is thwarted by sabotage from a desperate bachelor in their village.
A mermaid is ripped from the Pacific, her tail is chopped off and she's thrown into a mental home where no one believes she is a mermaid.
An evil spirit that changes faces infiltrates a family, placing one brother in danger while the other tries to save him.
This documentary tells the story of rural, economically-disadvantaged drug users and dealers who are stuck in an endless cycle of poverty and incarceration.
A man pretends to be the son of a long-lost royal family to steal a precious sword
Two undercover cops strike out to bust a drug ring, but things go wrong when one of them falls for the drug lord's banker.
Comedian Michelle Wolf stars in her first HBO special - an hour of stand-up featuring her observations on feminism, dating, and other social issues.
Nani, a middle-class boy, confronts a gangster in order to protect his sister-in-law whom he disliked previously.
A life-threatening hide-and-seek between a psychopathic killer and Kyung-mi, a girl with hearing impairment.
A girl and her friends find a game in the attic that summons a creature known as The Midnight Man, who uses their worst fears against them.
When two Korean National Police University students accidentally witness a kidnapping, they decide to take the case into their own hands which leads them to all sorts of hilarious trouble.
