Based on a true story, Midnight Show unravels stories about a series of murder by a mysterious man in a mask.
A writer falls in love with a ghost he conjures, and things get complicated.
Honest and powerful, Mike Tyson recounts the highs and lows of his life in his signature candid style.
When a vengeful man with criminal ties starts hunting down his family, Dr. Mikhael vows to protect them and annihilate his enemy.
While his wife Milly stays at home to take care of their child, Mamet works at his father-in law's company, but has always dreamed of becoming a chef.
A young boy, without any cloths but the chain around his arm, is walking the track of an abandoned railroad. Why is he naked and chained? Who is he? Everything happened a day before…
Nina, the much dreaded village gangster, turns over a new leaf after falling in love. Alin, also changed her attitude the opposite way, all because of a man they both idolise very much.
In this Chinese animated film, Kaka, the heroic son from Mira Planet, embarks on a perilous journey with his friends, to free himself of the evil sealed within him.

After 12-year-old Gru inadvertently became the target of the Vicious 6, an infamous supervillain group, he joins forces with Kevin, Stuart and Bob to defeat the supervillians in a spectacular adventure.
In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.
Thomas takes the help of Deva who is notorious for changing women's minds, into changing Priya's mind about being a nun. Complications arise when Priya falls in love with Deva.
A man falls in love with his supervisor but due their different social status, he has no chance of gaining her affection. But he does not give up and resorts to the use of black magic.
Joselito is accused of sexually assaulting a girl. After becoming a lawyer, her daughter is determined to prove her father's innocence.
Based on a true story of a high school mathematics genius, Joon-kyung, who sends many letters to the president in hopes of having a train station built in his village.

Aaliyah, gadis yang tidak mempunyai hala tuju dicabar oleh ayahnya untuk mendapatkan pekerjaan.

Is it a mere coincidence that the body of a murdered man is discovered so near to the meat stall run by an attractive lady? These are the things on Detective Kim's mind as he watches the lovely butcher.
A serial prankster gets a taste of her own medicine when dead bodies start turning up in her backyard ever since she overheard a violent quarrel during a phone call.
An FBI agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.
After Cheryl Frasier and Stan Fields are kidnapped, Gracie goes undercover in Las Vegas to find them.
This HBO documentary profiles young contestants in a pageant founded by Abbey Curran, the first Miss USA contestant with disability, for girls with special needs.
This comedy depicts a group of friends who have grown apart. reasons. Little do they expect that they will one day reconnect over a lost bottle of breast milk.
Dalam kesibukan bekerja, Ji-Sun berjuang untuk memenangi hak asuhannya ke atas anaknya dan dia telah mengupah seorang pengasuh untuk membantu mengawasi Da-Eun.
Three people meet in the same place for very different reasons where two people are waiting to hunt them down.
Libby hates her stepmother Karina and blames all the strange disturbances in their new home on Karina. But something in the house is out to kill Karina.
Andy Lau & Huang Xiao Ming embark on a cross-border quest in the quest to protect an incredible new invention from an international crime conglomerate.
An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.
Hunt and his team face off against a powerful rogue AI called "The Entity", racing against time to prevent it from falling into the wrong hands.
Ethan Hunt and his IMF team join forces with CIA assassin August Walker to fight and race against time after a mission gone wrong.
The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.
Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.
Agent Ethan Hunt races across Australia and Spain to stop a former IMF agent from unleashing a genetically engineered biological weapon.
Ethan Hunt comes face to face with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer while trying to keep his identity secret in order to protect his fiancee, Julia.
When a rookie secret agent and private detective form an unlikely partnership to investigate a large-scale gun smuggling case between China and Korea, the two get caught up in a dangerous scheme.

Sepasang suami isteri membeli sebuah sofa lama di kedai barangan terpakai namun perwatakan suaminya mula berubah dan mula obses terhadap sofa tersebut
Lestari, a widow, owns a garment business. After her worker Sumiyati dies, Lestari and her two grown children are spooked by her spirit. She soon discovers Sumiyati's true identity and her secret.
A group of students are trapped in an illusory expedition on the mysterious Blue Wind Island.
A few undergraduate students are carrying out their research and documentary filming on a deserted island. A series of horrific incidents begin to take a toll on their enthusiasm.
Horror story revolving around a baby and two women.
A young family anticipates much joy when they move to a harmonious new neighbourhood. However, they are soon to find that things only look perfect on the surface.
A man wakes up in a shallow grave, with no recollection of what happened to him. He thinks that he may have a family and someone is out to kill him and his family.
A disfigured man meets a strikingly beautiful woman who claims to love him. Who is she?
The story revolves around three brothers from a middle income background in contemporary Singapore.

A family is on the brink of collapse, but they must travel to Spain to visit a sick relative. Along the way, each member of the family learns that their strong ties will get them through the worst times.
Fun filled movie with kids and their adventures.
A little blue monkey dreams of getting the golden cudgel & becoming the monkey king. By chance, he travels back to the world of Journey to the West, where an epic adventure awaits.
With her sister murdered in cold blood, she goes after the killer for revenge, not knowing she's a target herself.
The kids' favourite feature, Granny Fruity, is now an animation film. Filled with Taiwanese mythological creatures, this tale follows Granny Fruity & her monster friends on a new fantasy adventure!
When a robotics test deep in the heart of Southeast Asia goes haywire and wipes out an entire village, six American doctors must fight to save the day.

While on a mission to uncover the reason for being followed by a ghost, a man spends the night in a haunted mansion. But things do not go as planned. In the chaos, he must travel back in time for answers.
Set in Sydney, 1999, after an unlikely encounter at a train station, a young girl befriends a fugitive teenage boy and they travel to visit a moon rock that the girl believes will heal her.
MOONAGE DAYDREAM illuminates the life and genius of David Bowie, one of the most prolific and influential artists of our time.
A crime thriller that will make you wonder about the many unsolved questions. Who is hiding beneath the sinister mask? What motive is behind the horrifying crime?

name: Moonlight Sonata: Deafness in Three Movements

info.plot: This documentary tells an intergenerational tale of deafness through a deeply personal portrait of three lives, and the discoveries that lie beyond loss.
A pregnant college student heads out on a mission to find her birth father and her runaway groom Ho-hoon before her wedding.

Vegetation thrives in painter Morikazu's garden, which is home to critters that serve as models for his paintings. For 30 years, each day begins with breakfast followed by an exploration of his own garden.
A talented young man seeks the help of a retired master in order to gain the power to stop two mercenaries from destroying the world in an attempt to dominate Earthrealm.
Merging reality & fiction, this dark autobiographical tale takes its tone from the relationship between Kazuo and his deceased mother, Ichie.
For Motu, facing off against three children becomes an unexpected challenge when he realizes they have superstrength and a secret.

name: Motu Patlu & The Secret Of Devil's Heart

info.plot: Motu and Patlu encounter various adventures when they travel to Zoopang Island and learn about the secret of the Devil's Heart.

name: Motu Patlu & The Terror of Giant Beasts

info.plot: After Motu and Patlu bring the animal exhibits to life with Mr Maddox's magical camera in the Furfuri Nagar museum they face the huge task of stopping the monsters from destroying their city.

name: Motu Patlu 36 Ghantey Race Against Time

info.plot: Motu and Patlu must find the golden car, a prize at a racing event, and expose the thief after it gets stolen under the strict care of Chingum, a dutiful cop.

name: Motu Patlu Aur Khazaane Ki Race

Motu and Patlu travel from Furfuri Nagar to explore the deep blue seas. However, they end up getting shipwrecked and captured by the vile king shark.
A time machine sends Motu and Patlu back to the dinosaur period, but the real trouble starts when the reptiles travel back to the present day with them.
After Chingum's wedding, Motu, Patlu and friends find themselves mixed up with two scientists who look like themselves and two villains struggling for goals of each other.
Motu and Patlu travel to an extraterrestrial world to rescue Motu's father.
Motu and Patlu have to solve a mystery for the grandpa of Carnival Island, who has a nemesis bent on destroying all of grandpa's creation.
Best friends, Motu and Patlu, risk their lives to save a green baby dragon from the evil, black ones who want to harm the youngling.
With a dangerous villain to defeat in Hong Kong, Motu takes his martial arts skills to the next level, training with a boneless master to face the foe.
Motu and Patlu become friends with a goldfish and a baby octopus while visiting an aquarium in Furfuri Nagar. They promise to help them get back home safely while facing the evil octopus queen.

name: Motu Patlu in the City of Gold

info.plot: Dilawar Khan and his wife, Gul Bakawali, approach Motu and Patlu for help in retrieving their family's ancient possessions. However, their motivations seem less than sincere.

name: Motu Patlu in the Game of Zones

info.plot: A board game becomes all too real for buddies Motu and Patlu when they get transported into its world of monsters, magic and mayhem.

name: Motu Patlu In The Metal World

info.plot: Best friends Motu and Patlu, who stick with each other through thick and thin, end up in the metal world leading to hilarious situations.
When toys from the toy world take over the town, Motu and Patlu decide to stop them from causing havoc and protecting the town.
When pals Motu and Patlu take a ride in their scientist friend's newly built plane, a crash-landing on a strange island leads to action and adventure.

name: Motu Patlu Kung Fu King Returns

info.plot: When renowned martial artist Tiger Chang comes to Furfuri Nagar and challenges everyone, Motu starts training to defeat him. Soon, Patlu and Motu find themselves facing an unexpected situation.
When renowned martial artist Tiger Chang comes to Furfuri Nagar and challenges everyone, Motu starts training to defeat him. Soon, Patlu and Motu find themselves facing an unexpected situation.
Motu, Patlu, Ghasitaram and Jhatka are shocked when the Earth starts trembling due to the moon losing its shape and light. The king then orders his citizens to fight the destroyers of the moon.
Motu and Patlu tries to recover the stolen plane from the Antarctic with the help of Dr Jhatka.

name: Motu Patlu the Superheroes: Super Villains From Mars

info.plot: Friends Motu and Patlu must save the world from three space thieves, but the job becomes much harder when a cosmic collision gives the villains superpowers
While on a vacation in Russia, Motu and Patlu befriend Walter, a kind alien ghost, and help him fight Claudius, an evil phantom.
Doctor Destroyer, a villain equipped with high-tech gadgets, plots to steal a precious diamond. Fortunately, best friends Motu and Patlu set out to stop him.

name: Motu Patlu: The Planet of No Return

info.plot: When several extraterrestrial villains decide to steal all of Earth's water, Motu and Patlu must save the day and foil their plans.
In-su, with the ability to see ghosts, built a special friendship with a girl ghosts. Meanwhile, his classmates disappeared one by one and rumour says a masked ghost is the culprit.
Manfred & Flora are a married couple with a gambling addiction. During their divorce, to decide who gets their daughter's custody right, the judge orders the couple to quit gambling for a week.
When two notorious "players", Carson and Chi-Lin cross paths and fall in love, can they trust each other to remain faithful?
Mr. Bean wins a trip to Paris and helps a young boy reunite with his father, that he accidentally got him separated from his son.
After he hurt his head in an accident, Top National Security agent Joo Tae-joo is suddenly able to talk to animals. He meets a dog who might be able to help him with his current case.
Revolves around the widely known Chinese 'jumping' vampire legend but set in modern days.
A widowed cleaning lady falls madly in love with a couture Dior dress and sets out on a journey to have one of her own made, changing her life and the very future of the House of Dior.

Lex, a young woman who counsels terminally ill clients that have trouble letting go. While proving uniquely talented in her ability to connect with the dying, Lex is total loss when dealing with people.

name: Ms. Nguyen with Her Two Man

info.plot: A vietnamese girl married the old owner of a puppet theatre, where his disciple too falls in love with her. When her husband falls sick, how will she navigate her relationship with them?
The story of 2 sisters who ran away from their home because of their father's fierce nature and met a teacher of Chinese descent named Robert.

Newcomer Tony attempts to enter the rivalry between Muthu and Karthy as they compete in three unique mud races.

During construction of the world's tallest statue of Jesus, a man is disfigured in an accident. He undergoes the first face transplant in Poland but he simply cannot identify with the man in the mirror.
Sridhar, an aspiring music director, has been struggling to get a foothold in the music industry for many years. He falls in love but is willing to put his relationship on a backburner for success.
A film about the politics and hubris surrounding the Vietnam War and the revenge exacted on America's greatest sportsman of the 20th century because he refused to fight in that war.
Three amateur thieves plot to kidnap the son of wealthy Mehta from school. However, on the eve of the kidnap, the guy whose job is to operate a crane in this plan is hospitalized.
Three Egyptian mummies end up in present-day London embark on a hilarious journey in search of a stolen ring belonging to the Royal Family.

Adam is a Muslim medical practitioner who is unable to accept the fact that his wife is no longer in this world. When he agrees to treat a woman named Maria, strange and unsettling things start to happen.
Telemovie istimewa mengisahkan sebuah keluarga orang kaya yang suka membantu orang kurang berkemampuan tetapi sering dipandang serong oleh orang miskin tersebut.
Three childhood friends from a village move to Kuala Lumpur to earn a living. However, danger awaits them when they come across a valuable parcel belonging to an underworld lady boss.
Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arms dealer in order to find the hidden loot and to destroy them.
After uncovered the haunted portrait of Muoi and its curse at a commisional house, Linh falls deep in the most horrific trap, contrived for her.

The corrupt activities at a prestigious country club are uncovered by an assistant manager and now her life is in danger.
Muniyandi, an honest rickshaw driver, is falsely arrested for a crime that he did not commit.
Lord Murugan helps his devotees in the time of their need, solves their problems and blesses them.
The adventures of a prince named Tun Nila Utama, who searches for a bride and the subsequent fuss created by her upon arrival at the palace.
In order to write a hit song and make a comeback, a washed-up '80s pop star must collaborate with his quirky plant lady who has a knack for lyrics.

A famous romance author is suddenly snowbound in a small-town winter wonderland, she unexpectedly comes face-to-face with her childhood crush and a relentless reporter determined to interview her.
Five young sisters living in a coastal Turkish village on the Black Sea are placed under the tyrannical regime of traditional morality by their guardians.
A husband who has a troubling past as a result of his dark practice leads him to be out of control and risk his life and marriage.
Muthu is the loyal servant of a zamindar. Things turns sour when zamindar falls in love with Ranganayagi, but she falls for Muthu.
Tormented by a hidden curse, Heather's suppressed desires unravel when she falls for the rebellious Jonny, tempting her to unleash the animal within.
When Vanessa receives the results from her Family Tree DNA test, she discovers a family she didn't know existed and travels to their home for Christmas.
A security guard experiencing horror and supernatural events at his place
Marthandan, the son of a rich man in the village, gets bored of his life and decides to go to the city and live a simple life like the underprivileged.
Based on true story, an encounter between Hervé Villechaize and a struggling LA journalist results in a life-changing consequences for both.
A spoilt city teen has a hard time fitting in after being sent to a cattle ranch with her strict grandfather. But after bonding with an old dog, can she learn the true meaning of family?
Get on the ride again with Sameera and Jamie, the new powercouple whose life is tested with the present of Haque Zuhal who is now a fishmonger!

name: My Gift: a Christmas Special From Carrie

info.plot: Country music star Carrie Underwood brings her first-ever Christmas album My Gift to life in this celebratory holiday special.
Starring Liu Guan Lin, Wang Zhi Xuan & more, this Chinese movie is about Su Wen Xing who wanted to prove himself as more than just a mascot by opening a store in Fu Yuan City.
Youngmin and Miyoung experienced struggles in their marriage soon after the honeymoon period. As they try to sort things out, they learn the true meaning of love.
A man bears the responsibility to take care of a deaf-blind girl unexpectedly, which turns out to be life-changing to both of them.
Living with strangers becomes even more challenging when it comes to 70-year-old lady and young college boy.
A groom-to-be sets off with his friend to finding a new owner for his puppy.

Marwann may have Tunisian roots, but all he cares about is girls, not the Arab Spring. All this changes and he becomes a hero when he attends a rally for the fun of it and ends up on the cover of a daily.
This documentary chronicles the struggles of students at three US schools to achieve top grades as they rehearse for a musical that takes those same anxieties on stage.
There is a monster in the basement, and it is trying to steal my soul!

name: My Star Bride - Hi, Mai Phương Thảo

info.plot: Starring Chantalle Ng, Xu Bin & more. A Vietnamese bride reuniting with her love thought she would have the fairytale life she wanted, not knowing that a head injury would affect his memory.
In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions.
To avoid getting into an unwanted marriage, Mynaa escapes with her childhood love, Suruli, and plans to marry him.
People residing in Kasimedu change irreversibly overnight after an unforeseen incident. What happens next?
A police officer, Naachiyarr is on a mission to uncover the truth of a young man who is accused of raping his girlfriend. Can she obtain justice for the young man?
A kind-hearted man valuing law over everything gets forsaken by the very system. He finally turns vigilant and seeks revenge.
Babu, an easy-going young man, falls in love with a woman. However, he learns that he has a competitor in winning the woman's father's approval and takes up a challenge to impress him.
Jeeva is an unemployed carefree young man whose father becomes the target of a gang of young criminals after witnessing a kidnapping.
Bharat starts working in his family's factory using an alias to investigates the truth behind his father's death
Naradan is a dramatic journey of Chandraprakash, a popular news anchor in the media world who is desperate to prove his worth
The incredible story of Nadia Nadim, the former Afghan refugee who became a star player for Paris Saint-Germain, and an inspiration to refugees around the world who are forced to flee their homeland.
Tells the story of a bad habit that drives someone who in the naked eye of a human being as a 'good person' can act outside the boundaries of humanity.
Prithviraj a rich owner of an estate, falls in love with his servant Maheshwari.Arun Pandian a snake charmer and Mageswari's maternal uncle,is hell bent up on marrying her.
A legendary chef, who hides himself after a disastrous incident, returns to save his mentor's failing restaurant and reclaims his legacy.

name: Nameless Gangster: Rules of the Time

info.plot: Many corrupted custom officers sell drugs to Korea's largest drug cartels. When the president declares war on drugs, those officers will have to betray each other for survival. Who will prevail eventually?

name: Nameless Gangster: Rules of the Time

info.plot: Many corrupted custom officers sell drugs to Korea's largest drug cartels. When the president declares war on drugs, those officers will have to betray each other for survival. Who will prevail eventually?
Two sisters, Meena and Sitha, fall in love with two college professors and get married to them, only to find out that their husbands are unemployed and were only posing as professors.
Two friends set out to find a third friend from engineering college, who taught them how to be more than just victims of circumstances.
Nang Nok dan suaminya yang terpaksa berhijrah ke Kuala Lumpur setelah dihalau keluar oleh orang-orang kampung. Pelbagai kejadian pelik mula berlaku semenjak itu sehinggalah terungkai satu misteri.
A story that revolves around two friends, Chandran and Bala who goes on a road trip to Penang. Chandran goes missing in a night club and Bala goes on a search to find Chandran.
A psycho thriller revolving around an unusual syndrome that leads to mysterious murders followed by mind blowing investigations.
A man unravels a cybercrime syndicate playing an important role in taking uploading pornographic videos on the 'NARIGAL' site on social media. He hunts the criminal behind the syndicate.
With a jealous eye on her husband, Mira seeks a shaman to learn how to make "nasi kangkang".
This sequel tells the tale of a group of gangsters who are planning to rob a bank. So, Do Re and Mi use this opportunity to con them out of it and capture them at the same time.
Two servants, Labu and Labi help their employer, Haji Bakhil to kidnap a school teacher for elopement and they also just find out that they have been admiring the same woman all this while.
Ihyana telah mengalami kemalangan tetapi dia bernasib baik kerana telah diselamatkan oleh satu entiti luar biasa yang telah mengubah kelakuannya.
A different look at the career and personal life of actress Natalie Wood through the eyes of her daughter, Natasha Gregson Wagner.
A young African-American living in Chicago enters into a seductive new world of money and power after he is hired as a chauffeur for an affluent businessman.
Malati berada di dalam dilema membuat keputusan untuk menentukan arah tuju kehidupannya.
After surviving an attack by dark magic, Win sets out to avenge his loved ones' deaths and becomes entangled in sorcery and a sinister cult fronting as a get-rich programme.

Berdasarkan kisah benar mengenai perjalanan seorang ketua kampung yang mengharungi rintangan dan halangan untuk menandatangani perjanjian yang akan menjadikan Sabah sebagai salah sebuah negeri di Malaysia
An upright policeman uncovers the dirty underbelly of Tamil Nadu's syndicate when he investigates the culprit of a heinous crime
Ratha's marriage is delayed due to over-concern and pickiness by her parents. It gets worst when Radha admitted in the hospital due to a stomach pain that is life-changing.

name: New Happy Dad and Son 3 : Adventure in Russia

info.plot: This China animation film depicts how Da Tou & his family find themselves trapped in his art piece during a trip to Russia. To escape, they will first have to save the city.

name: New Happy Dad and Son 4 : Perfect Dad

info.plot: In this fourth installment of the popular Chinese animated film, a boy who triggers his father's AI program finds himself in an alternate reality where life seems perfect – but is it?
Featuring the stories of people from different walks of life getting their lives intertwined on their journey to find love and happiness on New Year's Eve.
Due to violent criticism from her viewers Mia decides to fly to Boston, U.S., to learn music. Soon after she lands, she meets an interesting young man named Seth and falls in love with him..
Produced by megastar Jay Chou, this drama starring Will Liu & Wang Jun Kai depicts how a former top team racing driver's focus on proving himself leads to his team's downfall.
Ngangkung is a story about three best friends and their endeavors in getting the winning number for lottery. Troubles ensued as they tried their best to win the winning prize for the lottery.
Frank is framed for murder. He is sent to a prison where he meets a Muslim inmate who helps him plan for a prison escape to prove his innocence. Can he succeed finally?
This searing story of solitude and isolation offers a poignant look at how life has failed one man.
Two mothers battle to see which of their overachieving daughters will be accepted to a prestigious university, but when one of their methods quickly spiral out of control, the games become deadly.
With a storyline built around a popular supernatural radio progamme in Bandung, this sequel to the original 2013 horror film tells of two girls, both gifted with the sixth sense.
When Acchamma, falls ill, her own children gather to fight over her assets. They are shocked to discover that she has caused a threat on her life, leading to accusations & betrayal within the family.
Siluvai, a Christian man, wants to get married to Sangeetha, a Hindu woman who is already engaged to Siva. Her father is against their union, but Siva decides to help them.
Trained from childhood in the way of the Ozunu Clan, deadly assassin Raizo is stalked by fellow warriors for breaking free of them and their patriarch.
An introverted young man with OCD, who is dejected after his fiancé leaves him, learns to find happiness and positivity in life from two couples whose stories he reads about.
On the journey to find her missing younger sister, In Ae discovered the violence and sexual abuse her sister had suffered and is determined to take a revenge.
A group of criminals that are brought together under mysterious circumstances has to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways.
Stan discovers the killer creature has taken refuge in his equipment warehouse. He tries to fight it on his own but his friend makes a much more sinister plan.
A couple move into an historic old house to raise their baby and mend their relationship, but ghostly happenings torment the new mother, who is driven to insanity by her postpartum depression.
A couple's relationship reached its lowest point after 11 years. The presence of a third person becomes a threat to their marital relationship.
In order to strike it big in the lottery, Aman, Bada and Cumi seeks help from the dead. Even going as far as marriage.
After the unexplainable death of their father, two siblings running a horse ranch discover something sinister hovering in the clouds in the skies above.
Nora Zain, agen perisik wanita Malaya ditugas menangani sindiket penyeludupan intan berlian Asia.
An innocent man goes to prison for murder, while the real killer goes free.
In northeast China of the late 70s, an impotent policeman attempts to apprehend a rapist with the help of a traditional Chinese medicine practitioner.
Three strangers travel across country to ëbalik kampungí, experiencing both good and bitter sweet moments.
Pak Belalang with the help of his son disguises as an astrologer to help the palace find treasures stolen by two thieves. Fortunately, Pak Belalang manages to locate the hidden treasures.

A high-powered female executive is head-hunted by an exclusive club of accomplished women to take the top spot at a water company. Initially reluctant, she changes her mind. But will she go the distance?
Nurhikmah berazam untuk buktikan kepada semua orang yang dia tidaklah sehina seperti yang mereka sangkakan.
Nussa menjuarai pertandingan sains sepanjang tiga tahun berturut-turut dan berhasrat untuk mempertahankan kejuaraannya untuk tahun ini dengan menghasilkan sebuah roket dengan bantuan Abba.
Tells the story of a paranormal entity who takes over the responsibility of taking care for a baby from its irresponsible parents.
Zali is sad with the condition of his wife, Minah who he thinks is senile when in fact he is the one facing the disease.
A maximum-security prison inmate's impending release is upended when he befriends a newly incarcerated young man.
On a spectacular future Earth that has evolved beyond recognition, one man's confrontation with the past will lead him on a journey of redemption and discovery as he battles to save mankind.
A girl becomes the obsession of several men with a mysterious background. One of them might be so obsessed with her that they are willing to kill others just to get her.
Debbie Ocean, after her release from prison, gathers an all-female team in an attempt to steal the 150 million dollars worth necklace from the New York annual Met Gala.
A group of men pull off the most sophisticated and daring Las Vegas casino heist ever.
Danny rounds up the boys for a third heist after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of his pals.
George Clooney and his team tries to pull off the biggest heist ever – bigger than anything Europe has ever seen.
A group of people get trapped in a movie theater. The characters start experiencing a paranormal presence and try their best to escape from the place. What happens next?
To nab a sales manager who's at large after murdering his family, a detective investigates the man's colleagues, who seem to be hiding something.
When the CEO planned to close one of the branch outlet, the branch manager held an epic Christmas party but the party turned out to be out of control.
The compound of an arms manufacturer turns into a zombie nightmare when workers are given a drink made using the wrong formula.
A school kid rescues a blind Siberian Husky to prove its worth to the outside world where it was neglected
An aspiring adult filmmaker and his girlfriend explore a haunted bungalow located in a small village, not realising that he had a past that has led him to a ghost, who was once a powerful queen.
FD Taemin meets a female ghost who lives in the studio he works. As mysterious events happened in the studio, they join hands to investigate and protect his job and her sleeping place.
A team of Malaysian footballers struggle to overcome personal and collective hardships as a team. Together they create the most triumphant zero to hero story and gain a place at the Olympic Games.
Ana is a 9 year old girl who is interested in playing badminton. But how did she finally become a national badminton player and successfully participate in the Olympics?

As a child, Fiona spent a lot of time with her Oma. But conflict between her mother and Oma has kept them apart for years. Now, she is having recurring dreams of a woman who is telling her to visit Oma.
Puteri Duyung Rania yang kehilangan bondanya sejak kecil begitu gembira dengan kehadiran bonda tirinya iaitu Permaisuri Siti Orcha tetapi permaisuri Siti Orcha sebenarnya mengamalkan ilmu hitam.
Izzah is sold to an entertainment club in Kuala Lumpur by her uncle as a prostitute. Later, Hariz buys her and takes her as a wife. Haris's hatred towards Izzah eventually turns to love.

name: On The Beach At Night Alone

info.plot: After a publicized affair with her director, an actress leaves South Korea and goes to Hamburg, where she gains insight into the meanings of love and identity.
Bri, a young gifted rapper, strives to stay true to herself while breaking into the music industry.
Malaysia's popular film director, Chiu Keng Guan, returns with his China movie debut about a man who helps his son achieve his dream of running a marathon-despite his multiple sclerosis.

name: Once A Upon A Time In Venice

info.plot: To get his beloved terrier back from the vicious gang that stole him, a weary private detective must do a few illegal favors for the gang's leader.
Vijay, a careless man, finds a senior citizen called Selvam to pretend to be his father for an important business deal. Soon after they start the charade, they start helping each other.

name: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong

info.plot: Helmed by four Best Actors and set in Hong Kong in the 1970s, this exciting action film charts how the ICAC dealt with corruption within the police force in its early stages of establishment.

name: Once Upon a Time in Mexico

info.plot: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.
A righteous politician's unflinching loyalty to his ideologies is sorely tested after some damning allegations are levelled against him.
The film opens in a run-down, abandoned warehouse where a film crew are making a zombie film. Yet, this is no ordinary warehouse. Out of nowhere, real zombies arrive and terrorize the crew!
A young composer sets off on a reluctant road trip with his niece in search of her elusive father, who is in a roving rock band.

Huang, Guang and Hui come from different educational and social backgrounds; and they were imprisoned for various reasons. Despite their extreme differences, they nurtured an extraordinary bond between the
Chow Yun-Fat plays the unlucky gambler Chui Sui-Fai, whose ex-girlfriend asks him to take care of their autistic son. He reluctantly agreed and the two slowly begin to build their relationship.
A first-person account of one Holocaust survivor as a tribute to the millions whose stories cannot be told.
When some fun-seeking young friends head deep into the woods for a night of hedonism, they soon fall prey to a team of psychotic killers. A bewildering and deadly game begins. Only one will survive.
After a comet releases a mysterious virus that is lethal to women, a young couple hides out in their over-sterilized apartment trying to fight for their lives, and against an authoritarian regime.
An archeology student accidentally finds an ancient book on Onrust island. When he and his girlfriend try to dig into the history, they accidentally unleash spirits from the island's dark past.
A man who works for a seedy private detective decides to turn over a new leaf, but ends up antagonising the men behind his last assignment

Seorang jejaka ingin mengahwini seorang gadis muda dan menghantar rombongan meminang. Tiba hari pernikahan dan rupa-rupanya dia telah tersalah meminang dan mengahwini seorang janda yang lebih tua darinya!
This poignant documentary follows an aging couple from Nepal on their transformative journey to reclaim their sight.
Feud between two clashing gangs escalated in a comical way.
Super spy Orson Fortune must track down and stop the sale of a deadly new weapons technology wielded by billionaire arms broker Greg Simmonds.
Seorang pemberita yang viral gara-gara melatah ketika melaporkan berita secara langsung kemudian ingin dipecat oleh majikannya. Pelbagai usaha dilakukan untuk mengagumkan bosnya kembali.

name: Oprah and the Color Purple Journey

info.plot: A behind the scenes look into the making of The Color Purple Musical, as well as the impact the book and movie have made on culture.
Sara dikatakan hanya jatuh tangga, tapi kecederaannya yang membawa kepada koma menimbulkan tanda tanya. Tanpa mereka sedari, segalanya berpunca daripada orang yang sangat dekat dengan mereka.
Amir wanted to be rich so much and he agreed to the conditions given by the Tok Ketua Kampung Bunian. However, Amir had violated those conditions which ended up trapping himself.
A ruthless band of bloodthirsty bandits terrorizes a family on the treacherous Oregon Trail, and challenge's one woman's will to survive.
After orchestrating a brilliant escape from an Estonian psychiatric facility, Leena Klammer passes herself off as Esther Albright, the missing daughter of a wealthy American family.
A true story of negotiations between implacable enemies - a small but committed group of Israelis, Palestinians and one Norwegian couple - that led to the 1993 Oslo Peace Accords.
Osthe is the story of a daring stylish cop 'Osthe Velan' (Simbu).
A group of terrorists kidnaps Sudha and takes over her apartment to save their employer Robert.
An anthology short film series consisting of 6 interesting stories happened during 1950s to 2020 with an overarching theme of Stronger Together in conjunction of Merdeka Celebration.
When Reiko is diagnosed with a brain tumour and inches further into dementia, her family has to deal with suppressed problems that begin to surface.
Seorang pemuda telah mencipta alat untuk menghidupkan kembali roh orang yang disayangi di dalam rumah keluarganya tetapi sebaliknya telah terjadi.
A panoramic yet intimate look at how small towns confront setbacks and the surprising ways they chart a new future.

name: Outside the Bubble: On the Road with Alexandra Pelosi

info.plot: Intrepid filmmaker Alexandra Pelosi sets out on a cross-country trip to engage in conversations with fellow Americans to gain an unfiltered understanding of other perspectives.
When an unidentified corpse is found at a residential unit, the residents fear that its presence will turn their home into an ill-fated house, leading to a chaotic endeavor to remove the body.
A battle against crime ensues when Pandian, an upright forest officer, comes in the way of the forest smuggler Chelladurai and his father.
Dunia hidup Rosli diselubungi dengan noda dan dosa. Suatu hari Rosli bertemu dengan seorang lelaki tua yang mencabarnya keluar mencari kebaikan dengan mengembara selama 40 hari.
Padayappa's family is humiliated by an uncle and forced to leave their home. After working hard, Padayappa restores his family's honour.
A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.
A young man falls in love with a girl who is chased by goons , how he rescues her through a road trip is the plot of Paiyaa.
Koya telah dipilih untuk menggantikan Dalang Senik. Namun sebelum dia mewarisi segala harta pusaka Dalang Senik, dia kena belajar menjadi seorang Dalang termasuk menjaga Pak Dogo.
After Adam accidentally hits Melati while driving, he and his family decide to let the girl live with them as she is suffering from amnesia
Story of Pallavi, an independent woman and Adithya, a spoiled brat requested to work as her waiter in the bakery. Will Pallavi and Adithya gets together?

Prince Suria Kenchana is cursed by his stepmother and he turns into a cobra during the day and human at night. The magic spell can only be broken by a necklace owned by Teratai, a daughter of a woodsman.
Follow the story of Si Badul who tried his best to become a famous warrior. Various funny incidents took place during Badul's journey to find the martial art teacher.
A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.
Seorang puteri raja yang disingkir telah menyamar menjadi Panji Semerang untuk merebut kembali takhta ayahandanya.
A Korean talent agent arrives in America and goes through with a fake marriage to stay there. However, his fake wife later dies in a car accident, leaving him with her six children.
Saadom menyamar untuk mengetahui calon suami Mia. Dia tergamam apabila mendapati jejaka itu adalah orang yang tidak pernah dibayangkan.
An archaeologist named Aroon goes on a trip with three of his friends. During the trip, they come across an ancient board game and decide to play it, oblivious to the dire consequences.

Aadhi, who desperately needs money to save his sister, happens to meet a self-centric police officer, Mythreyan, during a theft. They both get involved in an idol trade, which eventually leads to chaos.
An unemployed family takes a peculiar interest in a wealthy & glamorous family, causing them to become entangled in unexpected incidents.
ACP Parasuram helps Siva's mother, a widow, in recouping their wealth. Brainwashed by Akash, a terrorist, Siva works against the police and the government and believes they killed his brother.
A young couple moves into a new house, but soon, the husband gets into a war of words with the existing tenant over parking space that spirals to a full-blown, dirty battle of egos.
Follows two brothers, one a criminal and the other an ordinary person, as they become closer after their mother's unexpected death

In a timeless story about love in the midst of war, a young couple must navigate a puzzling and painful world in order for them to leave pain and suffering behind and find a fresh start in a new continent.
Two best friends steal for a living, but when they try to steal from a scientist, one of them gets trapped in an experiment and is transformed into a woman.

Sebuah kisah cinta diantara lelaki tua, Ustaz Muaz dan seorang perempuan muda yang penuh parut dibadan bernama Ashikin, Ustaz Muaz mempunyai rahsia pahit pada masa silam yang berkaitan dengan Ashikin.
Two people wake up 90 years too soon from an induced hibernation on board a spaceship bound for a new planet.

name: Pat the Dog: A Very Special Dog

info.plot: Lola dreams of having a dog despite her parents' disapproval. Without them knowing she decides to adopt a little dog that she tries to train. But the Guanos have no intention of letting her get away with

name: Pat The Dog: Into The Wild

info.plot: Mom and dad are going on a camping trip in the forest with Lola, Lucie, Hugo and Victor. While the parents go to look for wood and get lost in the forest, Lola reassure her friends that everything's OK
Will Ella fall in love with Andy and will she ever find out who Andy really is?
A doctor treats patients using humour. Unfortunately, the medical community does not appreciate his methods, while the actual patients, medical professors and hospital nurses appreciate his work.
In the mid-1960s, President Johnson and his foreign-policy team debate the decision to withdraw from or escalate the war in Vietnam.
A police officer is faced with a dilemma when he discovers the crime lord he was tasked to find and kill to be far from nefarious. Will he help the crime lord or will he bring him down?
A bodyguard is assigned to protect Keerthi, the daughter of Naidu.
There is a zombie outbreak following a medical trial at an international detention and medical facility on an isolated island. A team is formed from the most unlikely individuals.
Set in the 80s, the film will focus on the cat and mouse game between a serial killer and an honest police officer.
After Nurse Pavithra's child dies at birth, she grows fond of Ashok, an 18-year-old patient suffering from bone cancer.
A commando, who had run away from home years ago, returns to his village. He doesn't reveal his identity and witnesses his family and childhood sweetheart tirelessly waiting for his arrival.
A teen romance between students, which is dismissed as infatuation by their respective parents

A young gravedigger unearths an ancient gold anklet that he unwisely keeps, only discovers the curse afflicted on it when scales started appearing on his skin and a ghostly apparition begins to haunt him.
Two monks try and try to leave monkhood. Unbeknownst to them, the temple is cursed. He who enters may never leave!
A newlywed couple bicker constantly even during their honeymoon. All that changes when two ghosts show up in their bungalow, forcing them to stick with each other to face the myseterious apparitions.
A family of low-level crooks is mistaken for ghostbusters and asked to get rid of the ghosts haunting a bungalow.
Alexandra Pelosi offers a candid look at the life of her mother and Speaker of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Pelosi.
Kisah seorang gadis yang bencikan Hari Raya dan cuba untuk merosakkan perasaan gembira orang lain supaya mereka menjadi sepertinya.
The greedy attitude of Zarul and Azhar finally backfired on them when they encounter a shaman as a shortcut to get rich and has made them bothered by subtle beings.
Khairul keeps a thousand and one secrets about his past. But circumstances forced him to return to his hometown with his wife, Miza. What awaits them there is only pain and demonic interference.
Murni terpaksa melarikan diri dari dihentam orang kampungnya kerana mewarisi ilmu penanggal yang mengancam nyawa penduduk setempat.

It tells the misadventures of the three bachelors, Ramli, Aziz and Sudin as they learn self defence. Along the way, they discover their mutual attraction for their teacher's daughter and their illiteracy.
A horror classic from Indonesia, this is a cautionary tale to those who abandon their faith in pursuit of the dark arts, leaving themselves vulnerable to the temptations of Satan.
Now living in a flat with her father and younger siblings, Rini thought they escaped the events that killed her mother and youngest brother. But living there is more dangerous with "new neighbours".
The childish Dhia is briefly introduced to Rizman, a mature and patient man. The relationship leads them to tie the knot but a tragedy strikes, which robs them off their happiness.
When a father decides his daughter, Fammy, should marry his best friend's son, Fammy secretly hatches a plan to kidnap her favorite celebrity and go off with him instead.
A woman is disturbed by the supernatural after she gets involved in a car accident.
Arif dan Mazwin berkahwin dalam keadaan mengejut apabila mereka dikahwinkan tanpa perancangan. Mereka dijadikan pengantin ganti saat akhir kerana Harishah dan Natasha melarikan diri malam akad nikah.

When an evil scientist, Dr. Octavius Brine hatches a plan to eliminate the penguins, Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private must team with a clandestine animal organization to thwart the diabolical plan.
Mengisahkan kegigihan dan ketabahan seorang wanita, Salmah yang menghidapi barah payudara tahap dua menuntut fasakh daripada suaminya, Zaid setelah suaminya mensia-siakan pengorbanannya selama ini.

Musa adalah seorang pemuda bijak tetapi antisosial, dan dia telah diberi amanat oleh ketua kampung untuk menjayakan 'Malam Bintang Gemilang' di kampung mereka bersama dengan 3 orang pemuda bermasalah.
Azmi , a doctor, thinks that he lives in his house alone. What he doesn't realize is that for months, a woman named Maz has been living under his roof, in his closet.
A couple discovers a sinister conspiracy centered around a religious figure when supernatural beings begin to wreak havoc in their lives.
The sequel tells about Amir and Anna being harassed by Huda due to old grudges, and the disappearance of a schoolgirl that leads to the presence of a priest. What is the connection between them?
Daniel dan kawan-kawannya menghadapi gangguan misteri oleh Penunggu Sol-dorm ketika bersolat secara berjemaah di Dorm Asrama di mana mereka ternampak kelibat meyerupai cikgu Azizi.
Kebahagian rumah tangga Johan dan Ozlynn, mula goyah bila mereka tidak berhenti bergaduh untuk menyambut Raya pertama di kampung Johan atau Ozlynn.
Three best friends promised to get married, at the same time when they turn 26 years old. Their perceptions of marriage life begin to change and conflict ensues.
A serial killer chooses his victims based on traffic violations. A policeman is trying to stop the killings and unravel the motives behind everything.

A viral outbreak turns people into aggressive zombies. In the midst of the chaos and hysteria, a woman begins to go into labour. She must face it all by herself when her husband fails to reach her side.
Iman yang berjiwa feminin bertemu dengan Aina yang berperwatakan kasar. Dalam usaha untuk mengubah sifat masing-masing, mereka menjadi semakin rapat hingga rasa sayang mula timbul antara mereka
Empat orang perisik cilik terdiri daripada Amir, Iqbal, ID dan Nisha bersama dalam sebuah misi untuk menghentikan kegiatan jahat seorang saintis gila.
Andri and his wife Wati who wants to get rich quickly get the opportunity to take care of the wealthy Nenek. But strange things occurred when they try to steal her belongings.
Pasangan selebriti terkenal di Malaysia, Asha dan Mal terdesak untuk menjaga rahsia perkahwinan mereka dari diketahui oleh pengurus mereka, Feek.
A music student comes into contact with a cursed drum and its attendant spirit. He learns to play it, not knowing that the drum is a dangerous instrument that can kill.

Alya seorang shopaholic yang cuba bertaubat dari sifat borosnya, tanpa menyangka minatnya dalam bidang fesyen dan kepakarannya berbelanja akhirnya mampu mengubah hidupnya dan juga orang disekelilingnya.
A woman, whose brother died recently, believes she can communicate with spirits. Soon, she starts getting mysterious text messages.
In his latest stand-up special, Pete Holmes confronts personal truths about the mechanisms of consciousness, the afterlife and Elon Musk, and shares a few thoughts on being a new dad.
Peter Rabbit and family wreak havoc in hopes to win back the Manor House of Old McGregor and the affections of their neighbor, Bea.
The funny behaviour of two siblings who have different opinions with their mother in an effort to change their mother's thoughts about the old refrigerator in the house.

An investigative reporter begin receiving a series of disturbing calls after getting a new phone. As she investigates the matter, she discovers that the previous owners have all suffered a gruesome fate.
This telemovie revolves around a family, where the children try to get their parents un hocked from social media apps that are making their parents famous for all the wrong reasons.
When Ah Ma pays a visit to Phua Chu Kang & Rosie Phua, she disappears mysteriously, only to resurface at a nursing home run by Lim Lau Pek, where residents have been dying one by one.
A man makes meticulous plans with murderous intentions. But things are turned on their head and he finds himself caught up in a hide-and-seek game of life and death.
The story of a father who seeks forgiveness from his child who was left in poverty.

A successful businessman has cancer but unable to accept his fate, he tries to get treatment. He finally meets a mysterious healer who makes him feel healthier. But now, he must suffer the consequences.
Kisah benar Allahyarham Dato' S. Roomai Noor dan Allahyarhamah Datin Umi Kalsom mengenai saat-saat akhir mereka bersama ketika mengerjakan umrah. Kisah kasih sayang dan kesetiaan hingga hujung nyawa.

A suspenseful thriller about a sculptor whose perfect life unravels when he keeps getting mysterious pleas for help. Then there is a door he is forbidden from opening, which drives him mad with obsession.
A team of experts were put together to drill into Korea's oil pipeline and steal petroleum, but the plan takes a turn as the group begin to deceive one another.
A violinist, who fails in his attempt to save the victim of an accident, encounters her again when she returns as a dark presence in his home.
A man who specialises in cancelling weddings enters a tricky situation where his own wedding faces threat.
A spoiled young heiress marries a poor man in order to inherit her grandfather's property.
The Barden Bellas enters an international competition that no American group has ever won.
Now graduated from college and realizing it takes more than just acappella to get by, the Bellas return in the final chapter to make music together one last time.
Nalan, who dreams of running his own restaurant, is tormented by two murders. Kayal, an ambitious developer, investigates the murder and discovers a spirit.
The film has Rio Raj and Ramya Nambeesan playing IT employees. While the former hails from north Madras backdrop, the latter is from a small town.
A horror writer moves into a remote Scottish castle to develop a new play. However, supernatural disturbances prey on his teenage daughter.

name: Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf: Dunk for Future

info.plot: In this popular Chinese animated film, Weslie, Wolffy & the other goats pursue a dream of victory as they reunite as Team Defenders to prove themselves in a new basketball championship.

name: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain

info.plot: The comedy follows childhood best friends Ben, Martin and John, who embark on an adventure in the wilderness to find a priceless lost treasure.
Kathiravan loses his wife and his leg in an accident and decides to get a prosthetic leg with the compensation money.
Pok Ya merupakan seorang samseng gedebe di Kelantan. Dia mendapat tugasan untuk mencari anak seorang peniaga yang diculik di Kuala Lumpur.

name: Pok Ya Cong Codei Siti Di Hati

info.plot: Pok Ya cannot forget Siti, his wife, who has run away. To heal this hurt, Pok Ya marries his friend's daughter, but his new wife is not as docile as Siti.
When ace detective Harry Goodman goes missing, his son Tim teams up with his former Pokemon partner, Detective Pikachu, to find him. Available in English & Cantonese audio.
High school loner Bird Fitcher has no idea what dark secrets are tied to the Polaroid camera she finds. It doesn't take long to discover that those who have their picture taken with it, soon die.
Two policemen, Khai and Sani, have very different personalities. However, they have to put aside their differences when they have to work together in a mission to defeat a drug trafficking syndicate.
Di saat sekumpulan pengganas menawan sebuah perkampungan dan menjadikan penduduknya sebagai tebusan, Inspektor Sani dan Inspektor Khai terpaksa menghadapi situasi itu.
Ria Khan believes she must save her older sister Lena from her impending marriage. Enlisting her friends' help, she attempts to pull off the most ambitious wedding heists in the name of independence.
Kisah kesengsaraan hidup Mak Jah dan Pak Mat yang telah ditinggalkan anak-anak mereka yang sibuk untuk mengejar harta dan kekayaan dunia.
Selepas kematian Pak Mat, Mak Jah selalu bermurung terkenangkan beliau. Mak Jah bernasib baik kerana ditemani oleh salah seorang anaknya dan seorang jiran yang begitu mengambil berat ke atas beliau.
Seorang ibu yang terlalu mengharapkan kasih sayang daripada anaknya telah disalah sangka hingga si anak sanggup membuang ibunya.
Revolving around Raja Chola, who expanded his empire from modern-day Tamilnadu all the way north to the Ganges, this story chronicles the great ruler's campaign to protect his country.
Rohani and Halimah are cousins ​​who are in love with men. Out of jealousy, Halimah plans to kill Rohani who is pregnant and dies after giving birth to a baby girl.
Pontianak Harum Sundal Malam sparked a mystery when Mariam who had been killed was reincarnated in Maria's body.
Pontianak Harum Sundal Malam 2 was emotional when Meriam reclaimed his 'life' which had been confiscated by Marsani.
A story that revolves around a journalist from India who comes to Malaysia for his true ghost stories project and encounters a frightening supernatural entity that is haunting a group of friends.
Ukrapandi gets rid of his child when astrologers predict that he will bring bad luck to the family.
An architect chances upon his childhood companion, an elephant, and decides to take it back to the village where they grew up together.
When an ambitious ghost hunter performs a risky ritual, opening a portal to "the other side", he and his team quickly find a way to counter the forces of an ancient demon.
Ambitious entrepreneur Praveen who has only 36 hours to find a stolen money to save his family.
"Praise This" follows the journey of Sam, an aspiring young singer who dreams of breaking into the music industry.
The tiny town of Brightridge is in for a surprise as a reindeer and a plucky young girl work together to help her grandfather save his beloved store.
Five filmmakers meet through Facebook and decide to go to an old bungalow to make a short film.

To combat a global rise in demonic possessions, the church reopen schools to train priests to perform exorcisms. One nun prepares herself to come face to face with a demonic force with ties to her past.
Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice
In quiet but unsparing language, Primo Levi narrates the story of how he, an Italian-Jewish chemist, was captured by the Nazis and sent to Auschwitz.
Princess Emmy is a young girl with a secret gift - she is the only one in the Kingdom of Kandis who can speak to horses.
Ashok and Julie are childhood friends. Julie is set to marry Michael, a cricketer who is hoping to get selected in the Indian team

A westernised Vijay weds his industrialist father's sincere secretary who hails from a poor family. But their prenuptial agreement stipulates that he has the power to end his marriage after 12 months.
Vasanth, the son of a wealthy businessman, falls in love with Priya when he visits Rajasthan. He impersonates a man named Vasanth Kumar, who had saved her life before, to get closer to Priya.
Priya, a rich girl, marries Sakhi, a middle-class man. As soon as they get married, problems arise mostly because Priya is unable to adjust in Sakhi's household
A brilliant high school student and his friends uncover blueprints for a mysterious device with limitless potential, inadvertently putting lives in danger.
A sci-fi thriller about a space mission sent to terraform a distant planet. However, the mission encounters something unknown that has its own plan for the planet.
On the island, the group of teenagers is thrilled as they explore the place, ignoring rumored supernatural beliefs and disturbing the serenity of the place. However, their excitement is short-lived.
A group of Korean criminals to be transported on a freighter from the Philippines to Korea unleash a sinister force after an escape attempt leads to a riot and brutal murders.
Sam, an elite hacker works for 'Cybersec Corporation' while his friend Aman has been hacking and selling confidential data to a criminal gang in Bangkok.
A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.
An undercover officer becomes too immersed in his role as a drug trafficker when he starts climbing up the ranks.
A ghost who demands the settlement of her unnatural death has become a corpse collected in a bunker with other corpses.
When Sergeant Lo Sa loses his revolver to some young triad thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Ho to find his lost gun. However, things turn deadly when they run into a web of gang members.
A worker at a Russian nuclear plant steals a small amount of weapons grade plutonium and tries to sell it on the Moscow black market.
The Puaka X group aims to discredit reports of supernatural sightings in well-known haunted spots in Malaysia. But they are eventually forced to eat humble pie.
Fahmi melarikan diri dari rumah pada malam hari raya. Tanpa diketahui, ibunya telah meninggal pada malam yang sama. Selepas 4 tahun, Fahmi kembali kerana terlalu rindukan ibunya.
A girl is trapped in practicing black magic in order to defend those who have wronged her in the past.
Johnny Depp and Christian Bale star in this drama set in 1930s America about a government agent's attempt to stop a charismatic and elusive outlaw.
Desperate to get back home, he accepts the job of taking a girl to India in return for a hefty sum.
A young boy runs away when his mother dies and ends up in the company of a gangster.
Yugan, makes a vow to fulfill his grandfather's last wish; to gather their family members for a photograph. Will he succeeed?
Dua orang perompak yang menggunakan pukau cuba merompak namun tidak berjaya lalu menjadikan seorang budak lelaki sebagai tebusan.
Due to political pressures, Raj, a police officer, is suspended from his duties for investigating a murder case.
A group of friend's vacation turns into a nightmare when losing bet ends with them having to spend the night on a deserted island, where they encounter vicious spirits trapped there.
The story revolves around the clash between humans and demons in a Kingdom ruled by demons.
A skilled cop must race against time to solve the dark mystery behind two twin sisters who are trapped at an abandoned house.

Having been diagnosed with a terminal illness, and learning that his life will not be long, Shafie is on vacation with friends, with the intention of reuniting them, but various trials have to be overcome.
Puss in Boots is on a journey to steal the goose that lays golden eggs!

name: Puss In Boots: The Last Wish

info.plot: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll: He has burned through eight of his nine lives, leaving him with only one life left. Puss sets out on an epic journey to find the m
Wira menjadi muda kembali apabila dia bertemu dengan puteri pari-pari tetapi Toba menjadi sebaliknya.
A heart rending love story of a couple, Rostam, a married man and Lisdar, a widow ends up tragically when she is hit by a car driven by a man whose love is rejected by her.

Kisah pengembaraan Puyah, seorang gadis kampung becok yang disukai ramai, apabila dia melawat Kuala Lumpur dan termasuk set filem secara tak sengaja, dan tak semena-mena mula mendapat nama sebagai pelakon.
Mengisahkan Bakri yang menikahi Hawa, namun cintanya masih kepada bekas kekasihnya, Salmi yang telah menikahi jejaka lain kerana terpaksa.
Adapted from a popular urban legend, teenagers in an old boarding school find an old mirror covered in mysterious drawings. Then, their wishes come true, but there is a price to pay.
Wong Jing produces, Ron Ng and Xu Dong Dong star. Tie Jia Wen, driven by failed missions, quits the police to run a gym. She secretly hunts down the drug lord, ensuring justice for female trainers.
Sarah and her friends found an Ouija Board in the attic of the vacation villa she inherited and unknowingly awaken an evil force connected to the villa's hidden secrets.
Returns after a hiatus of 20 years due to fans request. This new telemovie is the next instalment to the series bringing back the original cast and some new faces for a new generation.
A supernatural action-comedy origin story about how Roy becomes an officer in the Rest In Peace Department (R.I.P.D.).
Raam and Leela divorce confirmation come to announcement one day before the lockdown, forcing them to stay together after divorce and rekindled their love.
A villager's search for his two lost bulls turns into an expose of the corruption in politics and media
Two sections of a village in Ramnad district get into trouble due to a politics played of certain bureaucrats
Sahib who has been living with his single mother leaves to Kuala Lumpur for financial needs. While he gets bullied by a group of youths at a gurdwara, a pretty girl gets attracted at him.
Revisit the final 100 days of WWII in Europe as we detail the chaos that led to the collapse and surrender of Germany.
A middle-class youngster who is passionate about bikes tries to pursue professional racing against all odds and challenges. Will he vroom past the finish line?
Jamal, a married man, is attracted to Aishah, and starts to abandon his family. Soon he realizes Harun, an agent insurance and his lover, Aishah have a plan to expropriate his wealth.
Suraya is a naive village girl who looks forward to happy days when Hazrul proposes to her. But those happy days are only temporary when she learns who Hazrul really is.
Krishna found his lovable pet Radha, an elephant in the jungle and end up with an unexpected tragedy.
Starring Donnie Yen, Nicholas Tse, an inspector discovers that the team of masked thugs who killed his co-workers are led by a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him.

Professor Hamdan and Ramlah move into an old bungalow located by the sea. At first their life in the bungalow was peaceful, but after the death of their daughter, they experienced strange disturbances.
A daring cop wants to get rid of all the rowdies in the city.
A railroad worker in China, teams up with a group of freedom fighters in order to fight the Japanese army and steal the food, which they then give to their starving Chinese population.

During the fight for liberation in the Langhe, the partisan Milton is divided between the fights against the Nazi-fascists, the friendship with his brigade companions and his clandestine love for Fulvia.
Priya confesses her love to Raja but he mistakenly falls for a girl with the same name. Years later, Priya re-enters his life and triggers a series of emotionally complicated situations.
This documentary traces the extraordinary events which defined Al-Sultan Abdullah Ri'ayatuddin Al-Mustafa Billah Shah reign as the Yang di Pertuan Agong.
Seorang Laksamana yang telah banyak berjasa telah dilantik menjadi Sultan setelah kemangkatan raja.
John and Regina are forced into marriage against their wishes and lead a troubled life as they are unable to get over their bitter past.
A man suffering from Alzheimer's has to uncover the secret of his piano with the help of his family before the mysterious figure threatening their lives succeed in obtaining the treasure within.
This historic action zombie film tells of a Prince of Joseon who returns home after years of absence to save his nation from demons who run rampant in the night.
Aaditya, who has a unique syndrome, marrries Abhinaya. While on their honeymoon in Manali, their life takes a turn.
Om is the story of a special forces Para commando officer on a mission to save his country and finding answers to questions that have clouded his entire existence.
A couple's peaceful life in a rural village is disrupted when the wife accidentally knocks down a marked stone, offending a supernatural entity.

Nina mengalami tekanan emosi apabila mengetahui bayinya meninggal dunia ketika dilahirkan. Dia kemudian terdengar suara tangisan bayi di rumah ibu mertuanya, dan mula merasakan bahawa anaknya masih hidup.
An aloof publication editor is forced to come back to his old workplace after a friend is murdered by a crazy fan.
A serial killer is murdering school girls, and a newbie cop has to track him down before the victim count increases.
Former residents of an orphanage take their families to visit the place but their night turns into a nightmare when something evil terrorizes them.

A young woman is wrongly accused of using sorcery to disrupt her ex lover's wedding ceremony. Cast off a cliff, she is rescued by a mysterious and powerful shaman, who encourages her to redeem her honour.

Alone in the woods, nature photographer Harper witnesses a violent crime. After being captured by the culprits, she uses her survivalist skills to make it out alive and turns the table on her captors.
Upon learning that Shila , his muslim daugter-in-law - is celebrating raya without her parents, Mr Ho decides to throw up the best raya celebration for Shila at his house
Kisah 3 orang adik beradik yang tidak pernah sehaluan. Orang tua mereka meninggalkan mereka untuk persiapan hari raya, dan kekecohan mula berlaku.
Soraya dan Haidar mahu disatukan atas kehendak ibunyu, namun Soraya jadi marah bila Haidar rapat dengan Kalsom. Tetapi sebaliknya Haidar dan Kalsom menyimpan suatu rahsia.
Ibu Danni memaksanya untuk berkahwin dengan Ria kerana memerlukan wang untuk pembedahan adiknya. Adakah mereka berjaya memenuhi impian ibu walupun mereka membenci antara satu sama lain?
A mysterious guy comes out to execute the betrayer of a special force by bringing along his most ruthless soldiers.
When the creator of a virtual reality universe dies, he leaves his fortune to the first person who finds a hidden digital Easter egg, sparking a contest that grips the entire world.
A young Hispanic woman must choose between ambition and tradition in this coming of age comedy where real women embrace life...and have curves.
In the film, directed by Tina Satter, Sweeney portrays Reality Winner, a woman convicted of leaking a confidential report on Russian election interference to the media.
This animated fantasy adventure movie is about Magnus, a young soldier in the Terracotta army, who teams up with a mysterious woman in search of one of the greatest native creatures.
A stillborn baby girl is abducted by a morgue attendant and brought back to life by electrokinetic power. After 16 years, she escapes captivity and sets out to find her birth mothr.
A former basketball player is selected to coach a highschool team, which is about to be disbanded. The rookie coach lead 6 'no-bodies' through 8 days of matches, turning the impossible possible.
Soo-jin wakes up one day and learns that she's lost her memory. Her doting husband Ji-hoon takes her home—but things are not as they seem. Soo-jin begins to experience hallucinations.
A chronicle of the weeks after the 2000 U.S. presidential election and the subsequent recounts in Florida.
Desk manager of a Miami hotel, Lisa Reisert found herself a pawn in a terrorist attack whilst onboard a flight.

A former professional racer falls into despair after causing his brother's death. He meets Dr. Hui & becomes an ambulance driver. Meanwhile, his friends uncover the truth behind his brother's accident.
Mikhail helps his clients to erase bad memories. However, he finds that he is losing his little girl. In trying to search his own memories for the reason, he gets lost between reality and mystery.
Hoping to make some quick money, a jobless guy decides to help a mysterious gang extract a crucial piece of intel from an amnesiac underworld don.
Chef Syafi'e taksub dengan sebilah keris yang dia percayai rahsia di sebalik resipi rendangnya yang enak. Kekecohan berlaku setelah keris itu hilang semasa dia menyertai sebuah pertandingan memasak.
Renfield, the tortured aide to history's most narcissistic boss, Dracula, wants to break out from under the shadow of The Prince of Darkness. Now he just has to figure out how.
Sebuah kisah pegawai Kor Agama Angkatan Tentera yang terpilih oleh Allah SWT untuk mendapat tanda-tanda kematian dalam masa 100 hari.
A behind-the-scenes look at the return of the Public Theater's "Shakespeare in the Park" following its closure due tothe global pandemic.
Dileepan discovers a time machine in the shape of a shoe and unexpectedly gets caught by the police while testing it
This Jackie Chan-produced sci-fi thriller revolves around a scientist who frantically sends herself back in time to save her son. Starring Yang Mi & Wallace Huo.
A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.
Karthikeyan, a photo editor in Mumbai, is a widower whose parents wish to see him settled and happy. Chitra, a widow with a son, gives them hope, unaware that their pasts are intertwined.
A security guard who worked at the 1996 Atlanta Olympics event discovers a pipe bomb in a duffel bag which resulted in the death of many and made him a criminal in the blink of an eye.
Comedian Ricky Velez bares it all with his honest lens and down to earth perspective in his first-ever HBO stand-upspecial.
Ben, a security guard, is in love with police officer James Payton's sister. In order to win his future brother-in-law's heart, Ben rides along with him on a 24-hour patrol trip to Atlanta.
James takes Ben along to pull the plug on a drug racket involving an influential businessman, Antonio Pope. However, with Ben's wedding day approaching, the two have little time to expose the crime.
Master Luo, a retired stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. But due to his debts, he might lose his horse, so he seeks help from his estranged daughter & her boyfriend.
Nina, a young graduate works at a modeling agency. Here, she begins to be exposed to the realities of life dominated by money, rank and lust.
A group of newbie thieves hire a shaman and a toyol to rob a bank.
A young woman finds herself on the receiving end of a terrifying curse that threatens to take her life in 7 days.
After their car breaks down, four travellers seek refuge in an abandoned house. A ghost child awaits them.
College students travel from one campus to another in a desperate attempt to intercept a reel detailing their infidelity.
War-hardened crusader Robin Hood joins hands with a Moorish commander in an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown.
Follow the journey of Rimba Bara 2 as the band continues the legacy of the Rimba Bara rock band in the nation's music scene.

Rocky, A gangster released after 17years from prison, goes back to his childhood house, searching for his missing sister Amudha, all the while reminiscing his violent past as it comes back to haunt him.

Deep in a forest, a prophecy of death by a strange child unleashes terrifying events on a mother and her two children. Inspired by a Japanese horror classic, this was Malaysia's submission to the Oscars.

name: Rokuroku: The Promise of the Witch

info.plot: ROKUROKU, a log-neck woman wearing a red kimono, Her neck gets longer and longer and they finally hear her saying: You promised.
Four scam victims assembled by a mysterious lady to recover their losses from the head of scam syndicate by robbing and foiling him and his syndicate with their amateur skills.
Charting the life of superstar footballer Chistiano Ronaldo. From his humble beginnings to his record-breaking career, this film tells the story of one of the world's most renowned sporting stars.
Kisah komedi mengenai sebuah kemalangan yang berlaku di simpang jalan di antara 3 kereta melanggar Raja Report Malaysia telah menyebabkan huru hara berlaku.

Roni anak Ali, lagenda pemain bola sepak yang dibesarkan oleh makciknya selepas kehilangan ayah dan ibunya. Demi menyelamatkan kedai mamak tempat kerjanya, dia sanggup melanggar pantang untuk bermain bola.
When a bad-boy movie star hires a real gangster to take on an opposing role to avoid a scandal after beating a fellow actor half to death, he gets more than he bargained for.
When several flight passengers suddenly suffer gruesome, unexplained deaths, a young doctor suspects that the terrifying force behind her own worst childhood nightmares may be responsible.
This historical epic depicts the life of Rudramadevi, a brave warrior princess, who rose to become one of the prominent rulers of the Kakatiya dynasty in the Deccan Plateau.
Rudran, a fearless cop who battles against drug mafia, gets trapped in a PCR case, unfortunately. Will he prove himself innocent?
Alexandra reluctantly tags along for Slasher Sleepout, an extreme event that is part camping trip, part haunted house, and part escape room. But when the fun turns deadly, Alex has to play the game.

Maya, a single mother who struggles to make ends meet wanted to buy a dream house which is lower than market price. Finally, they found a house and makes it a home. But, strange events start to occur.
Raya seorang penulis buku telah dibayar untuk menulis biografi tentang seseorang dan telah dihantar ke sebuah rumah untuk mendapat ilham. Namun sebaliknya dia telah diganggu oleh entiti.
A writer suffers from something even more terrifying than writers' block, when her writer's retreat turns out to be haunted.
Based on an urban legend about Rumah Gurita located in Bandung, the film tells of the encounters of Selena, a girl who was born with the sixth sense and can see into another realm.
Persiapan menyambut Hari Raya di pusat jagaan rumah orang-orang tua terganggu setelah kedatangan seorang penghuni baru. Iwan cuba mengawal situasi tersebut sebelum keadaan menjadi semakin huru-hara.
Melani goes to a rubber plantation to look for her husband. When she arrives there, she experiences strange things. Unbeknownst to Melani, her husband has already died.
aufi who is happily married has to become a "temporary husband" to Alia who has been divorced by her husband. Saufi places Alia in an old bungalow that has a horror entity until one horrible night…
director: Dato' Prof. Dr. A Razak Mohaideen

info.plot: Saufi who is happily married has to become a "temporary husband" to Alia who has been divorced by her husband. Saufi places Alia in an old bungalow that has a horror entity until one horrible night…
director: Dato' Prof. Dr. A Razak Mohaideen

info.plot: A young substitute teacher at the Angel Home orphanage finds herself all alone when she complains of the scary and inexplicable incidents that keep happening to her.
Kisah sepasang suami isteri yang berpindah masuk ke sebuah rumah sewa murah dan bermula dari situ kehidupan mereka diganggu oleh makhluk yang tinggal di dalam rumah tersebut.
Following a horrific car crash, athletics champion Sergey bids goodbye to his sporting career. When a maniac starts killing women that Serge knows, he finds himself with new paranormal powers.
A prolific hit man has only one night to decide between the crime family he chose and the real family he abandoned when his estranged son becomes his boss' target.
A happy-go-lucky guy with a simplistic view of life becomes caught up in a murder mystery when he helps a mysterious girl and discovers her dead body the next morning.
An explosive remake of the famous police television series.
Sequel to Saamy.
A romantic tragedy wherein a girl is abandoned on the day of her engagement, only to later discover that the man who abandoned her now wants to marry her cousin.
Certain circumstances get an innocent guy into a serious issue involving millions of money and his life turns upside down

Isaac and his pregnant wife visit a remote Norwegian village to claim an inheritance. They finds themselves caught in a nightmare when they encounter a sinister cult that worships a sea-dwelling deity.
Mayu works as a psychological counsellor at a hospital. One day, she counsels a strange young girl who is under her care.
A prisoner and a CIA agent have to learn to rely on each other to survive as they make their way to South Africa.
