Like a poem in a beautiful city, as beautiful as the four love stories that take place in Saigon and the stories behind their love.
Remy a village young man begins to investigate who is the mastermind behind all the ghostly and perennial disturbances in their village during the pandemic season.
Jasad Abang J telah selamat dikebumikan, tapi muncul kembali dengan satu pesanan penting yang hanya diceritakan kepada Zain Jusoh, seorang yang berpenyakit lupa.
Aman mengajak Daniel yang sering menjadi mangsa penindasan untuk tinggal bersamanya. Kemunculan Daniel di rumah Aman menimbulkan rasa kurang senang Laila yang menaruh hati terhadap Aman.
Salina lives in a mysterious house, where strange events begin to happen. The situation changes for the worse when an unexpected death occurs.
A CIA agent goes on the run after a defector accuses her of being a Russian spy.
Mengisahkan tentang cinta Sam dengan rakan sekerjanya Lisa, tetapi Lisa diganggu oleh Haikal sehingga mereka berdua diculik dan disembunyikan di sebuah kilang percetakan lama.
The film is about a possible biowar that happens in the country with people getting infected with a virus.
Kyle dan Milly bertemu kembali setelah 10 tahun terpisah dan cinta lama kembali terjalin. Tetapi adakah cinta mereka akan terus kekal hingga ke akhirnya?

Vi is a soap opera actress whose husband Jerome is devoted to sinister cult-leader, The Holy One. Eager to get rid of her husband and the negative influences in her life, Vi resorts to drastic measures.
In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.
Thangalakshmi, a wealthy woman, arranges for her daughter, Abhi, to get married to an NRI in her native village.
Kisah Abdul Rahman Tuah yang tidak berpuas hati apabila kasut mahal yang baru dibelinya hilang di masjid.
A married man is shocked when he meets his lookalike during a train journey.
A story revolves around Sandiya whom investigates a murder case. What happen when she discovered an unbelievable truth?
After a few casual confrontations, a classical dancer and a rural folk artist fall in love with each other. However, the girl's father who disregards folk arts opposes their relationship.
Diadaptasi dari kisah benar, tentang Siti Aminah yang harus menikahi 100 orang lelaki dan membunuh mereka untuk mengekalkan kejelitaannya.
After MMA fighters Adam and Johan face off in the ring, Johan is gravely injured and Adam tries to atone for his mistakes by putting his own life on the line.
This heartwarming and provocative documentary shines a light on the New England Santa Society and their efforts to bring more diversity to Santa.

Halim and his happy family have become a model to the other villagers but unknown to them, there are neighbours who are jealous of them. Halim's family life is turned topsy-turvy when a curse befalls them.
Sebuah keluarga bahagia yang bakal menjadi mangsa hasad dengki manusia berhati hitam.
Sara, a psychology student and the daughter of a former exorcist, takes up a job as a nanny. But what happens when her new job leads her to horrifying situations?
A young man's perfect family life is shattered when the ghosts of his former lovers exact their revenge.
A spy, who is estranged from his family due to a mission, suddenly meets his police officer son.
The story of a young man bravely and voluntarily becomes a soldier in the Royal Malay Regimen to fight the Japanese Occupation on Malaya during WWII.
Satay, 3 years old, is an orphan who is taken care of by Pak Ali. Kamil, who has just broken up with his girlfriend Fatimah because Kamil's father sees Fatimah's position as unequal.
Selepas banjir besar melanda, semua penduduk kampung berpindah kerana kampung mereka tidak lagi selamat. Hanya dua beradik yang enggan berpindah atas sebab dan alasan mereka tersendiri.
The Tan family and the Karim family have been neighbors for a long time and care for each other.

This film captures how women's lives are changing in Saudi Arabia, their hopes and challenges in a country that appears to be making strides forward but continues to silence and jail female activists.
Three merry-making young men anger the spirits of the dead, and must now face the vengeance of Phon, who has taken the form of a seductive woman and followed them back to Jakarta.
A group of musicians take a trip to Thailand to perform. While there, one of them gets possessed by a female Thai ghost looking for her long-lost lover.

name: Say Her Name: The Life and Death of Sandra Bland

info.plot: The documentary explores the death of Sandra Bland, a politically active African American who, after being arrested for a traffic violation, was found hanging in her jail cell three days later.
Director Nelson George explores the life of baseball legend Willie Mays, widely regarded as the sport's greatest living player.
Kisah Along seorang insan yang pekak dan bisu memungut seorang bayi yang dibuang orang lalu membesarkannya seperti anak sendiri.

The film tells the story of the fractious relationship between Murni, a homesick Indonesian caregiver/ domestic helper and her crabby and disabled older Singaporean master, a widower named Pak Harun who si
Salleh, a young man who likes to splurge, marries Salmah, a dancer. He starts to ignore his brother who suffers from schizophrenia after he and Salmah move out.
A prank TV show has to up the ante when a new web series starts competing for its audience.
Inciting controversy upon its release in Korea, this was the first movie openly discussing teenagers in the sex industry. A straight-A student takes a wrong turn in life. Can she reclaim her honour?
Seorang wartawan perempuan bertekad dengan penuh nekad untuk membongkar skandal perniagaan songsang seorang kenamaan yang mencurigakannya.
Four survivors of the Ghostface murders leave Woodsboro to begin a fresh start in New York City. However, they are soon fighting for their lives when a new killer embarks on a bloody rampage.
The crew of a fishing trawler is marooned at sea. Worse still, they must struggle for their lives against a growing parasite in their water supply.

Late one night, calling forth the spirit of a dead former student who reportedly haunts their halls. Before morning, one of the girls is dead, leaving the others wondering what they may have awakened.
A young couple in love separate when the boy leaves to further his studies. He promises to marry her when he returns, but is unable to when he is discovered with another girl.
When a social media influencer finds traces of cyberbullying that led to his neighbor's suicide, he teams up with a hacker to solve the mystery behind his neighbor's demise.

A Filipino musical about the pain of heartbreak and loss brought about by cruel and arbitrary martial laws - a thinly disguised critique targetted at the increasingly authoritarian state of governance.
A happily married reporter is having trouble investigating a series of death cases involving extra-marital affairs, when she suspects her colleague is the mastermind behind them.
A NIS agent is discharged after failing to stop the murder of a North Korean dissident. Years later, he bumps into the North Korean spy who was involved in the mission and quickly forms a bond.
Aidin went to meet his grandfather, Abdullah after feeling lonely because his parents, Amal and Liza were always busy and rarely spent time with him.
After her brother's odd death, a young woman reunites with her quirky family, then must navigate her way through the minefields of her troubled past.
Mano is in love with Maha, a maid, in his grandmother's house, but lacks the courage to confess to his mother.
Lan faces many challenges when he attempts to approach Alina, as he is determined to free Alina away from the clutches of her hot- tempered and wife-beating husband.
Backpacker, Adam sacrifices his dream of adventure when determined to build a "Sekolah Sampah" for the sake of educating children in a garbage dump.
Kali pertama Harith bertemu Dahlia, dia pasti wanita itulah cinta sejatinya. Namun bagi Dahlia, pertama kali dia bertemu Harith, Harith merupakan seorang sangat
Hani who enjoys pranking with her friends, ends up haunting herself when she is being followed and hunted down by a mysterious killer on the eve of her birthday.
director: Dato' Professor Dr. A. Razak Hj.

info.plot: Passengers from different walks of life help bring justice to a tribal woman and her granddaughter.
Wati yang mencintai Awie terpaksa menguburkan perasaannya akibat ditentang oleh abangnya. Awie yang begitu kecewa berkawan dengan Ziana seorang penyanyi kelab malam.
Koleksi 5 kisah seram yang berlegar di dalam masyarakat Melayu yang berkaitan dengan amalan ilmu hitam.
Aduka and Taruna are sworn brothers. Dara, the village chiefís daughter and Aduka are secretly in love but her father marries her off to Taruna. One day, Dara and Aduka commit adultery.
Amelia dan Johan berkahwin selama 8 tahun, namun masih tidak mempunyai cahaya mata. Johan memiliki ego untuk tidak melakukan ujian kesuburan. Hanya kerana usia Amelia, dia dipersalahkan.

name: Senario The Movie Episode 2: Beach Boys

info.plot: Three buddies – Azlee, Mazlan and Wahid decide to help an owner of a resort to restore its business. But problems arise when they try to attract more tourists to the resort.
The story of the happy-go-crazy trio Ramli, Aziz and Sudin and their daily problems living in a crowded boarding house. Jobless and penniless, they decide to try their luck as movie stars.

This thriller is about a young man suffering from bipolar disorder, his mental condition causing much anxiety and despair. It is made worse when his secret admirer witnesses something she wasn't meant to.

Kisah seorang despatch yang ingin beraya tahun ini bersama kekasih anak hartawan. Despatch ini ingin mengubah suasana sambutan aidilfitri agar lebih bermakna di tahun ini berbanding aidilfitri sebelumn
The defiant Jep changes over a new leaf after an incident took place in the month of Ramadan. Jep's former gang sabotages him as he volunteers to look after the welfare of a surau.
Setelah tewas dalam sebuah pertandingan, sebuah pasukan takraw serta jurulatih mereka mendapati diri mereka dikurung dalam bilik oleh seorang wanita misteri.
Doctor Oguz, while fighting with his own demons for a while meets Sera, the psychiatric ward patient and the story takes an interesting turn.
Being abandoned in a group home since young, Young-Jae now struggles to make a living as he's too old to live there anymore.
Dua sahabat pencuri terpaksa berebut dengan pencuri-pencuri lain untuk mencuri setem bernilai empat juta dolar.
Amin berusaha perlu memenangi hati isterinya Aqilah kerana dahulunya Aqilah menyintai Lazim.
A 5 year old boy living in a remote Tamil Nadu village bonds with a chicken he pretends to have birthed. The village views this as a family dispute that escalates into an issue dividing the town.
While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha on a much-needed vacation.

name: Sex and the City: The Movie

info.plot: A New York writer on sex and love is finally getting married to her Mr. Big. But her three best girlfriends must console her after one of them inadvertently leads Mr. Big to jilt her.
A romantic comedy about Sha and Shah who have separated, but whose children and parents are trying to reunite them.
William Shakespeare is looking for a muse to help with his writing. When he meets Viola, who loves the theatre, she plays the part perfectly. However, she is promised to Lord Wessex in marriage.
A single mom fights against cancer to embark on a journey to find the perfect foster parents for her unprepared children.

name: Shanti Days: 365 Days Of Happy Breathing

info.plot: A country bumpkin and a top model strike up an unlikely friendship as they bond while practising yoga.

name: Shaolin vs Evil Dead Ultimate Power

info.plot: In this kung fu vampire sequel, when fellow Taoist priest Hak turns into a vampire and goes on a killing spree, Roam Chow must use his wits and his lethal combat skills to stop the murders.
Poachers provoke a great white shark in open seas. It retaliates, targeting four friends on a yacht. A fierce battle unfolds for survival.
A 14 year old boy becomes the superhero Shazam! when he was chosen as champion by a mysterious figure.

Shazam and his allies get thrust into a battle for their superpowers, their lives, and the fate of the world when a vengeful trio of ancient gods arrives on Earth in search of the magic stolen from them.
After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B together with a roommate Yi. Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend.
The remarkable true story of reporters Megan Twohey and Jodi Kantor, who went from underdogs to inspirations by shattering the silence surrounding sexual assault and harassment in Hollywood.
The Making of Sheriff. An action thriller film by Syafiq Yusof, a gripping tale of corruption, redemption, and justice as the story unfolds.
Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

name: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows

info.plot: Sherlock Holmes and his sidekick Dr. Watson join forces to outwit and bring down their fiercest adversary, Professor Moriarty.

Sekumpulan sahabat telah terlanggar seorang lelaki dan membuat perancangan untuk masuk ke hutan bagi menanam mayat tersebut. Keadaan bertambah cemas apabila mereka diburu oleh seorang pembunuh bersiri.
After an accident occurs in the Tokyo Bay, a giant creature called "Godzilla" wreaks havoc all over Japan.
A CBI officer Shiva, who investigates the suspicious death of a Muslim cook discovers that his own wife has been possessed by the victim's ghost.
A man named Mr. Smith delivers a woman's baby during a shootout, and is then called upon to protect the newborn from the army of gunmen.
An expert marksman is coaxed out of seclusion by colleagues who need his help to stop a plot to kill the president, but he gets framed for the crime.
The inspirational story of how LeBron James and his childhood friends became the #1 high school team in the country.

Two down-on-their-luck best friends find a new lease on life when they chance upon a fully furnished apartnemt available for a low rent. As it turns out, they are not the only occupants in their new flat.
An unvarnished look at the high risk, high reward business of working as a child actor. The film chronicles the personal and professional price of fame and failure on a child.
A sculptor preparing to open a new show must balance her creative life with the daily dramas of family and friends, in Kelly Reichardt's vibrant and captivatingly funny portrait of art and craft.
Enjoy the soulful melodies of the Legend sung by an amazing line-up of singers SPB Charan, SP Sailaja, Mano, Kalpana and many more. "
In Qing Dynasty, Chen Jia Luo inherits Red Flower Society leadership, uncovering plots with dancer Yu Ru Yi. Loyalty and duty clash in a dangerous quest for truth.
Legenda sumpahan seorang ibu terhadap anaknya yang derhaka dan enggan mengakui ibunya.
Filem komedi klasik yang mencuit hati tentang dua orang jiran yang hidup saling bersaing dalam segala segi. Siapa yang menang...?
A horror comedy about a dead woman's five sons who try to fulfil their filial duties but get the shock of their lives when mommy dearest returns as a zombie.
A family is haunted by nightmares when they return to their old, eerie ancestral home where a forbidden ceremony once took place.
While having an idyllic quarantine vacation at her family's lake house during the pandemic, Parker and her best friend are threatened by an unexpected visitor.
Roy who accepts a dinner invitation from a woman named Emilia. When meets her brother Edward, things start to go south for Roy because Emilia and Edward are not as hospitable as they appear.
A portrait of Luis A. Miranda Jr., Puerto Rican citizen and father to Hamilton producer, Lin-Manuel Miranda, who is determined to bring the hit musical to his island home.
Murali, the son of a physically impaired policeman, dreams of a having a bank job and a secure life. However, a turn of events forces him to pursue his father's line of career.
Dharma dan Hamid berjiran dengan Nora dan Norlia. Mereka berempat menyewa rumah dari Pak Brahim, yang beristerikan Yusni. Nasib malang sentiasa melanda hidup mereka.
The lives of four men from different backgrounds get interwoven after an incident which bring changes in their lives forever.
When Raj Varadhan's girlfriend Maya Pillai accidentally dies of an overdose, his life takes him on an unexpected ride. Will he be able to hide his secrets from his wife?

Sakshi, a talented artist who is deaf and mute, gets entangled in a criminal investigation when she unexpectedly witnesses a tragic incident that occurs in a villa with a reputation for being haunted.
While dealing with the sudden disappearance of his sister, Rafito needs to continue working with the illegal business ofbringing undocumented people from Dominican Republic to Puerto Rico.
Kundavi, brought up in a small village, gets married to Goutham. They have a 5-year-old daughter, Ishu. When Goutham goes to New York, Kundavi learns about Goutham's past love, Ishwarya.
A wandering Archaeologist, learns that his friend, Santhosh, has disappeared while looking for a lost treasure in an mysterious estate, embarks on a journey to find him and complete the mission.
A masterful look at war, separation, and displacement following Syrian refugee families across five countries whoseek to build a new life.
A universe of unlikely and reluctant heroes still trying to do the right thing in a city that refuses to care.
Sub-inspector Pari Venkat faces a huge tragedy that makes him take up an investigation to seek revenge
A koala organizes world's greatest singing competition to save his theatre. Available in English & Cantonese audio.
A tough cop performs an undercover operation and identifies some nefarious activities in the seas around a coastal town.
Divya, a police officer trainee who desires to become an I.P.S. officer loses her eyesight in an accident. What she did to make her dream come true is the rest of the story
Disappointed by his failed dreams, Loh Poh Huat visits his frustrations on his family. So when he wins the lottery, everyone believes the money will deliver them from their struggles.
Kisah Hang Nadim yang berusaha menyelamatkan Singapura dari serangan ikan todak tidak mendapat balasan yang saksama daripada Sultan.
Velan's mother tells him to find his cousin, Sumathi, who lives in the city and marry her.
Pepe Smith, an ageing impersonator of a rock legend, gets the chance of a lifetime - opening for the legend himself. But he has to write a love song, something he has never done before.
Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.
cast: Lee Dong-Wook Lim Soo-Jung E Som

info.plot: A frustrated food delivery boy gets a super intelligent AI phone which has all the emotions of a girl. It changes his life completely when it starts falling in love with him
A widow's grief drives her straight into the arms of horror beyond imagination.
Rocket Raja, a small-time thief, comes across a young girl who calls him father. As Raja finds the truth about the girl's past, he turns vigilante to take on notorious criminals.
A couple have trouble conceiving and decide to relocate in the hopes of a less stressful environment. The wife soon finds companionship in a ghost, but things change when she becomes pregnant.
Looking to recapture their glory days, two disconnected sisters decide to throw one final high-school-style party for their classmates.
Professional ghost hunters trying to conduct a paranormal investigation to unveil the mystery of two sisters.
An orphaned soldier's life changes after he receives a letter from a girl named Sita.
Siti Muslihat sentiasa menyokong suaminya ketika suaminya menjadi Sultan di negara Indera Permai. Dia yang penuh dengan muslihat cuba membantu suaminya dalam menguruskan negara.
Sultan Zainal Abidin's meeting with a girl who has a soft voice when stopping on an island while on a voyage. He was impressed by the girl's voice and face.
Siva and Sakthi kick off with a little white lie about their gigs, dive into revenge mode when the truth spills, but end up dancing in the rain of love.
A software engineer arrives in India to serve the nation.
A superb anthology involving three stories about three women from different time periods whose lives are controlled by their marriage
6 bodybuilders are determined to overcome the limitations of their bodies, pushing themselves to breaking point in the gym and following extreme diets, in preparing for their next competition.
Framed and on the run, a former FBI agent must save his family from a blazing fire in the world's tallest building.
The happy life of a newlywed couple is disrupted when the husband begin sleepwalking at night. Things become more eerie when he starts claiming that someone else is inside him.
Ichabod Crane, a police detective, is sent from the city of New York to Sleepy Hollow to investigate a series of murders committed by the Headless Horseman.

A photography student receives an SLR camera as a reward for producing the best work in class. While exploring the camera's features, he unleashes an evil force and is forced to do the Devil's bidding.
A Yeti named Migo stirs up his community when he discovers something that he didn't know existed — a human.
A psychiatrist witnesses the bizarre, traumatic suicide of a patient claiming to be haunted by an entity. To her horror, she begins experiencing the same eerie supernatural occurrences.

When a chemical factory is newly built by the quaint seaside village of Kunchon, the local haenyeo (female sea divers) find their livelihoods threatened. Desperate, they turn to smuggling imported goods.
An F.B.I. Agent takes on a plane full of deadly venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.
Alcoholic Jeong-woo finds redemption in an isolated sanitarium as he befriends a nun with an unusual ability. But things are about to go wrong as another patient is admitted.
An Indonesian poet must flee to Borneo when police suspect him of being a dissident.
Adapted from a TV series, the movie follows Huang as she mourns for her boyfriend's death and receives a mysterious cassette player to travel back in time. Will she be able to change his destiny?
In this HBO Original movie, two men achieve an enormous medical breakthrough that earns one an award and the other, a painful lesson in unequal opportunity.
A swinger on the cusp of being a senior citizen with a taste for young women falls in love with an accomplished woman closer to his age.
A Hutu soldier tries to get his family to safety during the Rwandan genocide, while years later his brother stands trial for his actions.
When a young boy contracts a mysterious illness, his mother must decide how far she will go to protect him from terrifying forces in her past.
Batman wages war against the villain Deathstroke and the League of Shadows with his son in tow.

Saul,a prisoner working in the Nazi camp in Auschwitz, is tasked with disposing the bodies of the people exterminated in the gas chambers.Yet he has difficulty getting a proper burial for his own son.
Based on Yuan Taiji's novel, this drama depicts how a young assassin takes his first mission while investigating his family's massacre – and finds himself far deeper than he expected.
Das kidnaps Arumai, the son of a politician who has been planning his own kidnapping to extract money from his father. Problems arise when an insane police officer is brought to handle the case.
Seenu is caught in a situation where he must continue to lie in order to keep his hopes of winning the heart of his beloved lover.
Based on the book by famed Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao, this drama depicts how two visually challenged people find love & strength in a dark world.
After the death of his brother Rex, Speed Racer vows to win the cross-country car racing rally, only to discover that the corporations are not at all sincere.
A mother and three daughters, scarred by their sexually abusive father are driven to a life of bloodlust and revenge.
Comedian Chris Rock branches into the horror genre as a cop embroiled in a cat-and-mouse game with a sadistic killer who murders several police officers throughout this grisly, gory film.
A spirit hunter and a spirit huntress team up to fight the evil spirits released from the mining of an ancient burial ground in Siam. Can they finally defeat the evil spirits?
This mystery-action fantasy film revolves around a amnesiac man who wakes up in a new body every twelve hours. That is, until he comes across a woman who claims to recognise him.
Kevin, a man with at least 23 different personalities, is compelled to abduct three teenage girls. As they are held captive, a final personality, The Beast, begins to materialize.
Follows the players as they reconnect and rediscover the beauty of the hit musical's underdog origins, path to Tony glory, and the love story between breakout stars Jonathan Groff and Lea Michele.
Using high tech gadgets, two kids have to save their reactivated OSS top spy parents when they're taken by an evil, high tech enemy.

name: Spy Kids 2: Island Of Lost Dreams

info.plot: The Cortez siblings encounter a genetic scientist and a set of rival spy kids.
Juni Cortez decides to play Game Over, a virtual reality-based game designed by the Toymaker, in order to find and rescue his sister Carmen who is trapped inside Level 4 of the game.

name: Spy Kids: All The Time In The World

info.plot: The retried spy will stop the evil Timemaker from taking over the world with her new step-children.
Perebutan kuasa berlaku di antara Tengku Andalas dan ibu tirinya yang inginkan anaknya sendiri, menjadi Putera Mahkota.
Tells the story of Damaq, an immigrant who starts a new life in another village. He is an honest and sincere man. When Damaq rescues Sri, he has to fight with Awang Sulung.
Valli's happiness knows no bounds after she falls in love with Lord Muruga.
A spine-chilling horror movie that is guaranteed to make you look under your bed at night, about a young woman who learns that she is not living alone in a house with a brutal past.
Set in 1985, working-class student Brian Jackson navigates his first year at Bristol University.
Trace the history of the continually-evolving set of planes that are undectable by radar.
A comic and heartwarming drama about a man who gradually comes to term with his father's death while on the run from a local gang in his father's wacky beat-up car "Stellar".
Featuring the vengeful spirits of those who suffer prematurely cruel deaths, Still describes four gruesome deadlines.
A mother dedicates her life to finding her missing daughter.
This documentary chronicles Stockton's young Mayor Michael Tubbs in his day-to-day life as he works to implement the city's basic income program and deals with a disturbing string of murders.

name: Stolen Daughters: Kidnapped by Boko Haram

info.plot: The story of the freed female hostages of Boko Haram, detailing their lives in captivity and since their release.

An experiment goes awry when it resulted in a disaster that caused a chain reaction of typhoons, lightning, earthquakes & other natural calamities, resulting in the instantaneous collapse of the city.
Nini dan Haikal pergi bercuti ke Gold Coast, Australia. Percutian mereka tidak berjalan seperti yang dirancang. Namun akhirnya ia menjadi satu pengembaraan yang hebat.

Nini dan Haikal memulakan pengembaraan yang hebat mencari makcik Lisa mereka yang mendapat tawaran kerja sebagai jurugambar profesional di Paris. Malangnya, pengembaraan mereka bertukar menjadi huru-hara.
Striker revolves around a para-psychology student Joshi and a Youtuber encounter with Ouija board and its consequences.
Sofia susah untuk memilih antara dua calon, Raf atau Noah. Lalu meminta pendapat ayahnya, Adam. Kini dua lelaki tersebut terpaksa memenangi hati ayah Sofia, seorang peminat fanatik bola.
Four college friends try to help two lovers get married against the wishes of their parents. The attempts of the youngsters lead to hilarious consequences.
Four best buddies in the squalid town of Susaek have their friendship tested to its limits when hope comes to their town in the form of a World Cup football stadium.
Ani, the most beautiful girl in the village, who is ever man's fantasy, decides to marry Mr. Bear as her husband, much to everyone's surprise.
The story of an inhibited and forbidden romance between an artist and a young man from a wealthy family.
3 cerita dongeng dalam satu nafas baru. Kisah Malin Kundang, Merah & Putih dan Badang yang tinggal di bumi Inderaloka. Rakyatnya hidup tidak harmoni kerana perbezaan kaum diantara Indera dan Loka.
Seorang budak perempuan lahir dari buah timun gergasi meninggalkan rumah kerana diburu raksasa. Sepanjang perjalanan, dia yang mengumpul kekuatan untuk melawan raksasa itu akhirnya menjadi kawan.
Roy is the son of a rich man who wants to be free and hang out with musicians in nightclubs. Tengku Aziz's son is engaged to Tengku Johan.
A baseball pitcher from San Pedro de Macoris, struggling to make it to the big leagues and pull himself and his family out of poverty.
A secret government agency recruits a team of supervillains to execute a dangerous black ops mission in exchange for clemency.
A greedy moneylender charges exorbitant rates and ruthlessly goes after people who do not pay him back. When he targets the loved ones of a young man, the latter is compelled to stand up against him.
A commercial pilot makes an emergency landing on the Hudson River after birds wrecked the engines of his plane. However, an investigation into the matter puts his career on the line.
A Vietnamese woman, came to Japan for the first time to look for her father and later found out that her father had died a few years ago.
Jessica is a young woman visiting her home town, who gets caught up in her childhood best friend's problems when she asks for Jessica's help in casting a dark spell.
Comedy and horror collide in this Indonesian export about a scheming couple and their incompetent assistant, who will stop at nothing to achieve their political ambitions.
A deformed hunchback gets a second chance in life, but this is abruptly taken away when he breaks the rule of his new life.
Chomel was expelled from the village and has returned to her original appearance, an ugly and crouched woman after her neck was nailed.She wandered from village to village in search of food.
Mila gets help from Mak Tom to become beautiful. There is one rule to observe but Mila accidentally breaks it and becomes hideous. She can only regain her looks by drinking the blood of 9 virgins.
Kaseh is trapped in a chalet owned by Richard Benson. There were several of Mr. Benson's employees trapped there due to Mr. Benson's own curse.
Kerana mulut badan binasa dan kerana mulut berlagak Tina disumpah menjadi peti ais pada waktu malam. Mampukah Tina mengawal mulut lancangnya dan membatalkan sumpahan peti ais pada aidilfitri ini?
A man, who goes to any extent to help his friends, conveys his friend's feelings to a girl who turns out to be the long-lost love of his life.
In Javanese folklore, a woman, usually a prostitute, who dies while pregnant out of wedlock, returns as a sundel bolong to take revenge on the people who have wronged her in her life.
Two teenage boys compete for the love of a girl which leads to an unexpected fate and a reunion after four years.
A catastrophic train crash, unusual disappearances and inexplicable events take place in a small Ohio town, and in time culminate in a devastatingly terrifying event.
A group of researchers and soldiers investigate the mystery surrounding reports of a disease outbreak at a secret underground research facility in 1984 Russia.
Mengisahkan gelagat Boboy yang tersangat aktif. Boboy yang berusia 8 tahun sangat suka membaca komik-komik dan bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang hero.

name: Super Game Boy - The Geng Returns

info.plot: In this telemovie, the Super Gamers are challenged by new kid's gang in neighborhood, called Shadow X. This new gang wants to take over and wants to become more popular than super gamers.
Dalam bahagian kedua ini,Danial berkawan dengan pembulinya Ayu. Mereka kemudian menjadi musuh.
Super Gamers dicabar kumpulan kanak-kanak baru dipanggil Fixers yg mahu mengambil alih & mahu lebih popular daripada Super Gamers. Pengembaraan & keseronokan bermula saat persaingan mereka bermula.

name: Super Greed: The Fight for Football

info.plot: Super Greed: The Fight for Football tells the dramatic inside story of the doomed league through the eyes of those who helped to bring it tumbling down.
After years of illegal racing on the streets, a group of 'Superbike' riders led by Bugis are now eager to compete on real race tracks.
YouTubers Nabila and Adam are lost in their pursuit and they end up at a mysterious homestay. They learn that guests who check in to this place rarely ever check out.
Syuhada going hiking to Gunung Tahan with her friends. Unfortunately, she got lost and fell into a deep hole and trapped there for 19 days.

name: Susu and The House of Secrets

info.plot: Two girls unravel the mystery of the death of Susu, the famous Chinese opera star. They were then unable to escape the dark secrets of the house and its occupants.
Kuselan, a wealthy man with nine children, wishes to see them all married before he passes away.
The storyline is based on a Laotian folklore called Swan lifts turtle, Swan helps a turtle that cannot fly and carry it flying. However, the turtle died of selfishness.

name: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street

info.plot: Based on the hit Broadway musical, Sweeney Todd, played by Johnny Depp, opens a barber shop to obtain revenge on those who sent him to prison on false charges.
A Taiwanese comedy starring Alec Su as a cowardly veteran cop who is forced to pair up with Ariel Lin, who plays an overzealous rookie that is also the daughter of the Police Chief.
The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.
Politically ambitious police chief uses a local murder to gain votes in his campaign, a setback for another sheriff, up for re-election.
Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu yang sanggup mewarisi saka kecantikan keturunannya kerana ingin menyelamatkan anaknya.
On the eve of Hari Raya, four friends are returning to their hometown. Strange things begin to happen when they reach a village that is supposedly haunted by a 'pocong', known as a shroud ghost.
George Clooney is a ready-to-retire CIA veteran who gets sucked into a dangerous conspiracy on his last mission in the Middle East.
The Ta'ang people are driven from their homeland when a civil war escalates in Myanmar.
During the 2022 World Cup, three men go to war with three women to fight for their freedom & dream... to watch their beloved football game without interference.

name: Tad, the Lost Explorer and the Emerald Tablet

info.plot: Tad accidentally unleashes an ancient spell, endangering the lives of his friends Mummy, Jeff, and Belzoni. With only helped by Sara, he sets off on an adventure to end the Curse of the Mummy.
Maayan falls in love with Machakanni, a woman whose engagement was recently called off.
Kevin Bacon stars in this profoundly moving HBO Original Movie that looks at the military rituals for honoring its war dead.
Sean Hall speaks with CNN on how decades of cultural appropriation have shaped the music industry and gives insight on the case against Taylor Swift.
A young and dynamic boy has the urge to mint money meets a girl, who believes money is the cause of all distress to life. How does their life transform together?

A local horror comedy not to be missed by fans of the genre. If nothing else, stay for the hilarious renditions of horror tropes, as five film students struggle to emerge alive from a haunted mansion.
A horror portmanteau from three of the biggest names in the Hong Kong film industry, each of them presenting their unique vision of what it takes to chill you to the bone.
A follow-up to the first instalment of horror, consisting of three terrifying tales by Gordon Chan, Laurence Lau and Teddy Robin, released just before the traditional Hungry Ghost Festival.

name: Tales from the Occult: Body and Soul

info.plot: This horror anthology series returns featuring three spooky crime stories about an ex-hair model, a cat lover and the love triangle between a dental nurse, a dentist, and a chef.

name: Tales from the Occult: Ultimate Malevolence

info.plot: Featuring three stories about two high school friends, a magician and a lost man, the movie reveals the most terrifying and ugly side of human nature, where life and death are just a thought away!

Ten stories are woven together by their shared theme of Halloween night in an American suburb, where ghouls, imps, aliens and axe murderers appear for one night only to terrorize unsuspecting residents.
The movie is about four prime characters who run behind money facing many challenges and it has been portrayed with twists and turns
Tok Adi cuba menyiasat kejadian pelik yang berlaku ke atas beberapa orang yang tinggal di daerah yang berbeza dan langsung tiada kaitan.
Khatijah, a pregnant widow, has accused Tok Adi of raping her. Tok Adi was arrested by the villagers but he denied all the allegations and prayed that God would show him the truth.
Kamaliah mengesyaki anaknya seorang OKU telah di dera ketika berada di rumah jagaan.Namun, Norma pengasuh rumah jagaan tersebut menafikan itu adalah perbuatannya tetapi Tok Adi tidak mempercayainya
Tok Adi mula syak pada ajaran yang dibawa oleh Jebat setelah melihat perlakuan para pengikutnya yang terpesong.
It explores the feelings of the stranded victims during the earthquake that hit Mount Kinabalu and the sacrifices made by the 'Malim Gunung' and the local heroes.
Salah seorang dari junior forensik mula didatangi oleh 'hantu' wanita mangsa bunuh. Dia dan rakan-rakan forensiknya mula membongkar rahsia wanita itu yang membawa mereka ke sebuah estet.
The film centers on Lydia Tár, widely considered one of the greatest living composer-conductors and the very first female director of a major German orchestra.
Frictions and animosities amongst three good friends begin to surface when all of them fall for the same woman who is later found murdered. Who is the murderer?
Rokiman telah keluar dari penjara telah pulang ke kampung dan mendapat tentangan hebat dari penduduk kampung di atas kesilapannya yang lalu.

Taxi! Taxi! is a social comedy set in the metropolitan city-state of Singapore, told through the encounters of two characters who are in what is widely perceived as the most sociable profession on the isla
Go-ni's nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now he's planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.
Emotionally vulnerable women are preyed on by a charming psychopath who wants to suck their tears.
Anak perempuan Mikail telah di culik dan untuk menyelamatkan anaknya dia cuba mengimbau kembali sejarah lampau dirinya ketika menyertai kumpulan gangster.
John Bennett's childhood wish brings his teddy bear friend Ted to life, but Ted keeps John and his love interest Lori Collins from moving on with their lives.
Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.

name: Teen Titans Go! & DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem In The Multiverse

info.plot: When Lex Luthor and the world's Super-Villain's captured all the Super Heroes, DC Super Hero Girls cross dimensions and gain help from the Teen Titans to save their fellow heroes.
When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem

info.plot: Four anthropomorphic turtle brothers trained in ninjutsu take on a mysterious crime syndicate in New York City and face down an army of mutants with the help of their friend April.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows

info.plot: As Shredder joins forces with mad scientist Baxter Stockman and henchmen Bebop and Rocksteady to take over the world, the Turtles must confront an even greater nemesis: the notorious Krang.
Seorang pemandu teksi wanita perlu membawa seorang pelanggan untuk mengejar dan memujuk teman wanitanya. Sepanjang perjalanan mereka saling berselisih pendapat namun akhirnya membibitkan rasa cinta.

Uncle Johari menerima tawaran sebagai Cupcake Chef daripada Hotel 5 Bintang di Australia. Isterinya menghadapi tekanan ketiadaan Uncle Jo. Nabilo datang memberikan bantuan.Adakah dia diterima mereka semua?

name: Tell You Law Moot Court: Cutting Ties

info.plot: A real-life courtroom story about a family dispute over a house. Five years ago, Sau Lai transferred the home to her son, only to discover his intention of relocating her to a nursing home.
Amalan ilmu hitam menyebabkan Mastura diusir dari kampung, lantas dia membuat perjanjian dengan iblis bagi membalas dendam.
A biopic of Temple Grandin, an autistic woman who has become one of the top scientists in the humane livestock handling industry.
Jack Black and Kyle Gass are a pair of "heavy acoustic" troubadours in this totally original, free-form comedy series.
Jack Black and Kyle Gass are a pair of "heavy acoustic" troubadours in this totally original, free-form comedy series.
Pak Ali and Mak Esah went through a difficult and sad life but the love between them remained intact. They were evicted from their homes. They both had no children and no shelter.

Kisah seorang anak yang ingkar dan hidup dalam kancah dosa sehingga mengabaikan tanggungjawab kepada ibunya yang masih hidup. Walaupun begitu, hidupnya masih lagi berjaya kerana doa ibunya yang tidak perna
This is a heart wrenching story of a father and a daughter who had to seek refuge in a distant land all withered and shattered postwar.
Mansi becomes famous with Vikrant's help after her former boyfriend's family members insult her and her father. Problems arise when her ex-lover apologizes to her and tries to win her back.
Sivagami, a young village belle, marries the head of a gang of robbers. She pledges to transform him into an honest man with the help of her Hindu deity.
Three deadly crime bosses, namely Nanjunda, Vamsi, and Maaran, exert their control over different areas of Chennai
A biopic about Jayalalithaa, the actress-turned-politician who served six terms as the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu.
Surya, a courageous man who was raised in the slums, fights for the rights of the poor. However, he becomes friends with Deva, who hires him as his commander and changes his life completely.
A woman invites her ex-lover, to spend 10 days with her and her husband to show that she is actually leading a happy life.
A romantic-thriller highlighting human trafficking and underground syndicates.
Thamizh, a courageous young man, anticipates collaborating with his brother in Kuwait however, fate has a different outcome in store.
Thavasi and Sankarapandi are sworn enemies. A young man, Thangarasu, commits suicide when wrongly accused by Thavasi for stealing.
In this anthology of horror created together by directors from around the world, a group of friends sit in a circle to play a game. Each of them must tell a story for each candle.

name: The Adventure of A.R.I.: My Robot Friend

info.plot: A teen tries to save a friendly robot named A.R.I. from a powerful corporation and ruthless lab director that want to make it into a dangerous weapon.

When a swarm of mysterious green piggies land on the island and disrupt the peace, it's time for the Angry Birds to step up and investigate what they're doing here. Available in English & Cantonese audio.
Red and his fellow feathered friends team up with the green pigs to fight off a common threat that plans to destroy their islands. Available in English & Cantonese audio.
Award-winning director Roger Ross Williams chronicles the unique history and contemporary legacy of the New York City landmark that influenced American and pop culture.
Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

Sequel to Rob Lowe's 2018 The Bad Seed, follows now 15-year old Emma, as she is sent off to boarding school where a new girl seems to know Emma's secrets, leading Emma to to slip back to her old ways.
Short Film - Struggling to cope after a recent tragedy, a young girl finds herself drawn into a magical world within a batik painting.
When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and unmask the culprit.
A story of 400 Korean workers risk their lives in an attempt to escape a forced labour camp on Hashima Island in Nagasaki, Japan, towards the end of WWII.
Two rival detectives compete against each other to catch the notorious killer who shakes up Korea with his gruesome murders.
After shy but clever 13-year-old Finney Shaw is abducted by a sadistic killer, he discovers a phone in his basement cell that allows him to communicate with the killer's previous victims.
The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All-American football player and first-round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.
On the night of Friday the 13th, the Black Cat group break into an abandoned sewing factory, simply called Workshop 13, where a security guard hanged himself.
Be ready for copious amounts of blood, shooting and death in this thrilling drama about good-cop-gone-bad against the backdrop of an escalating yakuza turf war and multiple disappearances.
A seven-year-old Tim knows that there is something unusual about his new baby brother but he never could have guessed that the baby is actually on a secret mission!
Set 30 years after the events of the first movie, the now-adult Templeton brothers are brought back together by the new Boss Baby to help stop a professor from erasing childhoods worldwide.
Jason Bourne is suffering from extreme memory loss who is attempting to discover his true identity amidst a clandestine conspiracy within the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA).

Aaron Cross, a Bourne-style operator who finds himself targeted for termination by black ops chief Edward Norton, who wants to eradicate the programme that created super-agents like Bourne and himself.
As he's being framed for carrying out a failed CIA operation, Jason Bourne must resume his life as a trained assassin to survive.
Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA official and his agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.
A drama about a young man aspiring to become a singer and a washed-up former hit producer. The two men head off on a road trip filled with music and jamming sessions.
An abducted boy escapes captivity, but he must also find a way to free his best friend from their kidnapper's house.
Will and Jake Grimm are travelling con artists who encounter a fairytale curse, which requires genuine courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.
A volcano eruption rescue performed by a sheriff and his fight to defeat the cursed lava-filled zombies.
In the fall of 1987, a group of small-town friends must survive the night in the home of a sinister couple after a tragic accident brings them to the couple's door.
Seven seductive Spiders lie in wait for our faithful heroes in the third installment of the Shaw Brothers adaptation of Journey to the West.

name: The challenge of Kung Fu Brothers

info.plot: Best friends Motu and Patlu visit the Land of the Dragon to learn kung fu from the local experts and defeat the Kung Fu brothers.
An aspiring cowboy who can't ride or shoot seeks revenge on the murderous railroad baron who killed his family.

name: The Child Who Would Not Come

info.plot: A trainee teacher tries to make a mysterious student who refuses to go to school return to his class, only for things to become progressively stranger and more harrowing.
Marco, a boxer from the Philippines, makes a living fighting in illegal matches. To raise money for his ailing mother, he sets off to Korea in search of a father whom he has never met before.
Orvala's dreams is to work with anything that related to chocolate. That dreams come true when Aruna ask her to join Fedde Velten Cafe. That's where her quadrangle love started.
The uneasy relationship between a father and daughter is put to further test on a camping trip out in the woods. No, it's not the bears that are after them, but something that is far more… undead.
Elite attorney Kang Seong-Hee goes up against a top prosecutor over a case involving a man accused of killing his wife.
A suicide from decades ago becomes entwined with the misery of a young girl who is suffering from abuse and depression. Will she ever be set free?
A counselor is sent by the Catholic Church to a small Chilean beach town where disgraced priests, suspected of crimes ranging from child abuse to baby-snatching, live secluded, watched by a nun.
Meet Gordon Welchman a key member of the British team that took on the Nazis, decoded the Enigma machine, and changed the course of World War II.

When he is sent to a parish in the mountains, the last thing that Father Giorgi expects is to be faced with a blonde temptress. He must balance his desires with his role as a representative of the Church.
Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.
Renowned paranormal investigators Lorraine and Ed Warren travel to north London to help a single mother raising four children alone in a house plagued by malicious spirits.
When his very first assignment goes awry, an ex-elite soldier finds himself hunted, caught in a deadly conspiracy and fights to stay alive to get home.
Penyakit yang mengubah seseorang bertukar menjadi zombi telah berjaya disembuhkan. Namun, mereka yang pernah dijangkiti didiskriminasi oleh masyarakat dan keluarga mereka sendiri.

name: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button

info.plot: The story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with bizarre consequences.
A devout community suffering from a plague is torn apart by a beautiful young woman and the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.
A mother of 2 must save her children from the malevolent spirit of the weeping woman, who steals children away at night.
A fashion model faces the threat of being unemployed by younger generation, decided to join a mysterious yoga class to maintain her beauty. Yet strange things start to happen…

A murder inside the Louvre and clues in Da Vinci paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for 2000 years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.
Short Film - As they head to a wayang kulit show, a workaholic father's growing impatience with his young son's antics is interspaced with memories of his domestic violence-filled childhood.
A man died slowly and his family members began to gather and mourn. But after that black power began to haunt and envelop the family.
When the menace known as The Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.
The emergence of Bane, a masked terrorist with ruthless plans for Gotham, drives Batman out of his self-imposed exile.
When a woman discovers a love poem that was written for her husband, she mistakenly believes that the author is her husband's new secretary.
A definitive window into the sports world's unprecedented shutdown due to COVID-19 and athletes' prominent role in the reckoning on racial injustice that took hold during the pandemic.
Keanu Reeves stars as a successful young attorney battling for his very soul with Al Pacino as his sinister boss.
Archangel Michael comes down to Earth to stop a dangerous conspiracy involving the cloning of Jesus Christ's DNA
An assembly member candidate is taken out of the running when he became a thorn in the side of a local bigwig. Hounded by loan sharks, he decides to get his hands dirty.
When the young girls began to get lost in the rituals of religious veneration, the older followers feared the old prophecies would come true.
At an old city hospital, the night passes with tranquility until strange things start to happen. A nurse must decide if these incidents are real or just her imagination - before it's too late.

On the anniversary of Irdina's disappearance, a group of her friends take a trip. What was meant as a quiet way to remember Irdina descends into bloodshed when they are hunted down by a masked assailant.
Loosely based on Louis Cha's classics, this rom com is about a power struggle between a Queen's treasonous lover and a princess amid slapstick battles and musical numbers.
This enchanting twist on a beloved tale chronicles the story of an Emperor whose blinding vanity makes him an easy target for two phony tailors.
A wanna-be-detective/swordsman gets more than he bargained for when investigating the disappearance of some martial artists.
The U.S. President is about to be overthrown in a coup- it's up to the US military's last loyal officer to stop the uprising.
When Miami's top mob enforcer discovers his femme-fatale boss has branched out into cyber-sex trafficking, he decides to sacrifice everything to save a young runaway teenager.
At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

A biopic of one of Mexico's most important literary figures that focuses on 2 pivotal moments in her life: her time as an introverted university student and her tempestuous relationship with a philosopher.
Dojo and May are lovers who plan to rob a store with the aim of getting one million baht for the brain tumor surgery that Dojo suffered.

name: The Exclusive: Beat the Devil's Tattoo

info.plot: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.
Violent hauntings happen at a hospital where nurses attempt to exorcise a patient.

An accident leaves a famous artist with memory loss and impaired vision. She receives eye transplant surgery but starts sensing a pair of eyes following her every move. Unimaginable secrets are exposed.
After watching his first film "The Greatest Show on Earth" with his parents, young Sammy Fabelman aspires to become a filmmaker, much to the delight of his supportive mother.
When some creepy things start happening around school, the students make a chilling discovery that confirms their worst suspicions.
High schooler Vada navigates the emotional fallout she experiences in the wake of a school tragedy.
While exploring the world with her ability to hear using her hearing aid, a deaf-mute girl gets kidnapped and trapped in a farmhouse by a masked serial killer disguised as a wolf. Will she survive?

name: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift

info.plot: In order to avoid a jail sentence, Sean Boswell heads to Tokyo to live with his military father. In a low-rent section of the city, Shaun gets caught up in the underground world of drift racing.

name: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift

info.plot: In order to avoid a jail sentence, Sean Boswell heads to Tokyo to live with his military father. In a low-rent section of the city, Shaun gets caught up in the underground world of drift racing.
Starring Gillian Chung, Henry Prince Mak, Lin You Wei & more, the story follows a Green Snake spirit who gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing & she gradually falls for him.
An HBO Original Movie about the high cost of enlightenment and the ever-widening gap between those who have and those who have not.
8 directors collaborated for 8 shorts comprising treatises on forbidden love, Greek underworld goblins, medieval Hungarian cobblers and US hillbilly folklore.

A couple of young millenials have lived together for years without any plans to get married. When they are unexpectedly faced with a possible pregnancy, they travel the country visiting their parents.
Worlds collide when Barry uses his superpowers to travel back in time in order to change the events of the past, only to inadvertently alter the future as well.
London businessman Quan's long-buried past erupts in a revenge-fueled vendetta when the only person left for him to love is taken from him in a senseless act of politically-motivated terrorism.
The show tells the chilling story of Abu Zubaydah, the first high-value detainee subjected to the CIA's program – which was later identified as torture by those outside the agency.
In a dystopian America where all crime is legal for one night each year in an event called the Purge, two families must band together to fight for survival when everything goes out of control.
David and Jo Henninger have a fatal accident with a boy while driving to a party. Their attempts to cover it up with the help of police are challenged when the boy's father arrives seeking justice.
Sara does not remember, tries to piece together the events that led to her attempted suicide. But reality grows murkier everyday until she is unsure what is real and what is not.
An undertaker and his family try to uncover the reason that their home is unhappy and they believe that it is due to spirits in the house. But when they learn the truth, they may no longer be alive.
Mark Wahlberg stars as an English professor who has a severe gambling addiction. A fearless risk taker, he has to place an ultimate bet for a second chance.

Eternity lives with her writer father in a gatehouse near the woods. She loves digging for buried treasure around her home. One day, she finds something she shouldn't have. Now, the forest wants it back.
The story of Winston Churchill unfolds in this award winning HBO Original Movie.
When he was young, Yu Dayou wanted to become a famous hero. Like all great heroes, he experienced many struggles as he grew up but never lost his strong sense of patriotism and national pride.
An imprisoned criminal rats out his former boss for one last chance to reunite his family and become the father he never was.

name: The Ghoul: Horror at the Howling Field

info.plot: A detective is sent to far-flung TungMhaHong Village to investigate a heinous crime with no real leads but many rumours about supernatural causes. Can he uncover the truth and save the villagers?
When novelist Tiana falls in love with visually impaired Harun little she knew that her orphanage mate, Arie was going to propose to her at the same time.
As the girl seeks truth behind the sudden car accident of her father, anger and despair left her only one option.
A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.

name: The Girl with All the Gifts

info.plot: A scientist and a teacher living in a dystopian future embark on a journey of survival with a special young girl named Melanie.
Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.
After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.
Award-winning actor Ku Feng plays the cunning pirate Lei Chen-tien, flanked by Wan Ping who disguises herself as a boy to beat him to the treasure.
After a kidnapped swordsman is surprisingly rescued by the father he had been looking for, he also learns about his mother from him.

The Good House follows Hildy Good, a wry New England realtor and descendant of the Salem witches, who loves her wine and loves her secrets. Her compartmentalized life starts to unravel as she rekindles an

name: The Goods: Live Hard, Sell Hard

info.plot: Used-car liquidator Don Ready is hired by a flailing auto dealership to turn their Fourth of July sale into a majorly profitable event.
In Gracefield, three couples are spending a long weekend in a luxurious cabin when suddenly an uninvited guest in the form of a meteorite, comes crashing the party…
Directed by Wong Kar Wai, this epic action film begins in Foshan when Ip Man defending southern fighting styles against a master of the North, Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond.
A pair of traveling British warriors discover that the Great Wall being erected isn't to keep out the Mongols: It's to repel a horde of rampaging supernatural creatures.

name: The Green Book: Guide To Freedom

info.plot: The story of The Negro Motorist Green Book, a travel guide that helped black motorists navigate safe passage through segregated America.
An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.
In the second film in 'The Grudge series' an evil spirit locked in a house is unleashed when the house is burnt to the ground.
A young Japanese woman attempts to put an end to the old curse of the evil spirits of Kayako and Toshio and save a family trapped by them.
After a tragic bus accident on Karak highway, Fami, the sole survivor, struggles to get help until a yellow Volkswagen stops along the highway and takes him on a ride of a 'lifetime'.

name: The Happiest Day InThe Life of Olli Maki

info.plot: A talented Finnish boxer is looking for balance between his career fulfillment and personal happiness.
After a whirlwind courtship of a seemingly fabulous Lila, Eddie marries her only to meet the girl of his dreams while on their honeymoon.
To save Zhang Zhi Ming, Zhang Zhi Hui engages in a thrilling battle against the Queen. Can they defeat the villains to ensure Peter's successful appointment as prime minister?
two women who have just survived bad bouts of man trouble just before the holidays. Desperate for a change of scene, they swap houses and travel in different directions.
A writer decides to spend the summer in the mountains, hoping for peace and quiet as well as inspiration. However, he soon discovers that, sometimes, reality is much stranger than fiction

A remake of a the original 1960 film of the same name, a man begins an affair with the housemaid under the nose of his pregnant wife. His lust will lead to terrible consequences for the entire family.
A young couple dream of growing old together as they deal with the struggles of being in a long-term relationship.
A high-school teacher is arrested for having sexual relations with a minor. Young Hitomi finds herself in the eye of the storm when she is suspected of featuring in her teacher's leaked sex video.
A veteran Vegas magician tries to revive his career after his longtime partner quits, he gets fired from his casino act, and an edgy new "street magician" steals his thunder.
A reclusive and controversial author is drawn out of hiding when he begins receiving endless letters from an obsessive fan determined to reveal the truth behind his famed book "The Infernal Machine".
An apartment building's owner has to face his most frightening fear as his tenants are torn apart - literally, by the vengeance of demonic cobras.

name: The Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley

info.plot: The story of Theranos, a multi-billion dollar tech company, its founder Elizabeth Holmes, the youngest self-made female billionaire, and the massive fraud that collapsed the company.
Joanna is a suspect of a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. When the police investigates the case, they discover another murder case which leads them to the truth.
As eerie happenings turn lethal and threaten her loved ones, Cecilia struggles to prove that she is being hunted by an invisible man.
Celebrity Peng travels to Rome for the shooting of a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Man Man, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy.
A man learns that he must pay a steep price to enforce his own rules as events escalate into misery and murder in this HBO Original movie.
When a vintage Jack-in-the-box is un-earthed and opened, it's new owners soon have reason to believe the creepy clown doll within has a life of its own.
In 1972, police arrested seven women who were part of a clandestine network. Using code names, blindfolds and safe houses, they built an underground service for women seeking illegal abortions.
Malaysia's highest-grossing box office movie tells the charming story of a conservative father struggling to cope with his daughter's marriage to an Englishman.
In the near future, 10 death row convicts are forced to compete in a virtual reality game that pits them against dinosaurs and each other.

Based on real events, this is a story about the family of a man convicted of brutal murders. It is a story about oppression and alienation within a family with ties that are strained to breaking point.
King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

name: The Knight of Shadows : Between Yin and Yang

info.plot: A legendary demon hunter tracks down beasts that enter the human dimension, assisted by a lawman protégé and a motley crew of friendly monsters.
In order to win her future mother-in-law's approval, Ceci must be crowned in a gourmet cooking competition. However, there's a catch; Ceci is terrible at cooking.
This Chinese animated film depicts how Rube, a sheltered ladybug who lives in a laboratory, sets out on the adventure of a lifetime in search of the legendary bug utopia, Golden Canyon.

On her ﬁnal combat mission across the rugged mountains of Afghanistan, Royal Air Force ﬁghter pilot Lt. Kate Sinclair's (Charlotte Kirk) jet is shot down over one of the most dangerous rebel strongholds.
A doctor and architect fall in love through letters and realise that they are living in the same house during different periods.

Matsuri Takabayashi learns that she only has ten years to live due to an incurable disease. She decides to not dwell on her life and not to fall in love, but she meets Kazuto Manabe at a school reunion.
Join Aang, an extraordinary boy with incredible "bending" powers, as he journeys through an exotic land filled with magical creatures and powerful friends.
In a distant future, an enigmatic boy becomes the central figure of new hope. Many go on a desperate hunt for answers about the importance of the mysterious child.
A woman in her 30s is looking for a way to get pregnant when she is diagnosed with a disease that can cause ovarian failure and make it difficult for her to have children.
A Detective and his sidekick get drawn into the shady underworld goings-on in Sapporo's largest entertainment district, Susukino, when they investigate the case of a missing girlfriend.

name: The Last Truck: Closing Of A Gm Plant

info.plot: An elegy to a dying American manufacturing system, and a timely look at the US auto industry in crisis through the eyes of former GM workers.
Jeremy meets Li Ann on February 29th and promises to meet every leap day, same place, same time. Will they manage to fulfill the promise against all odds?
When a crew of legendary villains wreaks havoc on Gotham City, loner hero Batman must learn to rely on teamwork to save the day.

name: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part

info.plot: Alert! LEGO Duplo invaders are attacking Bricksburg! Amidst the battle to defeat the enemy, Emmet, Lucy, Batman and the gang are brought to an unexplored land instead. Will they ever be successful?
Shunned by everyone for being the son of an evil warlord, a ninja seeks to defeat him with the help of his fellow ninjas.
A chamber comedy about a man trying to marry into a wealthy family and his wild, unpredictable brother who could ruin everything.
A woman pretends to have a wealthy fiancé in order to impress the people around her. But soon, she begins to drown in her own lies as they pile up beyond her control.
A Robin Hood-like burglar must outwit the corrupt police chief who seeks to unmask him. Starring Yueh Hua, Connie Chan Po Chu.
Days before Christmas 1988, Pan Am Flight 103's tragic explosion over Scotland at 31,000 feet forever changed Lockerbie, marking one of history's worst air disasters.

name: The Long Night of Francisco Sanctis

info.plot: In just one night, Francisco has to make a tough decision - to save his own life or the lives of two people who are about to be executed by the military dictatorship.

name: The Lord Of The Rings: Return Of The King: Extended Edition

info.plot: The final battle for Middle-earth begins. Frodo and Sam, led by Gollum, continue their dangerous mission toward the fires of Mount Doom in order to destroy the One Ring.

name: The Lord Of The Rings: The Fellowship Of The Ring: Extended Edition

info.plot: With the help of a courageous fellowship of friends and allies, Frodo embarks on a perilous mission to destroy the legendary One Ring.

name: The Lord Of The Rings: The Two Towers: Extended Edition

info.plot: In the middle chapter of this historic movie trilogy, the Fellowship is broken but its quest to destroy the One Ring continues.
Chung, who believes only in monetary success, finally finds a deeper meaning in life after he meets Hong Ye, who hires him at a restaurant at the most chaotic time of his life.
An elite U.S. Special Forces unit, sent into the Bolivian jungle on a search and destroy mission, is betrayed and left for dead.
An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms, Guan Yun Chang tries to rescue Liu Bei's concubine from Cao Cao even as the latter tries to recruit him.

In the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin participate in a joint mission against a mysterious criminal organization, which is working to proliferate nuclear weapons.
A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
"The Matrix Resurrections," the long-awaited fourth film in the groundbreaking franchise reunites original stars Keanu Reeves and Carrie-Anne Moss in the iconic roles they made famous.
The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.
A rescue diver has to save the crew aboard a deep-sea submersible that has been attacked by a pre-historic 75-foot-long shark.

name: The Mermaid: Lake Of The Dead

info.plot: An evil Mermaid falls in love with Marina's fiance Roman and aims to keep him in her Kingdom of Death underwater but Marina only has one week to overcome her fear of the dark water and save him.

Country boy Phol runs away to the big city, only to fall into a life of crime. When he starts to work for a hardened crime boss, the only things left that can save him from vice are love and miracles.
In the pursuit of a contractual work in Japan, Iris became the victim of a curse that haunted her during her engagement as an architect of an over 100 year old house.
An astronaut is left stranded in space because of an accident during a spaceflight. The former director of the space centre strives to bring him home safely.
An eccentric mortician recounts several macabre and phantasmagorical tales that he's encountered in his distinguished career.

Broke and alone, 90-year-old Earl Stone takes up a job as a drug mule. With immediate success and easy money, his activities soon draw attention from a hard-charging officer from Drugs Enforcement Agency.
Entombed under the desert for thousands of years, an ancient queen who was betrayed is awakened, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia and terrors that defy human comprehension.

name: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor

info.plot: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evie O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin - a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.
This hair-raisingly hilarious origin story reveals how love-struck vampire Lily first met and fell for the ghoulish green monstrosity Herman.

Koko and his friends are spending summer vacation on the shores of a lake near the idyllic Green Hill. The magical countryside is disturbed by unusual events which alarm the children as well as the locals.

name: The Newspaperman: The Life and Times of Ben Bradlee

info.plot: An intimate portrait of Ben Bradlee, tracing his remarkable ascent from an ill-stricken young Boston boy to one of the most pioneering and consequential journalistic figures of the 20th century.
An Iranian couple living in the US become trapped inside a hotel when insidious events force them to face the secrets that have come between them, in a night that never ends.

A blind man, who is an excellent acupuncturist, is recruited to become the head royal physician. Strangely, he is able to see in the dark and one night, he happens to witness the death of the crown prince.
A scheming con artist poses as a babysitter to steal from a rich occult enthusiast's home with her team, a trio of witches are unwittingly summoned by the man's son.
A heartbreaking story of Jewish life in Eastern Europe, sharing lessons from the Holocaust with a new generation.
Following the events of the first film, Sister Irene once again meets the demonic Valak in the Nun II.

name: The Odd Family: Zombie on Sale

info.plot: When a pharmaceutical company's illegal experiments inadvertently create a zombie, the quirky Park family discovers an interesting side effect to the virus and tries to profit from it.
In hopes of reconciling with his orthodox father, the son of a Chasidic funeral director returns home with his pregnant wife in tow.
Fernando is looking for black storks when he is swept away by the rapids. Rescued by a couple of Chinese pilgrims, he plunges into an eerie and dark forest, trying to get back on his track.
A fearless police detective is summoned to end a neighborhood territory war between Korean and Chinese gangs within 24 hours. Can he quash the violence and restore order before it's too late?
When a terrorist threatens Manhattan with a nuclear onslaught, all hope lies with a colonel and a White House nuclear expert.

name: The Pee-Wee Herman Show On Broadway

info.plot: Pee-wee brings Puppetland to Broadway – and the Playhouse to life – in this all-ages adaptation of the sensational stage show.
Attorney-general Fritz Bauer is determined to bring the Nazi criminals to justice but he is faced with opposition from his own country. He resorts to the only option left - committing treason.
A documentary which details the rise of cyber warfare and cyber spying as the primary ways nations now compete with and sabotage one another on an international scale.

name: The Plot to Kill My Mother

info.plot: A young woman who unknowingly grew up in federal witness protection reels after her mother's murder, leading her to question everything. She decides to leave the program and find the killer.
A diplomat and an National Intelligence Service agent headed to Afghanistan to save South Korean missionaries captured by Taliban. They only have 24 hours...
A depressed photographer moves into a room above a tailor shop. He often quarrels with the tailor until he unintentionally discovers unforgettable memories hidden in an old photo.
Desperate to reveal each other's secrets, two rival magicians become obsessed with their escalating competition and begin to perform increasingly risky tricks, which soon turn deadly.
A former detective, imprisoned for a hit and run gets close to an inmate who dons the jail and commits vicious crimes.

Detective Shin goes undercover in a prison to find a murderer of his fiancee. The prison warden secretly hosts fatal combats and when Shin discovers that one of the fighters is the one he is looking for.
Grace Field House is a seemingly ordinary orphanage where Emma, Norman and Rey live. Their pleasant days comes to halt when they know the harrowing truth that the children there are raised as meat.

On the night of the annual Purge, five citizens find out just how far they will go to protect themselves and, ultimately, each other, as they fight to survive a night fraught with impossible decisions.
A pair of cursed red shoes end up in the household of a divorced woman, and drives a literal wedge between her and her daughter. Can the hold of the red stilletos over them break the bonds of storge?
A female TV reporter investigating the red tide environmental disaster in Southwest Florida unknowingly becomes the target of an unknown monster.
An upstanding pastor uncovers a dark and twisted underworld as he searches for answers surrounding his daughter's brutal murder.
Seorang janda yang bersedih mendapati suaminya tidak dapat dijelaskan kembali dari kemalangan, tetapi makhluk misteri mula muncul dalam keluarga setelah ayah pulang.
A young single mother and journalist, Rachel Keller, is investigating a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone in a week of viewing it.
Six months after the incidents involving the lethal videotape, new clues prove that there is a new evil lurking in the darkness.

name: The Ringleader: The Case Of The Bling Ring

info.plot: THE RINGLEADER: THE CASE OF THE BLING RING examines the motivations of Lee and her friends who broke into celebrity homes to ransack and steal.

When their disciplinarian father is away, eldest son Aslan and his brothers briefly enjoy pure, unadulterated freedom and happiness in a river. Then, a cousin arrives with his gadgets and shiny clothes.
A national highway becomes a primary conflict in the lives of journalist Meera and college professor Maya, turning their lives upside down.
On his way to extradite a suspect, beast cop Ma Seok-do learnt about a brutal serial killer in Vietnam and decided to bring him to justice.
Seven years after the roundup in Vietnam, Ma Seok-do joins a new squad to investigate a murder case, which he soon discovers to be connected to a large synthetic drug syndicate.
From print to big screen, Val Kilmer fleshes out 'The Saint' - gentleman and master thief. Here, he must steal a vital formula from a beautiful physicist.
Emmy winner Pat Kondelis gives voice to Christian Dawkins, the unlikely centerpiece in a basketball corruption scandal in the US.
A female cop investigating a gruesome murder gets a shocking answer to the mystery from a boy psychic.
A terrier's peaceful life is upended when his owner brings home a sloppy mongrel. Available in English & Cantonese audio.
Max and his pet friends continue following their secret lives after their owners leave them for work or school each day.
