Featuring an all-star cast, this HK comedy version of Sex & the City is about single, successful psychiatrist Selina and other beauties in search of their true love and happy endings.
A young medical doctor finds his idea of modern medicine challenged by the myths and beliefs of rural villagers.
Stan is an orphan who lives with his abusive grandfather. Things are not better at school, where he has to protect his best friend Dommer against the cool crowd who are bullies.
After accepting a job as an off-season caretaker at a deserted and eerie hotel, aspiring novelist Jack descends into madness - terrorizing his wife and his son.
The story of three people trying to survive in Belgrade in 1999, as bombs fall around them.
Decades ago, a suburb was terrorized by the spirit of a woman in a surgical mask who asked victims, "Am I pretty?" before slaughtering them. Now, police and teachers must end a new wave of carnage.
Based on an urban legend, a high school student is disfigured when a deranged jilted lover splashes acid on her. She sinks deeper and deeper into depression and eventually becomes a mass murderer.
A searing look at corruption within the Baltimore P.D. after detective Sean Suiter's fatal 2017 shooting, which remainsunsolved.
A story about the founders of the social-networking website, Facebook.
When her composer father passes on, a talented violinist inherits his mansion, and so much more.
Documentary that follows presidential biographer Jon Meacham as he offers timely and invaluable insights into America's current political and historical moment by examining its past.
The 41st Hong Kong Film Awards Winner. A top-rated film based on a true case in Hong Kong, it tells of a young man who plots with his friend to murder & dismember his parents.
When a young dancer, under pressure to prove herself, loses a role in a play to her rival because she was deemed too nice, she accepts help from a ghost to bring out her darker side.
Two young soldiers who are childhood friends, are on leave in Cyprus after combat duty in Afghanistan. What they encounter there will test their mettle more than the war did.

name: The Story Of The Death Aka Khon Tai Tham Boon

info.plot: Border patroller Aod stops socializing with anyone following the death of his aged parents.

name: The Summer of All My Parents AKA Juillet Août

info.plot: Pimpette is only 14, but the circumstances in her life force her to grow up too fast.

name: The Sunny Side of the Street

info.plot: A Pakistani refugee receive help from a taxi driver after his father died in a car crash. They gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the truth behind his father's death.
A hilarious and intimate documentary celebrating the life and legacy of the late actor, writer, and producer BobEinstein.
The film follows brothers Mario and Luigi, who is transported into a whirlwind adventure through Mushroom Kingdom to save the world from a ruthless fire-breathing Koopa named Bowser.
This documentary follows three renegade Republican congressmen in their attempt to champion President Trump's call to "drain the swamp" while exploring what it would really take to reform Congress.
A woman filming a documentary on childhood rape victims starts to question the nature of her childhood relationship with her riding instructor and running coach.
Viktor Navorski is trapped in John F. Kennedy Airport when he is denied entry into the United States and at the same time cannot return to his native country.
The extraordinary story of one of the world's greatest living minds, the renowned astrophysicist Stephen Hawking, who falls deeply in love with fellow Cambridge student Jane Wilde.
Korean and Hong Kong thieves team up to heist a $20M worth diamond, while everyone has their own agenda to keep the diamond for themselves.
Wang Xiao Xia, a town youth with a simple goal, encounters Shen Lan Er, getting drawn into an unexpected conspiracy while trying to heal his blind father in Shiyin Town.
In this retelling of China's most popular romance, superstar Ivy Ling Po plays a scholar who tries to seduce a servant.
A thrilling adventure horror suitable for adults and children alike, about a young girl who races against time to stop evil forces from taking over the city by rewinding the city clock.
A bank robber must navigate a dangerous series of complications to get out of the game.

name: The Travelog: Hyoyeon & Sunny In Qatar

info.plot: Watch ''The Travelog' X Girls' Generation's Hyoyeon & Sunny" travelogue in Qatar with full of excitement and laughter.
A retired MMA champion is forced to fight in an underground tournament. When his wife is assaulted by syndicate thugs, he has no choice but to fight for justice.
Truman Burbank is the star of his own TV show and the town he has lived in all his life is really a soundstage! Stars Jim Carrey.
Exploring the provocative viewpoints of engineers, journalists and philosophers, this documentary examines more subtle but pervasive ways that robots affect humanity.
A tanker truck crashes in a Norwegian tunnel, causing a big fire. Elise, the daughter of volunteer firefighter Stein, is trapped in the tunnel. Stein and his colleagues try to save everyone.
The historic struggle and the courageous fighting of The Tuskegee Airmen, the first African-American U.S. Army Air Corps combat fighter pilots in WWII.
A young couple faces their biggest fear as their little daughter starts having an imaginary friend, who turns out to be their dumped, unplanned pregnancy many years ago.

name: The Unknown Flag Raiser of Iwo Jima

info.plot: Photographer Joe Rosenthal captured the image of five U.S. Marines and one U.S. Navy Corpsman hoisting the American flag in Iwo Jima. New evidence shows that one Marine was never identified.

Every village, every person, has a secret, none more so than in an isolated, murky village whose fate relies on the luring of two unsuspecting pawns to satisfy their appetite and determine their being.
Two children named Becca and Tyler visit their grandparents for the first time in Pennsylvania. Becca documents their visit there and also find out a dark secret about their suspicious grandparents.

A young woman starts hearing an otherworldly voice that tells her things and facts no one knows about. Her life spirals out of control when she falls under the control of this strange voice in her head.
When John Sr. is nowhere to be found, Olivia sends John Boy out into the night to find his daddy - a journey that will change John Boy's life forever.
A recovering alcoholic offers to coach the basketball team of his alma mater and in the process of helping the team win their championship, he is forced to deal with his past demons.
When Fleur join her university's hip hop team, a journey begins which lead her into the heated world of dance competitions and a complicated romance.

On the wedding day, Daniel discovers that most of the red packets he has planned to use to foot the bill have gone missing! Out of desperation, he heads to the nearby casino to try his luck and ends up los

name: The Weeknd: Live at Sofi Stadium

info.plot: Canadian superstar The Weeknd in a historic live performance direct from the SoFi Stadium, Los Angeles.

name: The Werewolf Game - The Beast Side

info.plot: A high school girl has to kill 9 others of high school students in order to survive from the game.
10 high school students are kidnapped and forced to participate to play a deadly game.
Based on the true story of a Korean researcher who claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices.
In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau & Louis Koo, a bounty of USD $100 million awaits those who successfully capture the biggest drug dealer in Hong Kong.
Woo-chul is released early for good behavior after 8 years in jail. His friend Do-sik invites him to join the gang but he wants to live an honest life. Can Woo-chul keep his hands clean?

When Holly's dark secret is accidentally uncovered by her new emotionally unstable neighbor Tom, they are pulled into a violent confrontation with her father who will do anything to keep the secret hidden.

name: The Witch: Part 2 The Other One

info.plot: A mysterious girl survives a bloody raid at a top secret lab and escapes. After she becomes accustomed to life in the outside world, she discovers that a group of deadly assissins is on her track.
A haunted nobleman is lured back to his family estate after his brother vanishes and discovers a horrifying destiny for himself.
This documentary features iconic documents written by America's founding fathers, which provide a blueprint for America's democracy.

name: The World Behind the Teenage Psychic

info.plot: The documentary delves into the supernatural world of Taiwan from the perspectives of Taoist and Buddhist religions, traditional temple culture, as well as indigenous beliefs.
Twenty years after attempting a marathon pub crawl, a group of friends reunites to give it another shot. Their ultimate destination is the World's End pub, whose name turns out to be rather literal.
A defiant teenage boy struggling with his parents' imminent divorce faces off with a thousand year-old witch, who is living beneath the skin of and posing as the woman next door.
A senior insurance agent suspect Karu regarding false insurance claim and decided to investigate this in depth. But he discover unexpected twist.
Honest,Virtuous and hardworking Nalan Kumar, chief gynecologist of Govt. hospital is shattered by the violence inflicted upon his dear one's.
A neurotic Sri Lankan patient crashes his psychotherapist's family vacation in Kodaikanal.

name: There's Something Wrong With Aunt Diane

info.plot: An HBO documentary that investigates the mysterious tragedy of Diane Schuler in an effort to understand what went wrong.
When his daughter's life is endangered by a local gang, Joseph Kuruvilla will do whatever it takes to stop them.
Nathalie has newfound freedom after her husband leaves her for another woman. She sets forth to reinvent her life.
Vasu, a youngster, is considered irresponsible by the woman he loves, Viji, and his family.
Sivagiri, a blacksmith from a village, visits Chennai to meet his sister and her husband. When he sees the city is not a safe residence for commoners, he takes the matter into his own hands.
Trimurti learns that his pregnant sister died due to a corrupt doctor's negligence who did not get a bribe. When he decides to take revenge, he finds out that the doctor is his boss's brother.
The story is about a cat-and-mouse game between Thiru and Guru, who is against Thiru and Priya's love.
A cop starts investigating the mysterious disappearance of her childhood friend. Can she handle the revelation that lies at the end of her inquiry?
Wildland firefighter Hannah is still haunted by the three lives she couldn't save, when she runs into a scared 12-year-old boy with nowhere else to go.
When Charulatha, Nandhu and Pooja return from abroad, they find out that their friend has been arrested for travelling on a fake passport.
Three sisters reunited for their father's birthday, yet the strange action of their brother reveals their dark past.
Pullu Giri, a family man, tries to lead a peaceful life and forget his criminal past.
Kutty is a good-hearted soul, but unfortunate incidents tend to portray his ruffian side whenever he encounters the girl he loves.
Six friends run away to escape from the niggling issues at their homes.
George Clooney and Julia Roberts team up as a divorced couple who find themselves on a shared mission to stop their lovestruck daughter from making the same mistake they once made.
Emmy and Grammy-nominated comedian, writer and director Tig Notaro returns to HBO in this first-ever fully animated stand-up special.
It tells the story of three brothers who are caught in a web of trickery set by the cunning Sadiq Segaraga who uses his three daughters to fleece the three brothers of all their wealth.
A grandmother overcomes difficulties in loving her drug-addicted grandson, her apathetic children only interested in money and a cruel daughter-in-law.

name: Time for Them to Come Home for Christmas

info.plot: During the holidays, a woman with amnesia catches a ride with her handsome nurse to investigate the only clue to her identity: a newspaper clipping for a Christmas festival with a cryptic invitation.
Bored by his mother's insistence on his getting married, Hairi finally agrees on the condition that he could choose his own soul mate. Does the choice of Hairi meet with his mother's approval?
An eager young tailor takes a dress order from a beautiful woman. Strangely, since that fateful event, his loved ones start to disappear, leaving nothing behind except blood-soaked clothes.
3 people mistakenly kidnapped a golf-course club member for a ransom to settle their deferred house rent payment, only to realize that he is a black market mafia and nation's most wanted guy.
During the lunar new year, Ka's future self, Katrina, returns from twenty years in the future to guide her. Will this be a chance for to change her relationship with her father?
In this twist-filled action film, a country girl is saved by a hero and remains coveted by her jilted lover.

Nicole learns that her stepfather suffered a deadly fall down the stairs and her mother has been arrested for his murder. As Nicole begins investigating, she learns that everything is not as it seems.

After losing his entire family in the 2011 earthquake and tsunami, a young boy is deeply emotionally scarred. It does not help that he is passed around by relatives. Finally, he arrives at Shimada's home.
Teknologi perubatan moden membuatkan Tok Siah, seorang bidan, merasa dirinya tak lagi diperlukan oleh masyarakat dan muncul konflik terang-terangan antara Tok Siah dan klinik kesihatan di kampungnya.
A shaman tries to diversify his source of income by renting ghosts to be used as supporting actors in horror movies.
In Tokyo, man-eating monsters called "ghouls" run rampant. The populace has become fearful of these creatures, who hide themselves among ordinary people, and remain shrouded in mystery.
Shinichi, a high school student, attempts to kill himself by jumping to his death. He survives but is seriously injured. Hayato, the High School Student President, senses there is more to the story.
A man discovers that the truth and the past are as elusive as love when he keeps running into a mysterious woman while exploring Tokyo on a business trip.
In futuristic Japan, a cannibalistic yakuza boss and his bloodthirsty lieutenant start a war with rival gangs.
Elly berpindah dari bandar ke pekan kecil untuk mencari ketenangan. Tetapi kenangan buruk tetap menghantui dirinya, sehinggalah dia bertemu dengan Karl yang mengajarnya erti sebuah kebahagiaan.

name: Tom and Jerry & The Wizard of Oz

info.plot: When a tornado strikes in Kansas, Dorothy, her dog Toto, Tom and Jerry awake in a strange place, the Oz land, where they have incredible adventures in order to go back to home.

name: Tom and Jerry Meet Sherlock Holmes

info.plot: Sherlock Holmes calls on Tom and Jerry to help him solve a series of jewel heists. However, before long the two are back to their old tricks, trying to outdo each other instead of solving the case.
This celebration of a half century of laughs brought to audiences around the world by the beloved cat and mouse.
Tom and Jerry's master, Jack, owns a struggling storybook amusement park. The park gets a vital uplift by some mysterious magical beans.

name: Tom and Jerry: A Nutcracker Tale

info.plot: As the ballet stage transforms into an enchanted kingdom, Tom and his friends create havoc by troubling the toys and kidnapping the Ballerina. Jerry and his friends seek help from the Toymaker.

name: Tom and Jerry: Back to Oz

info.plot: Dorothy, Tom and Jerry get sent back to Oz when an evil gnome king takes over Emerald City and sends the flying monkeys to Kansas to steal the ruby slippers.

name: Tom and Jerry: Blast Off to Mars

info.plot: Tom and Jerry are unintentionally packed off to Mars on a spaceship. Subsequent to landing in Mars, the two interact with the native Martians and cause them to decide to invade Earth.

name: Tom and Jerry: Robin Hood and His Merry Mouse

info.plot: Tom the cat and Jerry the mouse must put aside their differences to save Robin Hood and Maid Marian from their captors.

name: Tom and Jerry: Santa's Little Helpers

info.plot: It's Christmas Eve at the North Pole, but Tom and Jerry are still fighting -- until they have to deliver a special gift and find some reindeer magic.

name: Tom and Jerry: Shiver Me Whiskers

info.plot: Tom and Jerry are on a pirate ship when Tom sees a map in the water that a ghost warns him to not retrieve. However, things take a bad turn when Tom fishes out the map and hands it to the captain.
Tom and his nephew, Tuffy, make a snow mouse that miraculously comes to life! Join Tom and Jerry as they race their new friend to the fabled Snowman's Village to keep him from melting!

When Jonny Quest, Hadji and Bandit arrive to enlist the help of Tom and Jerry in protecting Dr Quest's latest invention from falling into the wrong hands, the dynamic duo must step up to save the day.

name: Tom and Jerry: The Fast and the Furry

info.plot: After wrecking their house during a chase, Tom and Jerry enter a race around the world where the winner gets a new fancy house.

name: Tom and Jerry: The Karate Guard

info.plot: Tom and Jerry is up to their usual shenanigans as the two frenemies battle to one up each other.

name: Tom and Jerry: The Lost Dragon

info.plot: Tom and Jerry find an egg that happens to belong to a dragon. When a baby dragon hatches from the egg, they set out to return it to its mother, all the while keeping it safe from an evil witch.

name: Tom and Jerry: The Magic Ring

info.plot: Tom is left in charge of a magical ring by his young wizard master. However, Jerry accidentally gets the ring stuck over his head, leading to an eventful chase all over town.
Cat and mouse duo Tom and Jerry reluctantly work together to save a young girl from her evil aunt.

name: Tom and Jerry: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory

info.plot: Tom and Jerry help Charlie, an orphan, win a ticket to Willy Wonka's chocolate factory. However, they must deal with Wonka's rival from stealing his prized candy, the Everlasting Gobstopper.

name: Tony Hawk: Until the Wheels Fall Off

info.plot: The film is a wide-ranging, definitive look at Hawk's life and iconic career, and his relationship with the sport with which he's been synonymous for decades.

name: Torn Apart: Separated at the Border

info.plot: Two mothers are separated from their children at the United States - Mexico border for months after fleeing from danger in their homelands to seek asylum.
Two friends, who are rising artists on the brink of a big break, must go to dangerous lengths to prove their dedication to their dream of becoming Nashville's next country music stars.
After workers at a luxury condominium discover that a billionaire stole their retirement money, they plot a heist to reclaim what he took from them... and more.
Project Manager Rusdi starts experiencing supernatural disturbances when he is tasked with overseeing the construction of the previously abandoned Town Mall.
On board a bullet train from Seoul to Busan, a zombie virus breaks out. A middle-aged man, Seok Woo, has to fight for his and his daughter's survival, until he realizes that he has been infected.
On board a bullet train from Seoul to Busan, a zombie virus breaks out. A middle-aged man, Seok Woo, has to fight for his and his daughter's survival, until he realizes that he has been infected.
Optimus Prime and the Autobots faces their biggest challenge and must team up with a powerful faction known as the Maximals when a new threat capable of destroying the planet emerges.
With the Optimus Prime gone, an unlikely alliance is formed to save our world from the inevitable war between the humans and the transformers.
A woman becomes a victim of circumstance, and in her attempt to escape her troubled situation, ends up getting involved in a crime. Starring Kasmadiana and Uji Rashid.

Things become personal for the Scooby gang when a group of doppelgängers resembling them and everyone's favorite classic foes suddenly show up in Coolsville, threatening their fun and restful Halloween.
A Son tries to save his father who was an ex-cop from tight spot caused by a tragic incident of kidnap.
Go behind the scenes and get the band back together. Rent the movie on Astro First now.

Go behind the scenes. Rent the movie on Astro First now.
Watch a Sneak Peek of Trolls band Together. Rent the movie on Astro First now.
Fish experts devote their lives to finding the best fish for their customers in Tokyo.
Kisah Tuan Petri Saadong yang ditabalkan sebagai Sultan Kelantan pada tahun 1667 menggantikan pemerintahan ayahandanya Raja Jembal.
Kisah Tuan Petri Saadong yang ditabalkan sebagai Sultan Kelantan pada tahun 1667 menggantikan pemerintahan ayahandanya Raja Jembal.

In a remote village, locals are committing suicide in the droves. Curious about rumours of a curse, a team of researchers from a local educational institute head to the village to find out for themselves.
The prodigal son, Emil, is determined to cycle 500 KM with a cat, back to his hometown to celebrate Aidilfitri. Will his spirit survive the journey?
A tycoon searches for his long-lost deaf son over a legal rights issue on a land he plans to develop finally get to meet him. But, his findings will lead to his downfall.
Five youngsters bite off more than they can chew when they decide to shoot a horror film at a haunted sugar factory.
Revolves around the romance of a pair of lovers who are blocked on deck due to superstition. Karim does various ways to get the blessings of the family of his idol girl, Tijah.
Mirna an obsessed and jealous woman acted to lock her husband inside the house when he had to work outside the area for two weeks for fear he would cheat.
While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.
A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream by winning the Indianapolis 500.

A writer looking for inspiration in Bali meets the owner of an artistic villa. Fascinated by the owner and the villa, she strives to get closer to her new friend, only to discover a bone-chilling secret.
In this surprisingly emotional documentary, heavyweight champ Mike Tyson analyzes the controversies surrounding his career and turbulent private life.
The Su family's grandmother accidentally lost a mysterious item, which attracted police attention. Her children were all dumbfounded and reacted terribly, resulting in multiple arrests.
The haunting continues in the second part of this Turkish horror trilogy.
A woman hopes for the reunion of two families caught in the ideological battle between her righteous but hot headed brother and her law abiding husband.
A group of university students climbs a mountain only to find an old house where dangerous supernatural beings live.
A friendship between college friends Shyam, Priya and Pooja suffers when Shyam confesses his love for Priya, leaving Pooja, who also loves him, heartbroken.
Anbu revolves around a small-time mimicry artist living with his only sister Bharathi.
Tired of his father's disciplinarian ways and to avoid marrying a girl chosen by the latter, Raja runs away to Ooty.

name: Ultra Galaxy Fight: The Destined Crossroad

info.plot: Expert team GUTS-Select investigate but are met with attacks from an alien army and a pitch-black mobile fortress, Zorgaus, piloted by Professor Gibellus who seeks to rule the skies of Earth.

name: Ultraman Decker Finale: Journey To Beyond

info.plot: A peculiar sound echoes through the sky. Those who hear it faint, and eventually vanish. Expert team GUTS-Select investigate but are met with attacks from an alien army.
Two years have passed since the final battle and peace has been restored around the globe. However, things don't stay quiet for long when monsters once again begin to appear on Earth.
The story revolves around Ravi who is an honest cop and always rebuked by his associates.

A driver and his passengers have a long conversation, learning about each other's trials and tragedies. Along the way, they learn that it is better not to judge a person before knowing their real story.
Sakthi tries to sabotage his marriage arranged by his father but gets a huge shock when the girl turns out to be the one he loves.

name: Under The Grapefruit Tree: The Cc Sabathia Story

info.plot: Take an intimate dive into the life and career of former New York Yankees pitcher CC Sabathia. Features behind-the-scenes footage from his final season with the Yankees in 2019.
Two estranged police officers dive into investigation on missing police officer.
Venkat works hard to bring down the largest drug empire in the country. His plans are disrupted when Aditya Sharma is released from prison and now wants to seek his revenge.
Rachel's already terrible morning gets worse when she gets into a small argument with a stranger on the road. A man who turns out to be mentally unstable, making her the target of his rage.
A group of high-school misfits must work together to survive a growing mob of inhuman zombie-like creatures when their field trip suddenly goes bloody awry.
Radha falls in love with Suriya however, things turn upside down when Suriya's ex-lover comes back to his life.
When Raghu learns that his mother is estranged from her large family, he makes way into that family to rectify the situation.
Mengisahkan tentang Arafat seorang mekanik di sebuah bengkel yang mula jatuh hati terhadap Ustazah Sahara. Pelbagai cara yang dilakukan Arafat untuk mengambil hati wanita idamannya.
The film deals with a deaf-mute couple and their struggle in society
Amar, a journalist, falls for a mysterious woman who does not reciprocate his feelings.
Ajay, a young man, is diagnosed with chronic brain tumour. He accepts his condition and lives a simple life, but Anjali, who loves his optimism, decides to lie to him in order to win his heart.
Anu and Sanju develop a great bond after the latter arrives in Hyderabad and moves in with Anu and her father.
After learning that their little sister escaped an earlier kidnapping attempt that also killed their parents, two sisters must join forces to rescue her from a group of bloodthirsty vampires.
A laundry worker is injured in an accident involving a guy from a privileged community. The troubles he is going to facing is the rest of the movie.
A man struggles to deny his attraction to his twin brother's new bride. A situation that tests his morals.
Surya, Prakash and Priya are three IAS aspirants. When Surya and Priya fall in love, Prakash, Priya's secret admirer, silently becomes an enemy posing as a friend and plots to get rid of Surya.
SP Jaisimha, a ruthless policeman, is on a mission to thwart the evil plans of Chidambaram, a notorious gangster, who wants to spread terror all around the nation.
Rusty Griswold takes his own family on a road trip to "Walley World" in order to spice things up with his wife and reconnect with his sons.

name: Vakansi Yang Janggal Dan Penyakit Lainnya

info.plot: When her new job sends Ning on a business trip with Mur, a Muslim male colleague, the suffocation of her marriage gives way to an awakening of repressed desires.
Five relationships in Los Angeles, all of which intersect, are put through the paces during the course of Valentine's Day.
A city witnesses a spike in its crime rate due to the nefarious activities of a notorious motorcycle club.
This story is about the struggle between a youngster and a cop. When the policeman snatches the youngster`s money, he must find a unique way to get his money back.
Hero is happy guy until he meets a beautiful girl and falls for her
An art college student tries to find the reasons behind the mysterious deaths of the people who have stayed in a hostel room, with help from a documentary filmmaker.
A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.
Friends Radha and Chelladurai lead a carefree life. When Radha accidentally kills Chelladurai's brother-in-law, it turns them bitter foes.
The secret son-in-law of an influential family, where everyone hates love and romance, arrives posing as a servant in order to gain their affection.
An aging man is unable to overcome the reckless act in his youth, but nemesis is close by.
Born to Lord Shiva and Goddess Shakthi, Lord Murugan assumes different guises to test the devotion of his ardent devotees and bestows his blessings upon them.

Easygoing Vijay, the prodigal son of a business tycoon, agrees to take over the family business, much to the chagrin of his two older brothers. Can Vijay prove himself and reunite his now-broken family?
Rangan, an unemployed man, follows stringent principles which make it difficult for him to cope with the corrupt world around him.
Bosepandi who runs a printing club falls in love with Lathapandi. When her father knows about their love affairs, things turn upside down.
The story revolves around the life of Uma, a young woman who is a staunch believer of Lord Murugan.
Ram (Ramesh) is a money minded guy who establishes an agency for those who have problems in love.
Vijay and Sanjay become best friends after Vijay saves him from a tragedy. When he learns that Sanjay has filed for divorce, he takes it upon himself to unite the couple.
Theva ends up in twisted situation because of his believe in Boss, which proves to be a grave mistake.
Two youngsters in the pursuit to become the leaders of their gang without violence, find themselves in an uncanny situation that would change their lives forever.
A 15-year-old boy living in Veeranor, gets struck by lightning and goes into a short coma. After recovery, he gradually realizes that he has superpowers of lightning and mind control.
After the death of his sister, Periya vows not to marry and raise his niece, Poomayil.
Elango, a 26-year-old man, is shocked to discover that his mother is pregnant.
When Raghuvaran declines a job offer by Vasundhara, an egoistic businesswoman, she sets out to make his life miserable.
When a young salesman finds out of a shocking fact from the company he works for, he takes the issue into his own hand, to fight against the company and save humankind for a better tomorrow.
Raghuvaran, an educated yet unemployed engineer, is unwilling to accept jobs that are unrelated to his area of expertise.
A milk vendor goes to the city and a journalist forces him to become an imaginary superhero to scare the criminals.
Two friends, Pandi and Murugan, borrow money from Vatti Varadhan to invest in real estate business. However, their business plans collapse when the land broker cheats them by selling a burial ground.
THE TRUE STORY OF THE RACIALLY MOTIVATED LYNCHING OF A GROUP OF ITALIAN-AMERICAN
Muthu, a low caste youngster, goes to the streets of Mumbai to earn a living. A series of unexpected events leads him to get involved in the underground activities of Mumbai's Tamil gangsters.
From director B. J. Novak, Vengeance is a darkly comic thriller about a journalist and podcaster who travels from New York City to West Texas to investigate the death of a girl.
The story revolves around Veerapandi, who is a respected man in Pandiapuram, Sivagangai district who controls around 50% votes in his constituency.

A lazy man who becomes a security guard at a soon-to-be-demolished shopping complex experiences a bizarre phenomenon when he and other tenants are chased by evil spirits on the sixth floor of the building.
Sekhar and Muthuraman are tricked by a con man who promises them visas to fly to Dubai.
A wounded man is found washed ashore in Goa. He suffers from amnesia but realises that he is well trained in combat.
A brother attempts to get his younger brother married to the girl he loves by kidnapping her, but the plan goes so wrong and results in messy situations.

Although Thiru is a cop, and he lacks courage. His brother, Guru, always helps him win accolades and promotions, but a brutal incident makes Guru realize that he needs to help his brother in another way.
Denes and Karadi are two friends who have completed their education, but have not found a job. Their dream is to make it big in the world without putting in much effort.
With innocent people falling prey to a psychotic serial killer, Ashok fights against all the odds to unveil the mysteries of his past.
What happen if not being responsible on the road while driving? Cast Ashok Kumar.
Raja, a thief, and Amar, a goonda, plot to settle in London with the money earned from a robbery.
A police officer is recruited to capture the leader of a separatist group.

Decades after their father's passing, three brothers, divided by greed but united in their hatred for their abusive late father, come together in an attempt to unravel the puzzle of their father's legacy.
A high-octane action film where a special investigator is assigned a case of serial killings.
Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer.
A college footballer who has no concerns in life other than his sport and his girlfriend; finds that an easy-going attitude eventually does come at a price.
When an offer seems too good to be true, it probably is. Kemal buys into a haunted resort, and now he must fight for the survival of his family.
Villa Nabila located in Johor Bahru is a haunted house. Based on true stories, each individual recounted their terrifying experiences.
Shiva, a bus conductor, robs the corrupt in order to fund an organisation that aids those with disabilities
The life of Venkateswaran, a differently-able man from Kerala.
A group of mercenaries breaks into a wealthy home and takes everyone hostage the night before Christmas. They are unprepared by a sudden visit from Santa Clause, who is not as saintly as they think.
It's good versus evil in cyberspace when an ex-cop hunts down a machine that has the character of 181 psychopaths.
Viruman leaves his house when he finds out that his father, Muniyandi, is the reason for his mother's suicide. Since then, there has always been a rivalry between the both of them.
Vishnu leaves his house and, pretending to be an orphan, finds work with a man who also adopts him.
A continuation of Vishwaroopam (2013), it showcases an Indian spy Wisam's relationship with his wife and team as he struggles to counter an impending terror attack planned by his archenemy, Omar.
A cop, after losing his wife, uncovers a huge medical crime behind her death
A girl enters a haunted forest to disprove superstitions. Strange events make her doubt her beliefs.
This is a film about 4 guys and 2 girls from different professions who come together into the magical world of cinema

Although a lot of different horrifying stories has made up the Karak Highway's urban legend of a yellow Volkswagen, majority of locals agree on one thing: never to overtake the reckless, driver-less car.
Long Wei who has post‐traumatic stress disorder is invited for a new product test and becomes the VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour.
A roadtrip movie about a father and son who travel together across Nazareth to hand-deliver wedding invitations that makes a poignant statement about Palestinian-Israeli geopolitics.
Kisah kehidupan jurutol Lila dan Tipah yang suka bergurau kasar ditambah pula dengann kehadiran Jack yang mengecohkan lagi suasana.
A true story of a group of Mexican-American students who staged a walkout to protest against injustices of the public school system.

Proving the difference between lotus flowers and teratai requires Akbar and his friends to travel into the forest. The forest they enter is controlled by a syndicate of illegal gold miners led by Marco.
Discover Perlis' Wang Kelian, the northernmost human settlement in Peninsular Malaysia, spanning from its rich tin mining history, endemic flora & fauna, ancient limestone hills & more.
The love between a young couple is put to the ultimate test by ancient supernatural powers that are far greater than they can imagine. Can love overcome all before the new moon?

name: War Dog: A Soldier's Best Friend

info.plot: A deeply personal documentary on three courageous dogs, highlighting the intimate relationship between veterans and their K9 companions throughout their lifetimes.
Based on the true story of two young men, David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli, who won a $300 million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan.

name: War Zone: Bear Grylls Meets President Zelenskyy

info.plot: Bear Grylls travels to Ukraine to meet Volodymyr Zelenskyy, in Kiev, and the brave people living in a war zone.
Tells the story of a man who has just lost his wife and his fate worsens when he becomes paralyzed after being hit by a car.
One man's secret quest for hope during his darkest days, in a place that would serve as a source of strength for him the rest of his life: Warm Springs.
Mustaqim yang tidak habis belajar, pulang ke kampung mewujudkan laman web kampung disokong Tok Ketua Kampung Kambing.
When a female workaholic is kidnapped by a security guard in the company's parking garage, she'll do whatever it takes to escape.
When one of his former colleagues is murdered, masked vigilante Rorschach sets out to uncover a plot to kill and discredit all past and present superheroes.
When five high school students join the swim team by chance, they find themselves up against a challenge when they are expected to put on a synchronized swimming performance.
Mengisahkan tentang kisah pengorbanan seorang ayah untuk membantu keluarga namun ianya disalah erti oleh anak-anaknya

name: We Are the Dream: The Kids of the Oakland and Mlk Oratorical Fest

info.plot: Students take the stage in a public speaking competition in this inspiring portrait of Oakland's 40th Annual MLK Oratorical Festival honoring the legacy of Martin Luther King Jr.

Filmed entirely within the world of virtual reality, this documentary captures the excitement and surprising intimacy of a burgeoning cultural movement, demonstrating the power of online connection in an i

name: We Stand Alone Together: The Men Of Easy

info.plot: This companion documentary to HBO's World War II miniseries Band of Brothers tells the story of Easy Company through interviews with some of the actual veterans.
Amanda and Jake want to start a new life in Los Angeles. Will they make the right decisions? The first 24 hours of their new life bring them more surprises and frustrations than expected.
In Tokyo, Hodaka Morishima meets a happy-go-lucky girl, Hina Amano, who has an ability to control the weather.
Lost on a mysterious island where aging and time have come unglued, Wendy must fight to save her family, her freedom, and the joyous spirit of youth from the deadly peril of growing up.

Set in a remote border town which landscape is as harsh as the politics are volatile, the film explores the tensions sparked off by perceived economic imperialism in the form of a power plant construction.
After moving into their new home, a family suddenly loses their youngest child. Who, or what, has taken her away?
The tragic events of September 11, 2001 are revisited in this 30-minute documentary to help a younger generation learn about this historical attack.

name: WHAT THEY DON'T TALK ABOUT WHEN THEY TALK ABOUT LOVE

info.plot: The students at a high school for the visually impaired find ways to communicate and collaborate with one another, and the outside world.
A headstrong music manager in desperate need of a hit song reaches back to his high school girlfriend, for the Christmas song she wrote years ago.

name: When I Get Home My Wife Always Pretends To Be Dead

info.plot: A worried husband is forced to pay attention when confronted by his eccentric wife's increasingly outrageous play-dead pranks. A touching film exploring marriage and the importance of communication.
A soldier struggles between his will to survive and his battlefield instincts in this powerful portrayal of war at its worst.
A mind-boggling coincidence leads the filmmaker Jay Rosenblatt to track down his fifth grade class and teacher to examine their memory of and complicity in a bullying incident 50 years ago.
"Where Got Ghost?" is a Horror-Comedy Chinese Movie. 3-in-1 Horror tales told in a good old comedy fashion.
Two notorious corrupt police officers, Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong were found to build a corruption network between the triad and police, the ICAC begins to hunt them down to end their control.
A pair of orphaned siblings work in a diamond mine. When they stumble on the world's most sought-after diamond, they discover that they have become the target of villains.
Pleasure turns to terror when a group of executives faces disaster as their white-water raft overturns in the churning Chilko River.
A group of friends had applied to join for entering the forbidden forest. Before entering the forest all of them were photographed together which already set the direction of their lives.
A young prosecutor faces a tough choice in making a case against a corrupt senior colleague.
Designed to behave like the late wife of a grieving widower, an artificial human begins to question her reality as memories of a past life begin to resurface in a world where nothing is as it seems.

name: Wild Card: the Downfall of a Radio Loudmouth

info.plot: A documentary that charts the rise and fall of prominent New York sports radio personality Craig Carton.
Life is not as beautiful as Nha Linh and Quy Khanh's dreams when Nha Linh's ex-girlfriend suddenly appears and causes uneasiness in the girl's heart. What will happen to this love triangle?
Fly alongside 3 WW2 Vets, as they travel to Washington DC to visit a monument built in their honour.
Frustrated with Shakti's rebellious nature, his parents send him to stay at his grandparents' house where he falls in love with Neelima.
A military officer returns home to overcome his demons by taking part in an MMA match with the children of the man who had tormented his family for years.
This local Hokkien CNY telemovie depicts how a family goes crazy over the purchase of a new house, stopping at nothing to achieve their dream & causing an avalanche of problems.

While on assignment in the Irish woodland, land surveyor Eric sees shadows flitting between trees. He is fascinated yet disturbed. The shadows call out to him. If he answers, he will be their prisoner.
Old friends from Boston drift apart following a shocking discovery deep in the woods of Savin Hill. After several years, a tragic murder reunites them.
Women of Troy is an HBO documentary exploring the career of the Cheryl Miller-led USC Trojans and their impact on women's basketball.
The journey of a 16-year-old musical prodigy who struggles to find his own identity in his turbulent teenage years. However, many obstacles stand in the way of his fulfilling his destiny.
An Amazon princess leaves her island home to explore the world and, in doing so, becomes one of the world's greatest heroes.
Diana has to muster all of her strength, wisdom, and courage as she finds herself squaring off against a villainess with superhuman strength and agility.
Catch the wondrous story of how the world's greatest inventor, magician and chocolate‐maker became the beloved Willy Wonka we know today.
Catch an extended preview of "Wonka" which tells the wondrous story of how the world's greatest inventor, magician and chocolate‐maker became the beloved Willy Wonka we know today.
Gautham, an aspiring writer, grieves his heartbreak by penning his thoughts in the form of love stories, he recognises the mistakes made by him in his relationship.
On a trip in the Outback, a group of friends rescue a girl. Soon, they are hounded by seemingly evil strangers, who unleash psychological terror on them. Can they fight to survive and escape?
Zhao Zilong is unexpectedly drawn into chaos during a turbulent era and, together with Liu Bei, achieves great military feats while establishing the Shu Han dynasty.

Recovering from a failed love affair, Shiyori and best friend Aiko head to the country. But they soon discover that the tranquil village is the home of a cult with a fetish for cutting off female legs.
Four young people are forced to participate in the "X Game". Games include "Thumbtack on a chair," "Pencil Guillotine," and more. Who is behind the games? Will these young people make it out alive?
Ganesha, an auto driver and ardent devotee of Lord Ganesha, starts experiencing strange things after the disappearance of an idol at his place.
Kothi, from the Einar clan, goes on a journey to revolt against the Pandiyas, headed by Ranadheera Pandiyan. Can Kothi free his clan and capture the kingdom?
An innocent woman, Yashoda, agrees to be a surrogate mother due to her circumstances. She then finds herself trapped in a world of uncertainties.
The Third Queen is jealous of her beloved youngest Queen, with whom she plans to slander. The youngest King and Queen poisoned and killed the accused who was sentenced to life imprisonment.
Inside access to President Biden's turbulent first year in office, marked by an ongoing pandemic and security threats at home and abroad.
After his fiancee is killed during a diamond heist, a man seeks vengeance on the gang responsible
Starring Xin Zhi Lei, Bao Bei Er & Wei Xiang, this sci-fi rom-com film follows a passionless tour guide who encounters a bizarre girl who claims to be a robot from the future.

Two social outcasts, a leper and an orphan, travel across Egypt in search of family and belonging. Along the way they suffer insults, discrimination and even theft, but also re-learn the meaning of hope.
A game app that appeared on a girl's phone looked harmless enough, but is actually a connection to the world of the dead, allowing her to see them through the phone's camera.

name: You Don't Mess with Little Bugs

info.plot: This quality Chinese animation series for children tells the story of a firefly named Din Din & his friends, as they set out to stop an alien invasion and save Earth.
Stuck in a personal and professional rut, a listless New York twenty-something is inspired to pursue her long-abandoned love for standup comedy.

Olivia can't seem to get away from her freelance career as a "Christmas Tree Whisperer" when her holiday plans are interrupted by a last-minute job which ultimately leads her to find the love of her life.

A coming-of-age story of a group of teenage friends, who overcome all challenges and obstacles to fulfil their dreams. Bonded through a fondness for cosplay, the three friends help each other out at school
Based on a popular comic featuring the adventures of a young triad gang in Mongkok, this sharp remake features a new generation in a razor-edged thriller.
Directed by top director Wang Shuan Bao & set against Shanghai's late Qing Dynasty, this tale charts how a young man rises to become a national hero against life's odds.
What happened to Ram in the police station when he went report about his missing girlfriend?
A detective goes in search of a missing girl. What follows are shocking revelations about Karthika, a girl who became the victim of power and economic exploitation
A team of investigators was sent to an old building believed to be haunted by evil spirits, only to discover an unexpected secret concerning the future of the structure.
A young woman is murdered right in front of a police station. The inspector at the station suspects her boyfriend, a private detective, who claims he is innocent.
Emmy-nominee Yvonne Orji uses therapy to discuss her evolving thoughts on friendship, dating, adulting, and why guys need better friends.

name: Yvonne Orji: Momma, I Made It!

info.plot: Comedian and actress Yvonne Orji gets a packed theatre rolling with laughter as she brings her razor-sharp wit and confidence to the stage in her first HBO comedy special.
A family finds themselves terrorized by their eight-year-old son's imaginary friend.
To ensure Superman's sacrifice was not in vain, Batman aligns forces with Wonder Woman to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.
A light-hearted comedy about a football team that scrambles to prepare for a championship game when their star player is unexpectedly injured.
In Jakarta, Deon, a student, and his mother are trapped in their apartment during a zombie apocalypse caused by the evolution of an amoeba zeta parasite.
A San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac killer.
After the death of the Muezzin, Pak Abu, the nightmarish scenario spreads as many other villagers start to fall dead and vanish - only to return as zombies and attack the rest of the villagers.
What was meant to be a regular opening ceremony at an art centre is thrown into chaos with the sudden appearance of a zombie. It now falls on three clueless friends to save the arts!
A man goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures, but soon they get trapped on the island and attacked by zombies.
Nisa is very depressed with her fiancé Farid who refuses to take the vaccine because she often has nightmares about it and this slows down their marriage process.
Starring local artists Daniel Che Zi, Vivian Liu & Jonathan Lee, this CNY comedy is about a timid psychic who works with a Chinese jiang Shi & a Western zombie to win his dream girl.
